RESUMEN AUTOMATICO

'In' this 'work,' we show that 'LRH-1' transcription is activated up to 30-fold in human pancreatic cancer cells compared to normal pancreatic ductal epithelium. 'This' activation correlates with markedly increased 'LRH-1' protein expression in human pancreatic ductal adenocarcinomas in vivo. 'The' inhibition is tracked in part to the attenuation of the 'receptor\'s' transcriptional targets controlling cell 'growth,' 'proliferation,' and differentiation. 'Herein,' we demonstrate that 'LRH-1' is expressed in 'islets,' including 'β-cells,' and that transcript levels are modulated by 17 'β-estradiol' through the estrogen receptor ( 'ER)α' but not 'ERβ' signaling pathway. 'Adenoviral-mediated' overexpression of 'LRH-1' in human islets did not alter proliferation but conferred protection against cytokines and 'streptozotocin-induced' apoptosis. 'Expression' levels of the cell cycle genes cyclin 'D1' and cyclin 'E1' as well as the antiapoptotic gene 'bcl-xl' were unaltered in 'LRH-1' expressing islets. 'We' postulate that this effect is mediated through increased glucocorticoid production that blunts the 'pro-inflammatory' response of islets. 'Taken' 'together,' our results identify the nuclear receptor 'FTF' as a central regulator of lipid metabolism. complemento([been, 'hypothesised,', mainly, from, studies, with, animal, models, of, liver, 'disease,', that, the, transport, of, substrates, for, metabolic, enzymes, and, their, subsequent, verbo([binding]), complemento([pocket, by, molecular, 'modeling,', severely, impaired, the, increased, interaction, with, 'LRH-1,', and, repression, of, 'LRH-1', activity, mediated, by, 3, 'Cl-AHPC'])]). relacion([sujeto([3, 'Cl-AHPC']), verbo([repressed]), complemento(['SHP', metabolic, target, genes, in, a, 'gene-specific', manner, in, human, primary, hepatocytes, and, 'HepG2', cells])]). relacion([sujeto(['These', data]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, 'SHP', may, act, as, a, 'ligand-regulated', receptor, in, metabolic, pathways])]). relacion([sujeto(['We']), verbo([reported]), complemento([previously, that, mice, overexpressing, cytochrome, 'P450', 7, a1, '(', 'Cyp7a1;', 'Cyp7a1-tg', 'mice)', are, protected, against, high, fat, 'diet-induced', 'hypercholesterolemia,', 'obesity,', and, insulin, resistance])]). relacion([sujeto(['Here,', we, investigated, the, underlying, mechanism, of, bile, acid, signaling, in]), verbo([maintaining]), verbo([increased]), complemento(['Cyp7a1', activity, expands, the, hydrophobic, bile, acid, 'pool,', stimulating, hepatic, cholesterol, synthesis, and, biliary, cholesterol, secretion, without, the, activity, of, 'SHP', is, also]), verbo([increased]), complemento([by, posttranslational, methylation, at, 'Arg-57', by, protein, arginine, methyltransferase, 5, '(', 'PRMT5)'])]). not, with, 'G9a,', and, decreased, their, recruitment, to, 'SHP', target, genes, in, mice])]). relacion([sujeto(['Hepatic', overexpression, of, 'SHP']), verbo([inhibited]), complemento([metabolic, target, 'genes,', decreased, bile, acid, and, hepatic, triglyceride, 'levels,', and, increased, glucose, tolerance])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', 'contrast,', mutation, of, 'Arg-57', selectively, activity, of, 'SHP']), verbo([provides]), complemento([a, molecular, basis, for, the, observation, that, a, natural, mutation, of, 'Arg-57', in, humans, is, associated, with, the, metabolic, complemento([insight, into, clock, output, functions, of, 'REV-ERBalpha,', we, carried, out, 'genome-wide', transcriptome, profiling, experiments, with, liver, 'RNA', from, 'wild-type', 'mice,', the]), verbo([increase]), complemento([in, bile, acid, synthesis, rates, and, the, subsequent, enlargement, of, bile, acid, pool, sizes, '(', 'BAPS)', during, the, neonatal, 'period,', and, how, complemento([modestly, until, 10.5, days, postpartum, '(', 'dpp)'])]). relacion([sujeto(['BAPS']), verbo([increased]), complemento([more, significantly, '(', approximately, 3, -, 'fold)', between, 10.5, and, 15.5, dpp])]). relacion([sujeto(['An']), verbo([increase]), complemento([in, mRNA, and, protein, levels, of, cholesterol, 7, 'alpha-hydroxylase', '(', 'Cyp7a1),', the, 'rate-limiting', circulating, cortisol, and, 'Cyp7a1', levels, 'occurred,', precocious, expression, of, 'Cyp7a1', could, not, be, induced, in, neonatal, hamsters, with, dexamethasone])]). relacion([sujeto(['Thus', the, significant]), verbo([increase]), complemento([in, 'Cyp7a1', levels, in, neonatal, hamsters, is, due, to, mechanisms, independent, of, the, 'FXR', and, 'SHP', pathway, and, cortisol])]). relacion([sujeto(['Peroxisome', 'proliferators,', such, as, the, 'lipid-lowering', fibrates, that, function, as, agonists, for, peroxisome, 'proliferator-activated', receptor, alpha, '(', 'PPARalpha),']), verbo([induce]), complemento([liver, tumors, in, rodents, and, may, produce, cholestasis, in, humans])]). relacion([sujeto(['Considerable', attention]), verbo([has]), complemento([focused, on, peroxisome, 'proliferator-induced', hepatocellular, 'carcinoma,', a, phenomenon, not, noted, in, 'man,', whereas, limited, studies, examine, fibrates, and, other, therapeutic, drugs, that, induce, 'cholestasis,', a, common, finding, in, humans])]). relacion([sujeto(['Moreover,', the, mechanisms, by, which, fibrates]), verbo([induce]), complemento([hepatocyte, proliferation, and, cholestasis, are, still, not, fully, understood])]). relacion([sujeto(['We']), verbo([have]), complemento([examined, the, role, of, hepatocyte, retinoid, 'X', receptor, alpha, '(', 'RXRalpha),', an, essential, partner, of, 'PPARalpha,', in, modulating, 'WY-14,643-induced', hepatocyte, proliferation, and, cholestasis])]). relacion([sujeto(['WY-14,643', treatment]), in]), verbo([regulating]), complemento(['WY-14,643-mediated', cell, cycle, progression, as, well, as, bile, acid, homeostasis])]). relacion([sujeto(['Mouse', fibroblast, growth, factor, 15, '(', 'CYP7A1'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Bile', acid, formation, and, messenger, 'RNA', '(', 'mRNA)', levels, of, key, enzymes, and, the]), verbo([nuclear]), complemento([receptor, short, heterodimer, complemento([formation, of, cholic, acid, '(', 'CA)', to, 44, '%', +, /, -, 4, '%', of, controls, and, glycodeoxycholic, acid, '(', 'GDCA)', decreased, formation, of, 'CA', to, 67, '%', +, /, -, 11, '%', of, controls])]). relacion([sujeto(['Addition', of, 'GCDCA,', 'GDCA,', and, 'GCA', '(', 100, 'micromol/L)', markedly]), verbo([decreased]), complemento([cholesterol, 7, 'alpha-hydroxylase', '(', 'glycine-conjugated', and, free, bile, acids]), verbo([suppress]), complemento([bile, acid, synthesis, and, mRNA, levels, of, 'CYP7A1', in, the, order, 'CDCA', &, 'gt;', 'DCA', &, 'gt;', 'CA', &, 'gt;', 'UDCA'])]). relacion([sujeto([mRNA, levels, of, 'CYP8B1', and, 'CYP27A1', are]), verbo([suppressed]), complemento([to, a, much, lower, degree, than, 'CYP7A1'])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', aromatase, knockout, '(', 'ArKO)', mouse, cannot]), verbo([synthesize]), complemento([endogenous, estrogens, due, to, disruption, of, the, 'Cyp19', gene])]). relacion([sujeto(['We']), verbo([have]), complemento([shown, 'previously,', that, 'ArKO', mice, present, with, 'age-progressive', obesity, and, hepatic, 'steatosis,', and, by, 1, yr, of, age, both, male, and, female, 'ArKO', mice, develop, verbo([reveals]), complemento([a, sexually, dimorphic, difference, in, mouse, hepatic, cholesterol, homeostasis, and, roles, for, estrogen, in, the, regulation, of, cholesterol, 'uptake,', complemento([receptor, that, can, modulate, the, activity, of, several, transcription, factors])]). relacion([sujeto(['Estrogens', are, here, shown, to, directly]), verbo([induce]), complemento([expression, of, the, 'SHP', in, the, mouse, and, rat, liver, and, in, human, 'HepG2', cells])]). relacion([sujeto(['SHP', is, rapidly]), verbo([induced]), complemento([within, 2, h, following, treatment, of, mice, with, ethynylestradiol, '(', 'EE)', or, the, estrogen, receptor, alpha, '(', 'ERalpha)-selective', compound, propyl, pyrazole, triol, '(', 'PPT)'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Mutation', of, the, human, 'SHP', promoter, defined, 'HNF-3,', 'HNF-4,', 'GATA,', and, 'AP-1', sites, as, important, for, basal, 'activity,', whereas, 'EE', induction]), verbo([required]), complemento([two, distinct, elements, located, between, -, 309, and, -, 267])]). relacion([sujeto(['One', of, these, elements, contains, an, estrogen, response, element, 'half-site', that]), verbo([bound]), complemento([purified, 'ERalpha,', and, 'ERalpha', with, a, mutated, 'DNA', binding, domain, was, unable, to, stimulate, 'SHP', promoter, activity])]). relacion([sujeto(['This', 'ERalpha']), verbo([binding]), complemento([site, overlaps, the, known, farnesoid, 'X', receptor, '(', 'FXR)', binding, site, in, the, 'SHP', 'promoter,', and, the, combination, of, 'EE', plus, 'FXR', agonists, did, not, produce, an, additive, induction, of, 'SHP', expression, in, mice])]). relacion([sujeto(['Surprisingly,', induction, of, 'SHP', by, 'EE', did, not]), verbo([inhibit]), complemento([expression, of, the, known, 'SHP', target, genes, cholesterol, 7, 'alpha-hydroxylase', '(', 'CYP7A1)', or, sterol, 12, 'alpha-hydroxylase', '(', 'CYP8B1)'])]). relacion([sujeto(['However,', the, direct, regulation, of, 'SHP', expression, may]), verbo([provide]), complemento([a, basis, for, some, of, the, numerous, biological, effects, of, estrogens])]). relacion([sujeto(['Bile', acids]), verbo([activate]), complemento([a, nuclear, 'receptor,', farnesoid, 'X', receptor, '(', 'FXR),', that, induces, bile, salt, export, pump, '(', 'BSEP)', but, inhibits, cholesterol, 7, 'alpha-hydroxylase', '(', 'CYP7A1)', gene, transcription, in, the, liver])]). relacion([sujeto(['Guggulsterone,', a, plant, sterol, that, lowers, serum, 'cholesterol,']), verbo([has]), complemento([been, shown, to, antagonize, 'FXR', activated, genes])]). relacion([sujeto(['Transient', transfection, assay, of, a, human, 'BSEP/luciferase', reporter, in, 'HepG2', cells, transfected, with, 'FXR']), verbo([reveals]), complemento([that, guggulsterone, strongly, antagonizes, bile, acid, induction, of, the, 'BSEP', gene])]). relacion([sujeto(['On', the, other, 'hand,', guggulsterone]), verbo([has]), complemento([no, effect, on, 'FXR', inhibition, of, the, 'CYP7A1', 'gene,', but, strongly, inhibits, the, human, 'CYP7A1', gene, by, activation, of, pregnane, 'X', receptor, '(', 'PXR)'])]). relacion([sujeto(['These', results]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, guggulsterone, inhibits, bile, acid, secretion, from, hepatocytes, into, bile, and, activates, 'PXR', to, inhibit, bile, acid, synthesis, in, the, liver])]). relacion([sujeto(['Reduced', conversion, of, cholesterol, and, bile, acid, excretion, may]), verbo([lead]), complemento([to, an, increase, of, hepatic, cholesterol, and, decrease, of, intestinal, cholesterol, 'absorption,', and, results, in, lowering, serum, cholesterol])]). relacion([sujeto(['Therefore,', in, the, current, 'study,', using, real, time, 'PCR', we, compared, the, mRNA, expression, of, 'ABC', transporters, and, genes]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, the, regulation, of, cholesterol, metabolism, in, liver, 'parenchymal,', 'endothelial,', and, 'Kupffer', cells])]). relacion([sujeto(['Liver', endothelial, cells, show, a, high, expression, of, cholesterol, 27, -, 'hydroxylase,', liver, 'X', receptor, '(', 'LXR)beta,', 'PPARdelta,', and, 'ABCG1,']), verbo([suggesting]), complemento([a, novel, specific, role, for, these, genes, in, endothelial, cells])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', 'Kupffer', 'cells,', the, expression, level, of, 'LXRalpha,', 'ABCA1,', and, in, particular, 'ABCG1', is, 'high,']), verbo([leading]), complemento([to, an, 'ABCG1', mRNA, expression, level, that, is, 70, -, fold, higher, than, in, parenchymal, cells])]). relacion([sujeto(['It', can, be, calculated, that, 51, '%', of, the, total, liver, 'ABCG1', expression, resides, in, 'Kupffer', cells, and, 24, '%', in, endothelial, 'cells,']), verbo([suggesting]), complemento([an, 'intrahepatic-specific', role, for, 'ABCG1', in, 'Kupffer', and, endothelial, cells])]). relacion([sujeto(['Because', of, a, specific, stimulation, of, 'ABCG1', in, parenchymal, cells, by, a, high, cholesterol, 'diet,', the, contribution, of, parenchymal, cells, to, the, total, liver]), verbo([increased]), complemento([from, 25, to, 60, '%'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Expression', of, hepatic, bile, salt, transporters, is, partly]), verbo([regulated]), complemento([by, bile, salts, via, activation, of, nuclear, farnesoid, 'X-activated', receptor, '(', 'Fxr)'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Bile', salt, flux, was, manipulated, by, dietary, supplementation, with, taurocholate, '(', 0.5, '%', 'w/w)', or, cholestyramine, '(', 2, '%', 'w/w)', or, by, disruption, of, the, cholesterol, 7, 'alpha-hydroxylase-gene', '(', 'Cyp7A(-/-)', 'mice)']), verbo([leading]), complemento([to, reduced, bile, salt, pool, size])]). relacion([sujeto(['Biliary', bile, salt, secretion, was]), verbo([increased]), complemento(['(', +, 350, '%', ')', or, decreased, '(', -, 50, '%', ')', after, taurocholate, or, cholestyramine, 'feeding,', 'respectively,', but, plasma, bile, salt, concentrations, and, hepatic, 'Fxr', expression, were, not, affected])]). relacion([sujeto(['Large', variations, in, hepatic, bile, salt, flux]), verbo([have]), complemento([minor, effects, on, expression, of, murine, 'Ntcp', and, 'Bsep', in, 'vivo,', suggesting, that, these, transporters, are, abundantly, expressed, and, able, to, accommodate, a, wide, range, of, '\'', 'physiological\'', bile, salt, fluxes])]). relacion([sujeto(['Two', 'ATP-binding', cassette, transporter, 'proteins,', 'ABCA1', and, 'ABCG1,', may]), verbo([mediate]), complemento([an, active, efflux, of, cellular, cholesterol, and, phospholipids])]). relacion([sujeto(['They', are, ubiquitously]), verbo([expressed]), complemento([and, are, subject, to, regulation, by, cholesterol, loading, or, by, treatment, with, agents, that, activate, the, nuclear, hormone, receptor, 'LXR'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Earlier', studies, in, both, primates, and, 'non-primates']), verbo([reported]), complemento([that, treatment, with, endotoxin, '(', bacterial, 'lipopolysaccharide,', 'LPS)', reduces, plasma, levels, of, 'HDL', cholesterol])]). relacion([sujeto(['LPS', treatment]), verbo([leads]), complemento([to, a, 'rapid,', 'dose-dependent', increase, of, 'ABCA1', but, not, 'ABCG1', mRNA, expression])]). relacion([sujeto(['Analysis', of, mouse, livers, showed, that, 'LPS', treatment]), verbo([decreases]), complemento([expression, of, 'CYP7A,', another, target, gene, of, 'LXR'])]). relacion([sujeto(['When', 'THP-1', cells, were, transfected, with, the, 'ABCA1', promoter, construct, '(', -, 928, to, +, 101, 'bp),', promoter, activity, was, significantly]), verbo([increased]), complemento([by, treatment, of, 22, '(', 'R)-hydroxycholesterol', but, not, by, 'LPS'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Together,', these, studies, show, that, 'LPS']), verbo([regulates]), complemento(['ABCA1', expression, through, an, 'LXR-independent', mechanism])]). relacion([sujeto(['Further', studies, showed, that, treatment, with, 'Rhodobacter', sphaeroiders, 'LPS,', an, 'LPS', 'antagonist,', or, 'PD169316,', a, specific, p38, 'MAP', kinase, 'inhibitor,']), verbo([prevented]), complemento([the, induction, of, 'ABCA1', by, 'LPS'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Therefore,', this]), verbo([suggests]), complemento([that, both, transport, of, 'LPS', from, the, plasma, membrane, to, an, intracellular, site, and, activation, of, p38, 'MAP', kinase, are, involved, in, the, 'LPS-mediated', induction, of, 'ABCA1'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Unlike', 'macrophages,', the, hepatic, parenchymal, cells]), verbo([express]), complemento(['cholesterol-7', 'alpha-hydroxylase', '(', 'CYP7A1)', which, regulates, the, conversion, of, cholesterol, into, bile, 'acids,', the, major, quantitative, pathway, maintaining, cholesterol, homeostasis])]). relacion([sujeto(['We', examined, if, 'CYP7A1', expression, in, 'RAW', 264.7, macrophages, could]), verbo([prevent]), complemento([the, accumulation, of, cholesterol, when, they, were, incubated, with, 'acetyl-LDL'])]). relacion([sujeto(['A', single, cell, clone, '(', designated, as, 7, alphaRAW, 'cells)', that, stably]), verbo([expresses]), complemento([rat, 'CYP7A1', displayed, similar, rates, of, growth, as, 'non-transfected', 'RAW', cells])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', 'CYP7A1', enzymatic, activity]), verbo([expressed]), complemento([by, microsomes, obtained, from, 7, alphaRAW, cells, was, similar, to, that, expressed, by, microsomes, obtained, from, mouse, liver])]). relacion([sujeto(['Incubating', 'non-transfected', 'RAW', with]), verbo([increasing]), complemento([amounts, of, 'acetyl-LDL', caused, a, parallel, accumulation, of, 'cholesterol,', whereas, 7, alphaRAW, cells, displayed, a, complete, resistance, to, cholesterol, accumulation])]). relacion([sujeto([7, alphaRAW, cells, displayed]), verbo([increased]), complemento([expression, of, both, 'ABCA1', mRNA, '(', 3.1, -, 'fold,', 'P', &, 'lt;', 0.001, ')', and, 'ABCG1', mRNA, '(', 2.2, -, 'fold,', 'P', &, 'lt;', 0.01, ')', ',', whereas, the, expression, of, scavenger, receptor, class, 'A', mRNA, was, unchanged])]). relacion([sujeto([7, alphaRAW, cells, also, displayed, small, but, significant]), verbo([increases]), complemento([in, the, rate, of, efflux, of, '[', '(', 3, ')', 'H]cholesterol', to, both, delipidated, apolipoprotein, 'A1', and, to, 'HDL'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Thus,', 'CYP7A1', expression, in, 'RAW', cultured, macrophages]), verbo([prevented]), complemento([the, accumulation, of, cholesterol, from, 'acetyl-LDL', via, both, increased, metabolism, and, efflux, of, cholesterol])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', orphan]), verbo([nuclear]), complemento([hormone, receptor, liver, receptor, homologous, 'protein-1', '(', 'LRH-1;', 'NR5A2,', also, known, as, 'FTF),', an, unusual, receptor, that, binds, 'DNA', as, a, 'monomer,', is, an, essential, regulator, of, expression, of, a, 'rate-limiting', enzyme, in, bile, acid, 'formation,', cholesterol, 7, -, 'alpha-hydroxylase'])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', a, classic, negative, feedback, loop, that, is, a, crucial, component, of, the, complex, regulation, of, cholesterol, 'metabolism,', cholesterol, 7, -, 'alpha-hydroxylase', expression, is]), verbo([decreased]), complemento([when, bile, acid, levels, are, high])]). relacion([sujeto(['This', repression, is, thought, to, be, based, on, the, bile, 'acid-dependent', induction, of, expression, of, the, orphan, receptor, small, heterodimer, partner, '(', 'SHP)', 'NR0B2,', which]), verbo([inhibits]), complemento([the, activity, of, 'LRH-1'])]). relacion([sujeto(['We']), verbo([have]), complemento([explored, the, molecular, basis, for, this, important, regulatory, effect, by, characterizing, the, mechanisms, by, which, mouse, and, human, 'SHP', inhibit, 'LRH-1-mediated', transactivation])]). relacion([sujeto(['Both', 'SHP', proteins, specifically]), verbo([interact]), complemento([with, the, 'AF-2', transactivation, domain, of, 'LRH-1', both, in, vivo, and, in, vitro])]). relacion([sujeto(['This', domain, is, a, common]), verbo([target]), complemento([for, coactivator, 'interaction,', and, the, 'SHP', proteins, can, compete, with, p160, coactivators, for, binding, to, 'LRH-1'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Neither', a, deletion, nor, a, point, mutation, specifically, affecting, this, domain, blocked, the, ability, to]), verbo([interact]), complemento([with, 'LRH-1', to, compete, for, coactivator, binding, or, to, repress, 'LRH-1', transactivation])]). relacion([sujeto(['However,', the, relative, ability, of, these, mutants, to]), verbo([inhibit]), complemento(['LRH-1-mediated', transactivation, was, markedly, decreased])]). relacion([sujeto(['During', fasting, and, in, type, 'I', 'diabetes,', elevated, levels, of, peroxisome, 'proliferator-activated', receptor, 'gamma-coactivator-1alpha', '(', 'PGC-1alpha)']), verbo([induce]), complemento([expression, of, the, 'Cyp7A1', gene, and, overexpression, of, 'PGC-1alpha', in, hepatoma, cells, stimulates, bile, acid, synthesis])]). relacion([sujeto(['Using', 'Ad-PGC-1alpha-RNA', interference, to]), verbo([induce]), complemento([acute, disruption, of, 'PGC-1alpha', in, 'mice,', here, we, show, that, 'PGC-1alpha', is, necessary, for, 'fasting-mediated', induction, of, 'CYP7A1'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Co-immunoprecipitation', and, promoter, activation, studies]), verbo([reveal]), complemento([that, the, induction, of, 'CYP7A1', is, mediated, by, direct, interaction, between, 'PGC-1alpha', and, the, 'AF2', domain, of, liver, receptor, 'homolog-1', '(', 'LRH-1)'])]). relacion([sujeto(['We', also, show, that, transactivation, of, 'PGC-1alpha', and, 'LRH-1', is]), verbo([repressed]), complemento([by, the, small, heterodimer, partner, '(', 'SHP)'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Treatment', of, mice, with, 'GW4064,', a, synthetic, agonist, for, farnesoid, 'X', 'receptor,']), verbo([induced]), complemento(['SHP', expression, and, decreased, both, the, recruitment, of, 'PGC-1alpha', to, the, 'Cyp7A1', promoter, and, the, 'fasting-induced', expression, of, 'CYP7A1', mRNA])]). relacion([sujeto(['These', data]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, 'PGC-1alpha', is, an, important, 'co-activator', for, 'LRH-1', and, that, 'SHP', targets, the, interaction, between, 'LRH-1', and, 'PGC-1alpha', to, inhibit, 'CYP7A1', expression])]). relacion([sujeto(['Overall,', these, studies]), verbo([provide]), complemento([further, evidence, for, the, important, role, of, 'PGC-1alpha', in, bile, acid, homeostasis, and, suggest, that, pharmacological, targeting, of, farnesoid, 'X', receptor, in, vivo, can, be, used, to, reverse, the, increase, in, 'CYP7A1', associated, with, adverse, metabolic, conditions])]). relacion([sujeto(['Literature']), verbo([suggests]), complemento([that, glucocorticoid, '(', 'GC)', exposure, during, early, life, may, have, 'long-term', consequences, into, adult, life])]). relacion([sujeto(['DEX', acutely]), verbo([induced]), complemento([hepatic, mRNA, levels, of, cholesterol, 7, 'alpha-hydroxylase', '(', 'Cyp7a1),', cholesterol, 27, -, hydroxylase, '(', 'Cyp27),', and, in, particular, sterol, 12, 'alpha-hydroxylase', '(', 'Cyp8b1),', whereas, expression, of, the, bile, acid, transporters, bile, salt, export, pump, '(', 'Bsep)', and, sodium, taurocholate, cotransporting, polypeptide, '(', 'Ntcp)', was, moderately, affected])]). relacion([sujeto(['Neonatal', 'DEX', administration]), verbo([led]), complemento([to, increased, bilary, lipid, 'secretion,', decreased, 'Cyp8B1', mRNA, expression, and, a, 3, -, fold, higher, 'Cyp7a1/Cyp8b1', mRNA, ratio, in, rats, at, week, 8, compared, with, 'age-matched', controls, without, alterations, in, bile, acid, kinetics])]). relacion([sujeto(['Therefore,', neonatal, 'DEX', administration]), verbo([causes]), complemento([altered, gene, expressions, later, in, life, that, are, not, translated, into, quantitative, changes, in, bile, acid, kinetics])]). relacion([sujeto(['Maximal', bile, acid, secretory, rates, and, expression, of, bile, acid, transporters, in, liver, and, ileum, are]), verbo([increased]), complemento([in, 'lactation,', possibly, to, facilitate, increased, enterohepatic, recirculation, of, bile, acids])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', bile, acid, pool]), verbo([increased]), complemento([1.9, to, 2.5, -, fold, '[', postpartum, '(', 'PP)', days, 10, ',', 14, ',', and, 19, -, 23, ']', ',', compared, with, controls])]). relacion([sujeto(['A', 1.5, -, fold]), verbo([increase]), complemento([in, cholic, acids, and, a, 14, to, 20, '%', decrease, in, muricholic, acids, in, lactation, significantly, increased, the, hydrophobicity, index])]). relacion([sujeto(['A', 2.8, -, fold]), verbo([increase]), complemento([in, 'Cyp7a1', mRNA, expression, at, 16, h, '(', 10, h, of, 'light)', demonstrated, a, shift, in, the, diurnal, rhythm, at, day, 10, 'PP;', 'Cyp7a1', protein, expression, and, cholesterol, 7, 'alpha-hydroxylase', activity, were, significantly, increased, at, this, time, and, remained, elevated, at, day, 14, 'PP', but, decreased, to, control, levels, by, day, 21, 'PP'])]). relacion([sujeto(['There', was, an, overall]), verbo([decrease]), complemento([in, 'Cyp27a1', mRNA, expression, and, a, 20, '%', decrease, in, 'Cyp27a1', protein, 'expression,', but, there, was, no, change, in, 'Cyp8b1', mRNA, or, protein, expression, at, day, 10, 'PP'])]). relacion([sujeto(['The']), verbo([increase]), complemento([in, 'Cyp7a1', expression, 'PP', provides, a, mechanism, for, the, increase, in, the, bile, acid, pool])]). relacion([sujeto(['Liver', receptor, homolog, 1, '(', 'LRH-1)', is, a, key, transcriptional, factor]), verbo([required]), complemento([for, the, hepatic, expression, of, 'CYP7A1'])]). relacion([sujeto(['We', hypothesized, that, 'LRH-1', was, also]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, the, transcriptional, regulation, of, 'BSEP'])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', support, of, our, 'hypothesis,', we]), verbo([found]), complemento([that, overexpression, of, 'LRH-1', 'induced,', whereas, knockdown, of, 'LRH-1', 'decreased,', 'BSEP', expression])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', 'addition,', such, transactivation, by, 'LRH-1', was]), verbo([required]), complemento([for, maximal, induction, of, 'BSEP', expression, through, the, bile, 'acid/farnesoid', 'X', receptor, '(', 'BSEP', promoter, were, demonstrated, by, electrophoretic, mobility, shift, assay, and, chromatin, immunoprecipitation, 'assay,', respectively])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', 'conclusion,', 'LRH-1', transcriptionally]), verbo([activated]), complemento([the, 'BSEP', promoter, and, functioned, as, a, modulator, in, bile, 'acid/FXR-mediated', 'BSEP', regulation])]). relacion([sujeto(['These', results]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, 'LRH-1', plays, a, supporting, role, to, 'FXR', in, maintaining, hepatic, bile, acid, levels, by, coordinately, regulating, 'CYP7A1', and, 'BSEP', for, and, 'mice,', low, plasma, levels, of, 'PON1']), verbo([have]), complemento([also, been, linked, to, the, development, of, atherosclerosis])]). relacion([sujeto(['We', previously]), verbo([reported]), complemento([that, hepatic, 'Pon1', expression, was, decreased, when, 'C57BL/6J', mice, were, fed, a, 'high-fat,', 'high-cholesterol', diet, supplemented, with, cholic, acid, '(', 'CA)'])]). relacion([sujeto(['PON1', mRNA, levels, were, also]), verbo([repressed]), complemento([when, 'HepG2', 'cells,', derived, from, a, human, 'hepatoma,', were, incubated, with, natural, or, highly, relacion([sujeto(['As', previously]), verbo([reported]), complemento([by, 'us,', mice, with, targeted, disruption, of, the, 'CYP8B1', gene, '(', 'CYP8B1-/-)', fail, to, produce, cholic, acid, '(', liver, 'ABCA1', mRNA])]). relacion([sujeto(['A', combined, 'CA', '(', 0.25, '%', ')', /, cholesterol, '(', 0.5, '%', ')', diet]), verbo([enhanced]), complemento([absorption, of, intestinal, was]), verbo([increased]), complemento([in, both, groups, of, 'mice,', but, cholesterol, crystals, were, only, observed, in, bile, from, the, 'CYP8B1+/+', mice])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', results, demonstrate, the, 'cholesterol-sparing', effects, of, 'CA:']), verbo([enhanced]), complemento([absorption, and, reduced, conversion, into, bile, acids])]). relacion([sujeto(['Interaction', between, 'alpha-hydroxylase', '(', 'CYP7A1)', is, tightly]), verbo([regulated]), complemento([in, order, to, control, intrahepatic, cholesterol, and, bile, acid, levels])]). relacion([sujeto(['Ligands', of, the, 'xenobiotic-sensing', pregnane, 'X', receptor]), verbo([inhibit]), complemento(['CYP7A1', expression])]). relacion([sujeto(['To', retrace, the, evolution, of, the, molecular, mechanisms, underlying, 'CYP7A1', 'inhibition,', we, used, a, chicken, hepatoma, cell, system, that]), verbo([retains]), complemento([the, ability, to, be, induced, by, phenobarbital, and, other, drugs])]). relacion([sujeto(['Whereas', bile, acids]), verbo([regulate]), complemento(['CYP7A1', via, small, heterodimer, partner, and, liver, receptor, 'homolog-1,', mRNA, expression, of, these, nuclear, receptors, is, unchanged, by, xenobiotics])]). relacion([sujeto(['Instead,', drugs]), verbo([repress]), complemento([chicken, hepatic, nuclear, factor, 4, alpha, '(', 'HNF4alpha)', transcript, levels, concomitant, with, a, reduction, in, 'CYP7A1', expression])]). relacion([sujeto(['Importantly,', no, reduction, of, 'HNF4alpha', levels, is]), verbo([found]), complemento([in, mouse, liver, in, vivo, and, in, human, primary, hepatocyte, 'cultures,', respectively])]). relacion([sujeto(['Although', the, 'anti-inflammatory', effect, of, 'interleukin-1', '(', 'IL-1)', receptor, antagonist, '(', 'IL-1Ra)']), verbo([has]), complemento([been, 'described,', the, contribution, of, this, cytokine, to, cholesterol, metabolism, remains, unclear])]). relacion([sujeto(['Real-time', 'PCR', analysis, revealed, that, 'IL-1Ra(-/-)', mice, failed, to]), verbo([induce]), complemento([mRNA, expression, of, cholesterol, 7, 'alpha-hydroxylase,', which, is, the, 'rate-limiting', enzyme, in, bile, acid, 'synthesis,', with, concurrent, 'up-regulation', of, small, heterodimer, partner, 1, mRNA, expression])]). relacion([sujeto(['Indeed,', 'IL-1Ra(-/-)', mice, showed, markedly]), verbo([decreased]), complemento([bile, acid, 'excretion,', which, is, elevated, in, 'WT', mice, to, maintain, cholesterol, level, under, atherogenic, diet, feeding])]). relacion([sujeto(['Previous', studies, show, that, feedback, inhibition, of, bile, acid, production, by, bile, acids, is]), verbo([mediated]), complemento([by, multiple, 'mechanisms,', including, activation, of, pregnane, 'X', receptor, '(', 'PXR)'])]). relacion([sujeto(['To', delineate, the, mechanisms, underlying, 'PXR-mediated', suppression, of, bile, acid, 'biosynthesis,', we, examined, the, functional, 'cross-talk', between, human, 'PXR', and, 'HNF-4,', a, key, hepatic, activator, of, genes]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, bile, acid, biosynthesis, including, the, cholesterol, 7, -, alpha, hydroxylase, '(', 'CYP7A1)', and, sterol, 12, -, alpha, hydroxylase, '(', 'CYP8B1)', genes])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', coactivator, 'PGC-1']), verbo([enhanced]), complemento([transcriptional, activity, of, 'HNF-4,', and, this, enhancement, was, suppressed, by, 'rifampicin-activated', 'PXR'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Endogenous', 'PGC-1', from, mouse, liver, extracts]), verbo([bound]), complemento([to, 'PXR,', and, recombinant, 'PGC-1', directly, interacted, with, both, 'PXR', and, 'HNF-4', in, vitro])]). relacion([sujeto(['Rifampicin-dependent', interaction, of, 'PXR', with, 'PGC-1', was, shown, in, cells, by, 'coimmunoprecipitation,', and, intranuclear, localization, studies, using, confocal, microscopy]), verbo([provided]), complemento([further, evidence, for, this, interaction])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', chromatin, immunoprecipitation, 'studies,', rifampicin, treatment, did, not]), verbo([inhibit]), complemento(['HNF-4', binding, to, the, native, promoters, of, 'CYP7A1', and, 'CYP8B1', but, resulted, in, dissociation, of, 'PGC-1', and, concomitant, gene, repression])]). relacion([sujeto(['Our', study]), verbo([suggests]), complemento([that, 'ligand-activated', 'PXR', interferes, with, 'HNF-4', signaling, by, targeting, the, common, coactivator, 'PGC-1,', which, underlies, physiologically, relevant, inhibitory, 'cross-talk', between, drug, metabolism, and, 'cholesterol/glucose', metabolism])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', orphan, receptor, 'SHP']), verbo([interacts]), complemento([with, many, nuclear, receptors, and, inhibits, their, transcriptional, activities])]). relacion([sujeto(['SHP', is, central, to, feedback, repression, of, cholesterol, 7, alpha, hydroxylase, gene, '(', 'CYP7A1)', expression, by, bile, 'acids,', which, is, critical, for]), verbo([maintaining]), complemento([cholesterol, homeostasis])]). relacion([sujeto(['Chromatin', immunoprecipitation, studies, showed, that, mSin3A, and, a, 'Swi/Snf', complex, containing, 'Brm', as, a, central, 'ATPase', were]), verbo([recruited]), complemento([to, the, promoter])]). relacion([sujeto(['This', recruitment, was]), verbo([associated]), complemento([with, chromatin, remodeling, after, bile, acid, treatment, that, was, blunted, by, inhibition, of, the, endogenous, 'Swi/Snf', function, by, 'dominant-negative', 'ATPase', mutants])]). relacion([sujeto(['Biochemical', studies, indicated, that, 'SHP', was]), verbo([associated]), complemento([with, the, 'mSin3A-Swi/Snf', complex, by, direct, interaction, with, 'Brm', and, mSin3A, through, its, repression, domain])]). relacion([sujeto(['Expression', of, 'Brm,', but, not, an, 'ATPase', 'mutant,']), verbo([inhibited]), complemento(['CYP7A1', promoter, activity, and, further, enhanced, 'SHP-mediated', repression])]). relacion([sujeto(['Bile', 'acid-induced', recruitment, of, 'mSin3A/Brm,', chromatin, 'remodeling,', and, concomitant, repression, of, endogenous, 'CYP7A1', expression, were, impaired, when, 'SHP', expression, was]), verbo([inhibited]), complemento([by, 'SHP', small, interfering, 'RNA'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Our', results]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, 'SHP', mediates, recruitment, of, 'mSin3A-Swi/Snf', to, the, 'CYP7A1', 'promoter,', resulting, in, chromatin, remodeling, and, gene, 'repression,', which, may, also, be, a, mechanism, for, the, repression, by, 'SHP', of, genes, activated, by, many, nuclear, receptors])]). relacion([sujeto(['Cholesterol', excretion, by, 'ATP']), verbo([binding]), complemento([cassette, transporters, 'G5', and, 'G8', '(', 'ABCG5/G8)', and, bile, acid, biosynthesis, by, cholesterol, 7, 'alpha-hydroxylase', '(', 'CYP7A1)', are, major, pathways, for, the, removal, of, cholesterol, into, bile])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', 'ABCG8', 'H19', allele, was, significantly]), verbo([associated]), complemento([with, a, greater, 'LDL', cholesterol, reduction, relative, to, the, wild, type, 'D19', allele, '(', 39.6, '%', versus, 36.6, '%', ',', 'P', =, 0.043, ')'])]). relacion([sujeto(['This', difference, was]), verbo([enhanced]), complemento([in, 'non-carriers', of, the, 'CYP7A1', promoter, polymorphism, '(', 42.7, '%', versus, 38.2, '%', ',', 'P', =, 0.048, ')', ',', and, was, diminished, in, accordance, with, the, number, of, 'CYP7A1', variant, alleles, '(', 1.8, '%', in, heterozygotes, and, 0.2, '%', in, 'homozygotes)'])]). relacion([sujeto(['We', conclude, that, the, 'ABCG8', 'H19', and, 'CYP7A1', 'C-204', alleles, appear, to]), verbo([interact]), complemento([in, a, 'dose-dependent', manner, on, atorvastatin, response])]). relacion([sujeto(['β-Glucan,', a, soluble, fiber, with, viscous, 'property,']), verbo([has]), complemento([a, documented, 'cholesterol-lowering', effect])]). relacion([sujeto(['Our', second, aim, was, to, determine, whether, any, 'gene-diet', interactions, are]), verbo([associated]), complemento([with, the, 'cholesterol-lowering', efficacy, of, 'β-glucan'])]). relacion([sujeto(['This', effect, of, 'HMW', 'β-glucan', was]), verbo([associated]), complemento([with, 'gene-diet', 'interaction,', whereby, individuals, with, the, single, nucleotide, polymorphism, '(', 'SNP)', 'rs3808607-G', allele, '(', 'GG', or, 'GT)', of, the, cytochrome, 'P450', family, 7, subfamily, 'A', member, 1, gene, '(', 'CYP7A1)', had, greater, responses, to, 3, g, 'HMW', 'β-glucan/d', in, lowering, 'TC', than, 'TT', carriers, '(', 'P=', 0.0006, ')'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Despite', that, quercetin, is, implicated, in]), verbo([regulating]), complemento([cholesterol, 'metabolism,', the, molecular, mechanism, is, poorly, understood])]). relacion([sujeto(['We', hypothesized, that, quercetin]), verbo([regulates]), complemento([cholesterol, homeostasis, through, regulating, the, key, enzymes, involved, in, hepatic, cholesterol, metabolism])]). relacion([sujeto(['To', test, this, 'hypothesis,', we, compared, the, profile, of, key, enzymes, and, transcription, quercetin])]). relacion([sujeto(['We', also]), verbo([found]), complemento([that, quercetin, treatment, significantly, increased, 'ATP', binding, cassette, transporter, 'G1', mRNA, and, protein, expression, in, the, 'liver,', suggesting, that, quercetin, may, increase, hepatic, cholesterol, efflux])]). relacion([sujeto(['Collectively,', the, results, presented, here, indicate, that, quercetin]), verbo([regulates]), complemento([hepatic, cholesterol, metabolism, mainly, through, the, pathways, that, promote, 'cholesterol-to-bile', acid, conversion, and, cholesterol, efflux])]). relacion([sujeto(['Here', we, utilized, male, mice, with]), verbo([increased]), complemento([levels, of, 27, 'OH', either, due, to, increased, production, '(', 'CYP27A1', transgenic, 'mice)', or, reduced, metabolism, '(', 'Cyp7b1-/-', 'mice)'])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', the, liver, of, 'CYP27tg', mice, we]), verbo([found]), complemento([a, modest, increase, of, the, mRNA, levels, corresponding, to, the, 'LXR', target, genes, 'Cyp7b1', and, 'Abca1'])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', the, liver, of, the, 'Cyp27-/-', mice, treated, with, 0.025, '%', cholic, acid, there, was, no, significant, effect, of, the, knockout, on, the, 'LXR']), verbo([target]), complemento([genes])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', a, previous, work, 'triple-knockout', mice, deficient, in, the, biosynthesis, of, 24, 'S-hydroxycholesterol,', 25, -, hydroxycholesterol, and, 27, 'OH', were, shown, to]), verbo([have]), complemento([impaired, response, to, dietary, 'cholesterol,', suggesting, 'side-chain', oxidized, oxysterols, to, be, mediators, in, 'cholesterol-induced', effects, on, 'LXR', target, genes, at, a, transcriptional, level, '(', 'Chen', 'W'])]). relacion([sujeto(['We', show, here, that, treatment, of, wildtype, mice, with, dietary, cholesterol, under, the, same, conditions, as, in, the, above, study]), verbo([induced]), complemento([the, 'LXR', target, genes, 'Lpl,', 'Abcg8', and, 'Srebp1c', in, wild, type, mice, but, failed, to, activate, the, same, genes, in, mice, lacking, 27, -, hydroxycholesterol, due, to, a, knockout, of, 'Cyp27'])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', results]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, 27, 'OH', is, not, an, important, regulator, of, 'Srebp-', or, 'LXR', regulated, genes, under, basal, conditions, in, mouse, liver])]). relacion([sujeto(['On', the, other, hand, 27, 'OH', appears, to]), verbo([mediate]), complemento(['cholesterol-induced', effects, on, some, 'LXR', target, genes, at, a, transcriptional, level, under, some, in, vivo, conditions])]). relacion([sujeto(['Hypoxic', stress, changes, the, transcription, of, several, genes, by]), verbo([activating]), complemento([a, heterodimeric, transcription, factor, called, 'hypoxia-inducible', 'factor-', 1, 'α/β', '(', 'HIF-1α/β)'])]). relacion([sujeto(['We']), verbo([found]), complemento([that, hypoxic, stress, '(', 0.1, '%', 'O2)', decreased, the, expression, of, cytochrome, 'P450', 7, 'A1', '(', 'CYP7A1),', a, 'rate-limiting', enzyme, involved, in, bile, acid, biosynthesis])]). relacion([sujeto(['Chenodeoxycholic', acid, '(', 'CDCA),', a, major, component, of, bile, 'acids,']), verbo([represses]), complemento(['CYP7A1', by, activating, a, transcriptional, repressor, named, small, heterodimer, partner, '(', 'SHP)'])]). relacion([sujeto(['We', observed, that, hypoxia]), verbo([decreased]), complemento([the, levels, of, both, 'CDCA', and, 'SHP,', suggesting, that, hypoxia, repressed, 'CYP7A1', without, inducing, 'SHP'])]). relacion([sujeto(['The']), verbo([finding]), complemento([that, overexpression, of, 'HIF-1α', increased, the, activity, of, the, 'CYP7A1', promoter, suggested, that, hypoxia, decreased, the, expression, of, 'CYP7A1', in, a, 'HIF-1-independent', manner])]). relacion([sujeto(['Thus,', the, results, of, this, study]), verbo([suggested]), complemento([that, hypoxia, decreased, the, activity, of, 'CYP7A1', by, limiting, its, substrate, 'O2,', and, by, decreasing, the, transcription, of, 'CYP7A1'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Bile', acids, are, primarily]), verbo([synthesized]), complemento([from, cholesterol, in, the, liver, and, have, important, roles, in, dietary, lipid, absorption, and, cholesterol, homoeostasis])]). relacion([sujeto(['Detailed', roles, of, the, orphan]), verbo([nuclear]), complemento([receptors, regulating, cholesterol, 7, 'α-hydroxylase', '(', 'CYP7A1),', the, 'rate-limiting', enzyme, in, bile, acid, 'synthesis,', have, not, yet, been, fully, elucidated])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', the, present, 'study,', we]), verbo([report]), complemento([that, 'oestrogen-related', receptor, γ, '(', 'ERRγ)', is, a, novel, transcriptional, regulator, of, 'CYP7A1', expression])]). relacion([sujeto(['Activation', of, cannabinoid, receptor, type, 1, '(', 'CB1', 'receptor)', signalling]), verbo([induced]), complemento(['ERRγ-mediated', transcription, of, the, 'CYP7A1', gene])]). relacion([sujeto(['Overexpression', of, 'ERRγ']), verbo([increased]), complemento(['CYP7A1', expression, in, vitro, and, in, 'vivo,', whereas, knockdown, of, 'ERRγ', attenuated, 'CYP7A1', expression])]). relacion([sujeto(['Small', heterodimer, partner, '(', 'SHP)']), verbo([inhibited]), complemento([the, transcriptional, activity, of, 'ERRγ', and, thus, regulated, 'CYP7A1', expression])]). relacion([sujeto(['Overexpression', of, 'ERRγ']), verbo([led]), complemento([to, increased, bile, acid, 'levels,', whereas, an, inverse, agonist, of, 'ERRγ,', 'GSK5182,', reduced, 'CYP7A1', expression, and, bile, acid, synthesis])]). relacion([sujeto(['These', results]), verbo([provide]), complemento([the, molecular, mechanism, linking, 'ERRγ', and, bile, acid, metabolism])]). relacion([sujeto(['We']), verbo([have]), complemento([previously, observed, that, knockout, of, 'Niemann-Pick', 'C1-Like', 1, '(', 'NPC1L1),', a, cholesterol, transporter, essential, for, intestinal, cholesterol, 'absorption,', reduces, the, output, of, dry, stool, in, mice])]). relacion([sujeto(['Germ-free', '(', 'GF)', mice]), verbo([have]), complemento([reduced, stool, output])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', 'addition,', we, show, that, 'GF', versus, 'SPF', mice]), verbo([have]), complemento([reduced, intestinal, absorption, and, increased, fecal, excretion, of, 'cholesterol,', particularly, after, treatment, with, ezetimibe])]). relacion([sujeto(['This', negative, balance, of, cholesterol, in, 'GF', mice, is]), verbo([associated]), complemento([with, reduced, plasma, and, levels, of, other, genes, in, intestine, and, liver, largely, reflect, a, state, of, cholesterol, depletion, and, a]), verbo([decrease]), complemento([in, intestinal, sensing, of, bile, acids])]). relacion([sujeto(['Altogether,', our, findings]), verbo([reveal]), complemento([a, broad, role, of, microbiota, in, regulating, 'whole-body', cholesterol, homeostasis, and, its, response, to, a, 'cholesterol-lowering', 'drug,', ezetimibe])]). relacion([sujeto(['Kaempferol', is, a, dietary, flavonol, previously, shown, to]), verbo([regulate]), complemento([cellular, lipid, and, glucose, metabolism])]). relacion([sujeto(['However,', its, molecular, mechanisms, of, action, and]), verbo([target]), complemento([proteins, have, remained, 'elusive,', probably, due, to, the, involvement, of, multiple, proteins])]). relacion([sujeto(['This', study, investigated, the, molecular]), verbo([targets]), complemento([of, kaempferol])]). relacion([sujeto(['Ligand']), verbo([binding]), complemento([of, kaempferol, to, liver, 'X', receptors, '(', 'LXRs)', was, quantified, by, 'time-resolved', fluorescence, resonance, energy, transfer, and, surface, plasmon, resonance, analyses])]). relacion([sujeto(['Kaempferol', directly]), verbo([binds]), complemento([to, and, induces, the, transactivation, of, 'LXRs,', with, stronger, specificity, for, the, 'β-subtype', '(', 'EC50', =, 0.33, 'μM)'])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', oral, administration, of, kaempferol, in, 'apolipoprotein-E-deficient', mice, '(', 150, 'mg/day/kg', body, 'weight)', significantly, reduced, plasma, glucose, and]), verbo([increased]), complemento(['high-density', lipoprotein, cholesterol, levels, and, insulin, sensitivity, compared, with, the, 'vehicle-fed', control])]). relacion([sujeto(['Kaempferol', also, reduced, plasma, triglyceride, concentrations, and, did, not]), verbo([cause]), complemento([liver, 'steatosis,', a, common, side, effect, of, potent, 'LXR', activation])]). 'SREBP-1)'])]). relacion([sujeto(['They', also]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, kaempferol, activates, 'LXR-β', and, suppresses, 'SREBP-1', to, enhance, symptoms, in, metabolic, syndrome])]). relacion([sujeto(['Consistent', with, disturbed, hepatic, clock, gene, expression, in, 'MLL4', mutant, 'mice,', we]), verbo([found]), complemento([that, rhythmic, fluctuation, of, hepatic, and, serum, bile, acid, '(', 'BA)', levels, over, the, circadian, cycle, is, abolished, in, 'MLL4', mutant, mice])]). relacion([sujeto(['Together,', our, results]), verbo([provide]), complemento([strong, in, vivo, support, for, important, roles, of, both, 'MLL3', and, 'MLL4', in, similar, metabolic, pathways])]). relacion([sujeto(['Both', 'MLL3', and, 'MLL4', complexes]), verbo([act]), complemento([as, major, epigenetic, regulators, of, diverse, metabolic, processes, '(', including, circadian, control, of, bile, acid, 'homeostasis)', and, as, critical, transcriptional, coactivators, of, the, circadian, 'TFs,', 'RORs'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Atorvastatin']), verbo([decreased]), complemento(['BA', pool, 'size,', mainly, due, to, less, 'BA', in, the, intestine])]). relacion([sujeto(['Atorvastatin']), verbo([increased]), complemento([the, ratio, of, 12, 'α-OH/non12α-OH', 'BAs'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Atorvastatin']), verbo([increased]), complemento([the, mRNAs, of, the, 'BA-synthetic', enzymes, cholesterol, 7, 'α-hydroxylase', '(', 'Cyp7a1)', '(', over, 10, -, 'fold)', and, cytochrome, 'P450', 27, 'a1,', the, 'BA', uptake, transporters, 'Na⁺/taurocholate', cotransporting, polypeptide, and, organic, anion, transporting, polypeptide, 1, 'b2,', and, the, efflux, transporter, multidrug, 'resistance-associated', protein, 2, in, the, liver])]). relacion([sujeto(['Noticeably,', atorvastatin]), verbo([suppressed]), complemento([the, expression, of, 'BA', nuclear, receptor, farnesoid, 'X', receptor, '(', 'FXR)', target, 'genes,', namely, small, heterodimer, partner, '(', 'liver)', and, fibroblast, growth, factor, 15, '(', 'ileum)'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Furthermore,', atorvastatin]), verbo([increased]), complemento([the, mRNAs, of, the, organic, cation, uptake, transporter, 1, and, cholesterol, efflux, transporters, 'Abcg5', and, 'Abcg8', in, the, liver])]). relacion([sujeto(['The']), verbo([increased]), complemento([expression, of, induction, by, atorvastatin, appears, to, be, due, to]), verbo([suppressed]), complemento(['FXR', signaling, in, both, the, liver, and, intestine])]). relacion([sujeto(['Bile', salts]), verbo([inhibit]), complemento([their, own, production, by, inducing, the, nuclear, receptor, small, heterodimer, partner, '(', 'SHP)', '(', encoded, by, 'NR0B2),', which, contributes, to, repression, of, the, gene, encoding, cholesterol, 7, 'α-hydroxylase', '(', 'CYP7A1),', a, key, enzyme, for, the, control, of, bile, salt, synthesis])]). relacion([sujeto(['On', the, other, 'hand,', bile, salts]), verbo([stimulate]), complemento([hepatic, synthesis, of, nitric, oxide])]). relacion([sujeto(['We', investigated, the, role, of, nitric, oxide, signaling, in, 'the\240\control', of, 'CYP7A1', expression, and, the, involvement, in, 'this\240\process', of, 'glyceraldehyde-3-phosphate', dehydrogenase, '(', 'GAPDH),', which]), verbo([participates]), complemento([in, intracellular, propagation, of, nitric, oxide, signals])]). relacion([sujeto(['Rats', placed, on, 'cholate-rich', diets, and, given, 'L-NAME', had]), verbo([increased]), complemento([intrahepatic, and, biliary, levels, of, bile, 'salts,', and, deficiency, in, repression, of, 'CYP7A1', '(', at, the, messenger, 'RNA', and, protein, 'levels)', in, liver, 'tissue,', despite, preserved, induction, of, 'SHP'])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', 'hepatocytes,', cholate]), verbo([promoted]), complemento(['S-nitrosylation', of, 'GAPDH', and, its, translocation, to, the, 'nucleus,', accompanied, by, 'S-nitrosylation', of, histone, deacetylase, 2, '\240\(HDAC2)', and, 'Sirtuin', 1, '(', 'SIRT1),', deacetylases, that, 'participate,', 'respectively,', in, the, formation, of, 'Cyp7a1', and, 'Shp', repressor, complexes])]). relacion([sujeto(['Knockdown', of, 'GAPDH']), verbo([prevented]), complemento([repression, of, 'CYP7A1', by, 'cholate,', and, blocking, nuclear, transport, of, nitrosylated, 'GAPDH', reduced, complemento([binding, of, 'SHP', to, 'HDAC2', and, its, recruitment, to, the, 'Cyp7a1', 'promoter;', these, processes, were, inhibited, by, blocking, nitric, oxide, synthesis])]). relacion([sujeto(['Levels', of, nitrosylated, 'GAPDH', and, nitrosylated, 'HDAC2', were]), verbo([increased]), complemento([in, cholestatic, human, and, rat, livers, reflecting, increased, concentrations, of, bile, salts, in, these, conditions])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', rat, 'liver,', excess, levels, of, bile, salts]), verbo([activate]), complemento([a, 'GAPDH-mediated', transnitrosylation, cascade, that, provides, feedback, inhibition, of, bile, salt, synthesis])]). relacion([sujeto(['Intestinal', 'L-cells', secrete, 'glucagon-like', 'peptide-1', '(', 'GLP-1)', and, can, be]), verbo([activated]), complemento([by, bile, acids, '(', 'BA)', influencing, insulin, resistance, and, hepatic, steatosis, development, and, progression])]). relacion([sujeto(['Administration', of, both, 'CA', and, 'UDCA', was]), verbo([associated]), complemento([to, decreased, hepatic, triglyceride, content, and, complete, reversion, of, histological, steatosis])]). relacion([sujeto(['Statins', are]), verbo([suggested]), complemento([to, preserve, gallbladder, function, by, suppressing, 'pro-inflammatory', cytokines, and, preventing, cholesterol, accumulation, in, gallbladder, epithelial, cells])]). relacion([sujeto(['They', also, affect, 'cross-talk', among, the]), verbo([nuclear]), complemento([hormone, receptors, that, regulate, 'cholesterol-bile', acid, metabolism, in, the, nuclei, of, hepatocytes])]). relacion([sujeto(['However,', there, is, controversy, over, whether, or, how, statins, change, the, expression, of, peroxisome, 'proliferator-activated', receptor, '(', 'PPAR)alpha,', 'PPARgamma,', liver, 'X', receptor, alpha, '(', 'LXRalpha),', farnesoid, 'X', receptor, '(', 'FXR),', 'ABCG5,', 'ABCG8,', and, 7, 'alpha-hydroxylase', '(', 'CYP7A1)', which, are, directly]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, the, cholesterol, saturation, index, in, bile])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', cultured, 'Hep3B', 'cells,', pravastatin]), verbo([activated]), complemento(['PPARalpha', and, 'PPARgamma', protein, 'expression,', induced, stronger, expression, of, 'PPARgamma', than, that, of, 'PPARalpha,', increased, mRNA, expression, mediated, by, the, 'PPARgamma', and, 'LXRalpha', 'pathways,', together, or, independently])]). relacion([sujeto(['Our', data]), verbo([suggested]), complemento([that, pravastatin, prevents, cholesterol, gallstone, diseases, via, the, increase, of, 'FXR,', 'LXRalpha', and, 'CYP7A1', in, human, hepatocytes])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', mice, fed, normal, diets, and, given, injections, of, 1, ',', 25, '(', 'OH)2D3,', liver, and, plasma, concentrations, of, 1, ',', 25, '(', 'OH)2D3']), verbo([increased]), complemento([and, decreased, in, unison])]). relacion([sujeto(['Changes', in, hepatic, 'Cyp7a1', messenger, 'RNA', '(', 'mRNA)', correlated, with, those, of, 'Cyp24a1', '(', 'a\240\Vdr']), verbo([target]), complemento(['gene)', and, inversely, with, 'Shp', 'mRNA,', but, not, 'ileal\240\Fgf15', mRNA])]). relacion([sujeto(['Similarly,', incubation, with, 1, ',', 25, '(', 'OH)2D3']), verbo([increased]), complemento([levels, of, 'Cyp24a1/CYP24A1', and, 'Cyp7a1/CYP7A1', mRNA, in, mouse, and, human, 'hepatocytes,', and, reduced, levels, of, 'Shp', mRNA, in, mouse, hepatocytes])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', 'Fxr(-/-)', and, relacion([sujeto(['Truncation', of, the, human, small, heterodimer, partner, '(', 'SHP)', promoter, and, deletion, analyses, revealed, 'VDR-dependent', inhibition, of, 'SHP,', and, mobility, shift, relacion([sujeto(['Activation', of, the, 'VDR']), verbo([represses]), complemento([hepatic, 'SHP', to, increase, levels, of, mouse, and, human, 'CYP7A1', and, reduce, cholesterol])]). relacion([sujeto([')', significantly]), verbo([decreased]), complemento([the, plasma, levels, of, 'non-high-density', lipoprotein, '(', 'non-HDL)', cholesterol, and, apolipoprotein, 'B', in, a, 'dose-dependent', manner])]). relacion([sujeto(['It', also]), verbo([decreased]), complemento([the, mRNA, levels, of, hepatic, small, heterodimer, 'partner-1,', induced, the, mRNA, expression, of, hepatic, cholesterol, 7, 'α-hydroxylase,', reduced, hepatic, cholesterol, and, triglyceride, 'levels,', increased, fecal, bile, acid, 'excretion,', and, upregulated, the, expression, of, hepatic, treatment])]). relacion([sujeto(['Compound-T3', also]), verbo([induced]), complemento([accumulation, of, hepatic, bile, acids, and, decreased, the, mRNA, expression, levels, of, the, hepatic, bile, acid, export, pump])]). relacion([sujeto([')', on, the, plasma, and, hepatic, lipid, parameters, were, similar, to, those, of, 'compound-T3,', and, it]), verbo([increased]), complemento([fecal, bile, acid, levels, without, causing, accumulation, of, hepatic, bile, acids])]). relacion([sujeto(['These', findings]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, 'LDL', 'receptor-mediated', hepatic, 'LDL', incorporation, due, to, cholesterol, catabolism, catalyzed, by, cholesterol, 7, 'α-hydroxylase', decreases, plasma, 'non-HDL', cholesterol, levels])]). relacion([sujeto(['Upregulation', of, hepatic, apolipoprotein, 'A-I', mRNA, expression, may, partially, contribute, to, the]), verbo([increase]), complemento([in, 'HDL', cholesterol, levels, mediated, by, 'compound-T3'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Inflammation', is, a, major, contributor, to, the, development, of, atherosclerotic, 'plaque,', yet, the, involvement, of, liver, and, visceral, adipose, tissue, inflammatory, status, in, atherosclerotic, lesion, development]), verbo([has]), complemento([yet, to, be, fully, elucidated])]). relacion([sujeto(['We', hypothesized, that, an, atherogenic, diet, would]), verbo([increase]), complemento([inflammatory, response, and, lipid, accumulation, in, the, liver, and, gonadal, adipose, tissue, '(', 'GAT)', and, would, correlate, with, systemic, inflammation, and, aortic, lesion, formation, in, 'low-density', lipoprotein, '(', 'LDL)', receptor, null, '(', 'LDLr-/-)', mice])]). relacion([sujeto(['Compared', with, the, control, 'diet,', the, atherogenic, diet, verbo([increased]), complemento([hepatic, tumor, necrosis, factor, α, 'production,', they, were, not, associated, with, aortic, 'TC', content])]). relacion([sujeto(['These', data]), verbo([suggest]), response])]). relacion([sujeto(['Aortic', 'TC', content, was, positively]), verbo([associated]), complemento([with, systemic, inflammation, but, not, hepatic, and, 'GAT', inflammatory, status])]). complemento([the, conversion, of, cholesterol, to, bile, acids, in, 'HepG2', cells])]). relacion([sujeto(['Moreover,', molecular, docking, combined, with, molecular, dynamics, simulation, was, an, antagonist, of, this, receptor])]). relacion([sujeto(['It', is, generally, assumed, that, the, antagonism]), verbo([leads]), complemento([to, induction, of, cytochrome, 'P450', 7, 'A1', '(', complemento([before, levels, of, 'FGF19', levels, 'increased,', and, were, still, reduced, by, 95, '%', 24, hours, after, the, highest, dose, '(', 4.5, 'mg/kg)', of, 'Px-102,', even, though, levels, 'BAs', '(', 'TBAs)', concentration, '(', 'P', &, 'lt;', 0.05, ')', but, increased, 'TBA', concentration, in, the, cecal, digesta, '(', 'P', &, 'lt;', 0.05, ')'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Total', cholesterol, in, the, liver]), verbo([decreased]), complemento([moderately, in, response, to, 'Dex'])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', expression, of, several, genes, in, the, cecal, mucosa, encoding, 'pathway,', thereby, accelerating, fat, synthesis])]). relacion([sujeto(['We']), verbo([provided]), complemento([evidences, that, changes, in, the, gut, microbiota, and, their, metabolites, can, providing, synthesis, in, the, conditions, of, human, life])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', development, and, progression, of, melanoma]), verbo([have]), complemento([been, attributed, to, independent, genetic, alterations])]). relacion([sujeto(['However,', recent, studies]), verbo([have]), complemento([revealed, a, complex, involvement, of, epigenetic, mechanisms, in, the, regulation, of, gene, 0.001, ')', ',', 'UGT1A3', '(', 'P', &, 'lt;', 0.05, ')', ',', and, 'UGT1A6', '(', 'P', &, 'lt;', 0.05, ')', mRNA, levels])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', 'HuH-7', cells, with]), verbo([repressed]), its, pathological, accuracy, but, implementation, of, these, tests, in, clinical, practice, may, be, difficult])]). relacion([sujeto(['Mutated', 'LB-FNAs', were, significantly]), verbo([associated]), complemento([with, malignancy, regardless, of, the, cytological, classification])]). relacion([sujeto(['TERT', promoter, mutation, was, rare, but, very, specific, for, malignancy, '(', 5.5, '%', ')']), verbo([suggesting]), complemento([that, it, could, be, of, interest, in, patients, with, indeterminate, cytology])]). relacion([sujeto(['Here,', we]), verbo([have]), complemento([performed, a, comprehensive, proteomics, experiment, using, 'label-free', quantitative, mass, spectrometry, to, compare, the, proteome, changes, of, wild, type, 'UA159', and, lrgAB, mutant, strains, in, response, complemento([or, newly, induced, in, response, to, a, particular, stress, condition])]). relacion([sujeto([16, ')', ',']), verbo([suggesting]), complemento([that, adaptation, to, a, new, environment, proteins, is, evolutionarily]), verbo([conserved]), complemento([from, yeast, to, humans, and, characterized, by, the, 'proteins\'', 14, or, 15, hnRNP, 'K', homology, '(', 'KH)', 'domains,', typically, associated, with, 'RNA-binding'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Since', its, identification, 30, years, 'ago,', vigilin]), verbo([has]), complemento([been, shown, to, bind, over, 700, mRNAs, and, has, been, associated, with, cancer, progression, and, cardiovascular, disease])]). relacion([sujeto(['We']), verbo([provide]), complemento([a, brief, historic, overview, of, vigilin, research, and, outline, the, 'proteins\'', different, 'functions,', focusing, on, maintenance, of, genome, 'ploidy,', heterochromatin, 'formation,', 'RNA', 'export,', as, well, as, regulation, of, 'translation,', mRNA, 'transport,', and, mRNA, stability])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', multitude, of]), verbo([associated]), complemento([functions, is, reflected, by, the, large, number, of, identified, interaction, 'KH14,', represent, the, main, 'mRNA-binding', interface])]). relacion([sujeto(['Since', the]), verbo([nuclear]), complemento([functions, of, vigilins, in, particular, are, not, 'conserved,', we, verbo([interacts]), complemento([with, 'L1', via, a, late, domain, 'motif,', and, this, interaction, facilitates, 'L1', replication])]). relacion([sujeto(['Loss', of, the, 'L1/ESCRT', interaction, 'muscleblind-like', family, proteins, '(', e])]). relacion([sujeto(['Disruption', of, the, 'CUG', repeats, and, the, 'MBNL1', protein, complex]), verbo([has]), complemento([been, established, as, the, relacion([sujeto(['This', work]), verbo([provides]), complemento([new, computational, approaches, for, rational, 'large-scale', virtual, screens, of, molecules, that, selectively, recognize, 'CUG', structures])]). relacion([sujeto(['Ichthyoses', are, a, clinically, and, genetically, heterogeneous, group, of, genodermatoses]), verbo([associated]), complemento([with, abnormal, scaling, of, the, skin, over, the, whole, body])]). relacion([sujeto(['Mutations', in, nine, genes, are, known, to]), verbo([cause]), complemento(['non-syndromic', forms, of, 'autosomal-recessive', congenital, ichthyosis, '(', 'ARCI)'])]). relacion([sujeto(['However,', not, all, genetic]), verbo([causes]), complemento([for, 'ARCI', have, been, discovered, to, date])]). relacion([sujeto(['Cytosolic', sulfotransferases, form, a, large, family, of, enzymes, that, are]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, the, synthesis, and, metabolism, of, several, steroids, in, humans])]). relacion([sujeto(['We', demonstrated, the]), verbo([loss]), complemento([of, 'SULT2B1', expression, at, 'RNA', and, protein, levels, in, keratinocytes, from, individuals, with, 'ARCI', by, functional, analyses])]). relacion([sujeto(['By', thin, layer, chromatography, '(', 'TLC)', of, extracts, from, these, organotypic, 'cultures,', we, could, show, the, absence, of, cholesterol, 'sulfate,', the, metabolite, of, 'SULT2B1,', and, an]), verbo([increased]), complemento([level, of, 'cholesterol,', indicating, a, disturbed, cholesterol, metabolism, of, the, skin, upon, 'loss-of-function', mutation, in, 'SULT2B1'])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', 'conclusion,', our, study]), verbo([reveals]), complemento([an, essential, role, for, 'SULT2B1', in, the, proper, development, of, healthy, human, skin])]). relacion([sujeto(['Mutation', in, 'SULT2B1']), verbo([leads]), complemento([to, an, 'ARCI', phenotype, via, increased, proliferation, of, human, 'keratinocytes,', thickening, of, epithelial, 'layers,', and, altered, epidermal, cholesterol, metabolism])]). relacion([sujeto(['Several', viruses]), verbo([have]), complemento([been, found, to, encode, a, deubiquitinating, protease, '(', 'DUB)'])]). relacion([sujeto(['These', viral, 'DUBs', are, proposed, to, play, a, role, in]), verbo([regulating]), complemento([innate, immune, or, inflammatory, signaling])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', human, cytomegalovirus, '(', 'HCMV),', the, largest, tegument, protein, encoded, by, 'UL48', contains, 'DUB', 'activity,', but, its, cellular]), verbo([targets]), complemento([are, not, known])]). relacion([sujeto(['Here,', we, show, that, 'UL48', and, 'UL45,', an, 'HCMV-encoded', inactive, homolog, of, cellular, ribonucleotide, reductase, '(', 'RNR)', large, subunit, '(', 'R1),']), times, of, infection])]). relacion([sujeto(['Although', 'UL45', alone, did, not, affect, 'RIP1', 'ubiquitination,', it, could]), verbo([enhance]), complemento([the, 'UL48', activity, to, cleave, 'RIP1', polyubiquitin, chains])]). relacion([sujeto(['Moreover,', 'UL45']), verbo([promoted]), complemento([the, 'UL48-RIP1', interaction, and, 're-localization', of, 'RIP1', to, the, 'UL48-containing', virion, assembly, complex])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', mouse, cytomegalovirus, '(', 'MCMV)-encoded', 'DUB,', 'M48,']), verbo([interacted]), complemento([with, mouse, 'RIP1', and, complemento(['RIP1', and, cooperatively, inhibit, 'RIP1-mediated', 'NF-κB', signaling, at, the, late, stages, of, 'HCMV', infection])]). relacion([sujeto(['Recent', evidence, indicates, that, 'E2F1', transcription, factor]), verbo([have]), complemento([pivotal, roles, in, the, regulation, of, cellular, 'processes,', and, is, found, to, be, dysregulated, in, a, variety, of, cancers])]). cows, with, subclinical, endometritis, compared, to, healthy, cows])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', 'conclusion,', relative, mRNA, expression, of, 'TNF,', 'IL1B', and, 'CXCL8', and, plasma, concentration, of, 'LBP']), verbo([increased]), complemento([during, inflammatory, condition, along, with, decreased, endocannabinoids, hydrolyzing, enzyme, '(', 'NAAA', and, 'FAAH),', increased, enzymes, that, synthesize, endocannabinoids, '(', 'NAPEPLD)', and, relative, gene, expression, of, the, endocannabinoid, 'receptor;', 'together,', these, contribute, to, increased, endocannabinoids, levels, during, increased, mRNA, expression, of, 'CNR2', and, synthesis, enzyme, and, decreased, mRNA, expression, of, hydrolyzing, enzymes, interfere, with, 'pro-cytokine', production, and, 'signalling,', which, may, interfere, with, the, onset, and, progression, of, inflammation])]). relacion([sujeto(['For', two, of, these, three, groups, '(', 'DOK1/2/3', and, 'DOK4/5/6),', further, gene, duplications, occurred, in, vertebrates, and, so, while, chordates, only]), verbo([have]), complemento([three, 'DOK', 'genes,', vertebrates, have, seven, 'DOK', genes, over, the, three, groups])]). relacion([sujeto(['From', our, expression, analysis, in, 'humans,', we, show, that, each, group, of, 'DOK', genes]), verbo([has]), complemento([a, distinct, pattern, of, expression])]). cells])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', 'DOK4/5/6', and, 'DOK7', groups, represent, genes, that, are, much, less]), verbo([expressed]), complemento([in, immune, system, than, the, 'DOK1/2/3', group])]). relacion([sujeto(['Amino', acid, alignments, and, homology, modeling]), verbo([suggested]), complemento([the, existence, of, three, distinct, 'RNA-binding', domains, and, two, auxiliary, domains])]). 'full-length', human, 'GRSF1', a]), verbo([binding]), complemento([constant, '(', 'KD-value)', of, 0.5, μM, was, determined])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', 'addition,', our, mechanistic, experiments, with, different, truncation, mutants, allowed, the, following, 'conclusions:', 'i)', 'Deletion', of, either, of, the, three, 'RNA-binding', domains, impaired, the, 'RNA-binding', affinity]), subunit, may, not, be]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, 'RNA', interaction])]). relacion([sujeto(['iii)', 'Deletion', of, the, acidic, auxiliary, domain, improved, the, 'RNA-binding']), 'RNA', cleavage, and, polyadenylation])]). relacion([sujeto(['Interferon-induced', transmembrane, proteins, '(', 'IFITMs)', are, restriction, factors, that]), verbo([inhibit]), complemento([the, in]), verbo([modulating]), complemento([the, entry, of, five, 'HCoVs'])]). relacion([sujeto(['We']), verbo([found]), complemento([that, three, distinct, mutations, in, 'IFITM1', or, 'IFITM3', converted, the, host, restriction, factors, to, enhance, entry, driven, by, the, spike, proteins, of, severe, acute, respiratory, syndrome, coronavirus, '(', 'SARS-CoV)', 'and/or', 'Middle', 'East', or]), verbo([phosphorylated]), complemento(['IFITM3', reduced, its, activity, to, inhibit, the, entry, of, 'HCoV-NL63', and, -, '229E', but, enhanced, the, entry, of, 'SARS-CoV', and, 'MERS-CoV'])]). identification, of, viral, and, host, factors, that, interact, with, those, structural, motifs, of, 'IFITM', proteins, to, differentially, modulate, the, infectious, entry, of, 'HCoVs'])]). analyses, revealed, that, 'AUF1', p45]), verbo([increases]), complemento([the, accessibility, of, defined, nucleotides, within, the, 3, '\'', 'SL', and, 'SLB', 'and,', in, this, 'way,', exposes, both, 'UAR', cyclization, elements])]). relacion([sujeto(['Conversely,', 'AUF1', p45, does, not]), verbo([modulate]), complemento([the, fold, of, 'stem-loop', 'A', '(', 'SLA)', at, the, immediate, genomic, 5, '\'', 'end,', which, is, proposed, to, function, as, a, promoter, of, the, viral, 'RNA-dependent', 'RNA', polymerase, '(', 'RdRp)'])]). relacion([sujeto(['These', findings]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, 'AUF1', 'p45,', by, destabilizing, specific, 'stem-loop', structures, within, the, 5, '\'', and, 3, '\'', ends, of, the, flaviviral, 'genome,', assists, genome, cyclization, and, relacion([sujeto(['The', crystal, structures, of, the, five, proteins]), verbo([have]), complemento([been, 'determined,', a, 'three-dimensional', '(', 3, -, 'D)', model, of, 'PhopRNA', has, been, crystallographic, structures, of, the, proteins, relative, to, their, 'RNA']), verbo([binding]), complemento([sites, in, the, 'PhopRNA', model])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', the, resulting, and, this, response, was, potently]), verbo([suppressed]), complemento([by, the, 'anti-inflammatory', 'AT-RvD1'])]). relacion([sujeto(['N6-methyladenosine', '(', 'm6A)', modifications, in, 'RNAs', on, the, 'structure,', 'maturation,', or, translation, of, 'mRNAs,', such, modifications, can, also, influence, the, fate, of, 'RNAs', via, proteins, termed, '"', 'readers"', that, specifically, recognize, and, bind, modified, nucleotides])]). relacion([sujeto(['Several', 'YTH', 'domain-containing', proteins]), verbo([have]), complemento([been, identified, as, m6A, readers, that, regulate, the, 'splicing,', 'translation,', or, stability, of, specific, mRNAs])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', contrast, to, the, other, 'YTH', 'domain-containing', 'proteins,', 'YTHDC2']), verbo([has]), complemento([several, defined, domains, and, 'here,', we, have, analyzed, the, contribution, of, these, domains, to, the, 'RNA', and, protein, interactions, of, 'YTHDC2'])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', insulin, in, fasted, 'cold-exposed', mice])]). relacion([sujeto(['We', also]), verbo([found]), complemento(['up-regulation', of, peroxisome, 'proliferator-activated', receptor, gamma, coactivator, 1, -, alpha, '(', 'PGC-1α)', in, acute, cold, exposure, with, a, decrease, in, core, body, temperature])]). relacion([sujeto(['RBM3', transcription, and, translation, were]), verbo([activated]), complemento([2, h, after, cold, exposure])]). relacion([sujeto(['Liver', glycogen, was, depleted, after, 2, h, of, cold, 'exposure,', and, blood, glucose]), verbo([decreased]), complemento([after, 4, h])]). relacion([sujeto(['Glycogen', synthase, kinase, 3, β, '(', 'GSK3β)', phosphorylation, continued, to]), verbo([increase]), complemento([to, promote, hepatic, glycogen, synthesis])]). complemento([accumulation, of, glycogen, intermediates, 'fructose-1,6-diphosphate', '(', 'FDP)', and, pyruvic, acid, '(', 'PA)'])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', 'summary,', the, liver]), exposure, damage])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', p38, 'mitogen-activated', protein, kinases, '(', 'MAPKs)', are, evolutionally]), verbo([conserved]), complemento([from, yeasts, to, 'mammals,', and, are, of, 'TDP-43', or, 'TDP-43tRRM)'])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', the, 'A', 'form,', protein, molecules]), verbo([have]), complemento([restricted, dynamics, of, surface, 'side-chain', residues, but, 'native-like', secondary, structure])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', 'A', form, is, metastable, and, swiftly, aggregates, into, a, highly, stable, 'amyloid-like', protofibrillar, form, '(', β, 'form)']), plant, 'CSDPs', with, 'RNA', is, determined, by, 'CSD'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Influenza', 'A', virus, '(', 'IAV)', and, human, respiratory, syncytial, virus, '(', 'RSV)', both, infect, the, tissues, two, 'IAV', subtypes, in, both, primary, and, transformed, human, lung, cells])]). relacion([sujeto(['One', of, these, 'hits,', 'RNA']), verbo([binding]), complemento([motif, 14, '(', 'RBM14),', was, validated, as, a, required, host, factor, and, furthermore, was, shown, to, relocalize, to, the, nucleolus, upon, 'IAV', infection, but, not, with, other, viruses])]). relacion([sujeto(['Additionally,', the, 'IAV', 'NS1', protein, is, both, necessary, and, sufficient, for, 'RBM14', 'relocalization,', and, relocalization, also]), verbo([requires]), complemento([the, 'double-stranded', 'RNA', '(', 'dsRNA)', binding, capacity, of, 'NS1'])]). relacion([sujeto(['This', work]), verbo([reports]), complemento([the, discovery, of, a, new, host, requirement, for, 'IAV', replication, and, exposes, a, novel, example, of, interplay, between, 'IAV', 'NS1', and, the, host, 'protein,', 'RBM14'])]). relacion([sujeto(['There', are, high, economic, costs]), verbo([associated]), complemento([with, morbidity, as, well, as, significant, mortality, 'rates,', especially, in, developing, 'countries,', in, 'children,', and, in, the, elderly])]). relacion([sujeto(['There', are, currently, limited, therapeutic, options, for, these, 'viruses,', which, underscores, the, need, for, novel, research, into, virus, biology, that, may]), verbo([lead]), complemento([to, the, discovery, of, new, therapeutic, approaches])]). relacion([sujeto(['This', work, extends, existing, research, into, host, factors]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, virus, replication, and, explores, the, interaction, between, 'IAV', and, one, such, host, 'factor,', 'RBM14'])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', antifungal, agent, 6, -, aminocholestanol]), verbo([targets]), complemento([the, production, of, 'ergosterol,', which, is, the, principle, sterol, in, many, fungi, and, 'protozoans;', ergosterol, serves, many, of, the, same, roles, as, cholesterol, in, animals])]). relacion([sujeto(['We']), verbo([found]), complemento([that, it, also, is, an, effective, inhibitor, of, the, 'translation-initiation', factor, eIF4AI, from, mouse, '(', 'eIF4AIMus)', and, the, 'Trypanosomatid', parasite, 'Leishmania', '(', 'LieIF4A)'])]). relacion([sujeto(['DEAD-box', proteins, contain, a, 'commonly-shared', core, structure, consisting, of, two, linked, domains, with, structural, homology, to, that, of, recombinant, protein, 'A', '(', 'RecA)', and, that, contain]), verbo([conserved]), complemento([motifs, that, are, involved, in, 'RNA', and, 'ATP', were, probably, involved])]). relacion([sujeto(['Competition', experiments, with, the, individual, 'RecA-like', domains, indicate, that, the, primary]), verbo([binding]), complemento([sites, are, on, 'RecA-like', domain, 1, ',', and, they, include, a, cavity, that, we, previously, identified, by, molecular, modeling, of, 'LieIF4A', that, involve, conserved, 'RNA-binding', motifs])]). same])]). relacion([sujeto(['Thus,', it, is, possible, to, develop, drugs, that]), verbo([target]), complemento(['DEAD-box', proteins, from, different, organisms, even, when, they, are, implicated, in, the, same, biological, process])]). relacion([sujeto(['Although', it]), verbo([has]), complemento([been, validated, to, target, oncogenic, genes, such, as, signal, transducer, and, activator, of, transcription, 3, ',', forkhead, box, 'Q1,', and, 'Slug,', the, mechanistic, link, between, 'miR‑124', and, potential, target, genes, that, contribute, to, tumor, 'progression,', is, yet, to, be, the, 'skin,', and, the, immune, system, is, unable, to, control, its, 'spread,', leading, to, a, massive, hyperinfestation, with, a, simultaneous, inflammatory, and, hyperkeratotic, reaction])]). ',', with, an, adjacent, 193, kb, copy]), verbo([gain]), complemento([entirely, within, 1, p36])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', 'addition,', chromosome, 4, had, a, 906, kb]), verbo([gain]), verbo([found]), complemento([in, our, patient, has, never, been, previously, reported])]). relacion([sujeto(['We', reviewed, and, compared, the, 'clinical,', 'genotyping,', and, gene, microarray, in, this, patient])]). relacion([sujeto(['Thus,', disturbing, cholesterol, trafficking, is, an, effective, approach, for]), verbo([inhibiting]), complemento([angiogenesis])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', this, 'study,', we]), verbo([found]), complemento([that, 'AST', induced, cholesterol, accumulation, in, the, lysosome, by, binding, to, the, 'sterol-sensing', domain, of, 'Niemann-Pick', 'disease,', complemento([to, the, depletion, of, membrane, 'cholesterol,', causing, 'SREBP1', nuclear, localization])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', depletion, of, membrane, cholesterol, resulted, in, dissociation, of, mammalian]), verbo([target]), complemento([of, rapamycin, '(', 'mTOR)', from, the, lysosomal, surface, and, inactivation, of, mTOR, signaling])]). relacion([sujeto(['AST']), verbo([inhibited]), complemento([zebrafish, angiogenesis, in, a, 'cholesterol-dependent', manner])]). relacion([sujeto(['Together,', our, data]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, 'AST', is, a, new, class, of, 'NPC1', antagonist, that, inhibits, cholesterol, trafficking, in, endothelial, cells, and, angiogenesis])]). relacion([sujeto(['Disease-specific', therapy, is, crucial, to]), verbo([prevent]), complemento([disease, 'progression;', 'however,', diagnosing, 'NPC', is, quite, difficult, because, of, remarkably, variable, clinical, presentations])]). relacion([sujeto(['Here,', we]), indistinguishable, from, dystonia, and, 'schizophrenia,', respectively])]). relacion([sujeto(['Hypercholesterolaemia']), verbo([has]), complemento([been, implicated, in, the, pathogenesis, of, neurodegenerative, diseases])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', this, 'work,', we, tested, whether, 'cholesterol-mediated', neurodegeneration]), verbo([induced]), complemento([either, by, 'cholesterol-rich', cholesterol, levels])]). relacion([sujeto(['Our', findings]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, 'preventing/reducing', mitochondrial, oxidative, stress, may, represent, a, common, approach, against, neurodegenerative, diseases])]). relacion([sujeto(['Niemann-Pick', type, 'C2', '(', 'NPC2)', is, a, lysosome, luminal, protein, that, functions, in, concert, with, 'NPC1', to]), direct, binding, to, its, promoter, region])]). relacion([sujeto(['Collectively,', these, data, identify, a, regulatory, role, for, the, 'non-canonical', 'NF-κB', pathway, in, intracellular, is, a, lysosomal, storage, disorder]), verbo([caused]), complemento([by, mutations, in, either, 'NPC-1', or, 'NPC-2', 'genes,', resulting, in, abnormal, intracellular, cholesterol, trafficking])]). relacion([sujeto(['Lung', involvement]), verbo([has]), complemento([been, described, in, only, few, patients, with, 'NPC,', mostly, 'NPC2'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Seven', patients, were]), verbo([reported]), complemento([of, having, interstitial, disease, by, various, imaging, modalities])]). relacion([sujeto(['It', can]), verbo([lead]), complemento([to, respiratory, insufficiency, and, death, from, respiratory, failure])]). relacion([sujeto(['What', is, 'Known:', '•', 'Lung', involvement]), verbo([has]), complemento([been, described, in, only, few, patients, with, 'NPC'])]). and, fluidity, and, are, being, increasingly]), verbo([recognized]), complemento([to, influence, immune, responses])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', an, intricate, pathway]), verbo([involving]), complemento([the, lysosomal, cholesterol, transporter, 'NPC1,', the, sterol, gets, unequally, distributed, across, intracellular, compartments])]). relacion([sujeto(['By', using, pharmacological, and, genetic, approaches]), verbo([targeting]), complemento(['NPC1,', we, reveal, that, blockade, of, cholesterol, trafficking, through, the, late, 'endosome-lysosome', pathway, blunts, 'NLRP3',
