the, 'ER', but, not, the, 'PM'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Together,', this, study]), verbo([reveals]), complemento(['ER', sterol, levels, as, a, metabolic, rheostat, for, the, activation, of, the, 'NLRP3', inflammasome])]). relacion([sujeto(['Transport', begins, when, cholesterol]), verbo([binds]), complemento([to, the, 'N-terminal', domain, '(', 'NTD)', of, 'NPC1,', which, projects, to, the, surface, of, the, glycocalyx])]). relacion([sujeto(['Here,', we, reconstitute, cholesterol, transport, by]), verbo([expressing]), complemento([the, 'NTD', as, a, fragment, separate, from, the, remaining, portion, of, 'NPC1'])]). relacion([sujeto(['When', 'co-expressed,', the, two, 'NPC1', fragments, reconstitute, cholesterol, 'transport,', indicating, that, the, 'NTD']), verbo([has]), complemento([the, flexibility, to, interact, with, the, remaining, parts, of, 'NPC1', even, when, not, covalently, linked])]). relacion([sujeto(['Niemann-Pick', disease, type, 'C', '(', 'NPC)', is, a, neurovisceral, disorder]), verbo([associated]), complemento([with, the, accumulation, of, lipids, such, as, cholesterol, and, sphingolipids])]). relacion([sujeto(['NPC', is]), verbo([caused]), complemento([by, either, 'NPC1', or, 'NPC2,', which, encode, lysosomal, proteins, located, at, membraneous, and, soluble, 'fractions,', respectively])]). relacion([sujeto(['For', the, past, 'decade,', the, oxidation, products, of, 'cholesterol,', such, as, 'cholestane-3β,5α,6β-triol', and, 7, -, 'ketocholesterol,']), verbo([have]), complemento([been, considered, selective, biomarkers, for, 'NPC'])]). relacion([sujeto(['However,', recent, evidence]), verbo([has]), complemento([indicated, numerous, novel, biomarkers, for, 'NPC,', which, raises, the, possibility, that, the, diagnosis, of, 'NPC', might, be, associated, with, the, elevation, of, multiple, lipid, 'biomarkers,', rather, than, a, single, biomarker])]). relacion([sujeto(['Sphingosylphosphorylcholine', '(', 'SPC)']), verbo([has]), complemento([been, suggested, to, be, one, such, biomarker, for, 'NPC,', in, which, elevated, sphingomyelin, is, a, potential, precursor])]). relacion([sujeto(['We', further, extended, the, study, to, plasma, 'lysophingomyelin-509', for, 'NPC,', a, newly]), verbo([reported]), complemento([biomarker, with, uncharacterized, chemical, nature])]). relacion([sujeto(['Furthermore,', the, efficacy, of, plasma, 'SPC', and, 'lysosphingomyelin-509', as, promising, biomarkers, for, this, disorder, was, supported, by, the]), verbo([finding]), complemento([that, the, urinary, concentration, of, 3, 'β-sulfooxy-7β-N-acetylglucosaminyl-5-cholen-24-oic', 'acid,', an, established, biomarker, for, 'NPC,', was, also, elevated, in, the, 'NPC-affected', individuals])]). relacion([sujeto(['These', results]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, a, novel, combination, of, plasma, 'biomarkers,', such, as, 'SPC', 'and/or', 'lysophingomyelin-509,', and, urinary, bile, acid, metabolite, could, offer, a, promising, platform, for, the, diagnosis, of, 'NPC'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Niemann-Pick', 'C1', '(', 'NPC1),', a, host, receptor]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, the, envelope, glycoprotein, '(', 'GP)-mediated', entry, of, filoviruses, into, 'cells,', is, believed, to, be, a, major, determinant, of, cell, susceptibility, to, filovirus, infection])]). relacion([sujeto(['It', is, known, that, proteolytically, digested, 'Ebola', virus, '(', 'EBOV)', 'GP']), verbo([interacts]), complemento([with, 2, protruding, loops, in, domain, 'C', of, 'NPC1'])]). relacion([sujeto(['To', investigate, whether, these, 'SNPs', affect, cell, susceptibility, to, filovirus, 'infection,', we, generated, 'Vero', 'E6', cell, lines, stably]), verbo([expressing]), complemento(['NPC1', with, of, the, viruses])]). relacion([sujeto(['Our', data]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, human, 'NPC1', 'SNPs', may, likely, affect, host, susceptibility, to, filoviruses])]). relacion([sujeto(['Whereas', deficient, 'HH', signalling]), verbo([leads]), complemento([to, birth, 'defects,', unrestrained, 'HH', signalling, is, implicated, in, human, 'cancers2,4-6'])]). relacion([sujeto(['N-terminally', palmitoylated, 'HH']), verbo([releases]), complemento([the, repression, of, 'Patched', to, the, oncoprotein, smoothened, '(', 'SMO);', 'however,', the, mechanism, by, which, 'HH', recognizes, 'Patched', is, unclear])]). relacion([sujeto(['Here', we]), verbo([report]), complemento(['cryo-electron', microscopy, structures, of, human, patched, 1, '(', 'PTCH1)', alone, and, in, complex, with, the, 'N-terminal', domain, of, '\'', 'native\'', sonic, hedgehog, '(', native, 'SHH-N', has, both, a, 'C-terminal', cholesterol, and, an, 'N-terminal', 'fatty-acid', 'modification),', at, resolutions, of, 3.5, '\240\Å', and, 3.8, '\240\Å,', respectively])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', structure, of, 'PTCH1']), verbo([has]), complemento([internal, 'two-fold', pseudosymmetry, in, the, transmembrane, 'core,', which, features, a, 'sterol-sensing', domain, and, two, homologous, extracellular, 'domains,', resembling, the, architecture, of, 'Niemann-Pick', 'C1', '(', 'NPC1)', protein7])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', palmitoylated, 'N', terminus, of, 'SHH-N', inserts, into, a, cavity, between, the, extracellular, domains, of, 'PTCH1', and, dominates, the, 'PTCH1-SHH-N', 'interface,', which, is, distinct, from, that]), verbo([reported]), complemento([for, 'SHH-N', 'co-receptors8'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Our', biochemical, assays, show, that, 'SHH-N', may, use, another, 'interface,', one, that, is]), verbo([required]), complemento([for, its, 'co-receptor', 'binding,', to, recruit, 'PTCH1', in, the, absence, of, a, covalently, attached, palmitate])]). relacion([sujeto(['Our', work]), verbo([provides]), complemento([atomic, insights, into, the, recognition, of, the, 'N-terminal', domain, of, 'HH', '(', 'HH-N)', by, 'PTCH1,', offers, a, structural, basis, for, cooperative, binding, of, 'HH-N', to, various, receptors, and, serves, as, a, molecular, framework, for, 'HH', signalling, and, its, malfunction, in, disease])]). relacion([sujeto(['We']), verbo([have]), complemento([previously, reported, an, enhanced, processing, of, 'β-amyloid', precursor, protein, '(', 'APP)', by, 'β-secretase', '(', 'BACE1),', a, key, complemento([with, 'NPC,', and, 10, -, weeks, of, age, to, identify, changes, at, terminal, disease, stage])]). relacion([sujeto(['While', an]), verbo([enhanced]), complemento(['BACE1-cleavage', of, all, three, substrates, was, detected, in, 'NPC1', vs])]). relacion([sujeto(['wt-mouse', brains, at, 4, -, weeks, of, 'age,', at, 10, -, weeks]), verbo([increased]), complemento([proteolysis, by, 'BACE1', was, observed, for, 'Sez6L', in, the, 'cortex,', hippocampus, and, cerebellum, of, 'NPC1-mice'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Interestingly,', both, 'APP', and, 'Sez6L', were]), verbo([found]), complemento([to, be, expressed, in, 'Purkinje', neurons, and, their, immunostaining, was, lost, upon, 'Purkinje', cell, neurodegeneration, in, 10, -, weeks, old, 'NPC1', mice])]). as, increased, 'Sez6L', and, 'BACE1-positive', puncta])]). relacion([sujeto(['This', indicates, that, a, trafficking, defect, within, the, endolysosomal, pathway, may, play, a, key, role, in]), verbo([enhanced]), complemento(['BACE1-proteolysis', in, 'NPC', disease])]). relacion([sujeto(['Overall,', our, findings]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, enhanced, proteolysis, by, 'BACE1', could, be, a, part, of, 'NPC', disease, pathogenesis])]). relacion([sujeto(['Niemann-Pick', type, 'C1', '(', 'NPC1)', disease, is, a, lysosomal, storage, disorder]), verbo([caused]), complemento([by, mutation, of, 'Npc1', or, 'Npc2', 'gene,', resulting, in, various, progressive, pathological, features])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', this, 'study,', we, showed, that, the, expression, of, myelin, genes, and, proteins, is, strongly]), verbo([inhibited]), complemento([from, postnatal, day, 35, onwards, including, reduced, myelin, basic, protein, '(', 'MBP)', expression, in, the, brain])]). mouse, brain])]). relacion([sujeto(['NP-C', is, transmitted, in, an, autosomal, recessive, manner, and, is]), verbo([caused]), complemento([by, mutations, in, either, the, 'NPC1', '(', 95, '%', of, 'families)', or, 'NPC2', gene])]). relacion([sujeto(['Variants', of, adenosine, triphosphatase, '(', 'ATPase)', subunit, 6, and, 'ATPase', subunit, 8, '(', 'ATPase6/8)', in, mitochondrial, 'DNA', '(', 1, :, 100, ',', 0, and, the, rarity, of, the, disease, translate, into, 'misdiagnosis,', delayed, diagnosis, and, barriers, to, good, care])]). relacion([sujeto(['For', these, 'reasons,', we]), relacion([sujeto(['Together,', these, data, support, feasibility, of, 'tolerable,', chronic, administration, of, an, 'HDACi', formulation, that, treats, murine, 'NPC', neurological, disease, and, lung, 'pathology,', a, frequent]), verbo([cause]), complemento([of, death, in, this, and, possibly, additional, disorders])]). relacion([sujeto(['Recent', studies, showed, that, atherosclerosis, is, a, lysosomal, storage, disease, '(', 'LSD)', and, 'Niemann-Pick', disease, type, 'C1', '(', 'NPC1)', is, the, most, important, protein, of, the, lysosomal, membrane, that, is]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, the, removal, of, 'FC', from, lysosomes])]). relacion([sujeto(['Whereas', several, in, vitro, and, in, vivo, studies]), verbo([have]), complemento([described, the, crosstalk, between, lysosomal, cholesterol, accumulation, and, increased, 'inflammation,', there, is, no, study, addressing, the, correlation, between, 'NPC1', gene, expression, and, an, 'anti-inflammatory', 'cytokine,', verbo([loss]), complemento([of, cerebellar, 'Purkinje', cells, '(', 'PCs)'])]). relacion([sujeto(['We', observed, differences, in, the, firing, patterns, of, 'NPC1+/+and', 'NPC1-/-mice,']), 'NPC1'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Extensive', 'laboratory,', 'radiographic,', and]), verbo([targeted]), complemento([genetic, studies, over, the, course, of, several, years, failed, to, yield, a, content, in, the, 'RBC', membrane, but]), verbo([increase]), complemento([osmotic, resistance])]). relacion([sujeto(['We']), verbo([have]), complemento([tested, the, efficacy, of, characterized, by, defective, intracellular, transport, of, cholesterol, and, 'glycosphingolipids,', leading, to, neuron, loss, and, myelin, aberration, in, the, central, nervous, system])]). 'sham-treated', 'Npc1-/-', mice])]). relacion([sujeto(['Compared', to, control, 'mice,', 'however,', the, 'VNE', of, 'Npc1-/-', mice, displays, an]), verbo([increased]), complemento([neuroregenerative, 'potential,', indicating, compensatory, cell, renewal])]). relacion([sujeto(['Receptor', 'Interacting', 'Protein', 'Kinase', 1, and, 3, '(', 'RIPK1', and, 'RIPK3),', are, protein, kinases, that, play, a, central, role, in]), verbo([mediating]), complemento([neuronal, necroptosis])]). relacion([sujeto(['Our', prior, work]), verbo([suggested]), complemento([that, pharmacological, inhibition, of, 'RIPK1', had, a, significant, but, modest, beneficial, 'effect;', 'however,', the, inhibitors, used, in, that, study, had, suboptimal, pharmacokinetic, properties])]). 'monotherapy,', is, limited])]). relacion([sujeto(['We', thus, investigated, the, potential, of, combining, 'RIPK1', inhibition, with, 2, -, 'hydroxypropyl-β-cyclodextrin', '(', 'HPβCD)', therapy, 'HPβCD']), verbo([has]), complemento([been, shown, to, slow, neurological, disease, progression, in, 'NPC1', 'mice,', cats, and, patients])]). relacion([sujeto(['HPβCD', appeared, to]), verbo([have]), complemento([an, additive, positive, effect, on, the, pathology, and, survival, of, 'Npc1-/-:Ripk1kd/kd', mice])]). relacion([sujeto(['RIPK1', and, 'RIPK3', are, both, critical, components, of, the, in, neuroinflammation, and, cytokine, production])]). relacion([sujeto(['Recent', data]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, the, molecular, background, of, this, disease, is, more, complex])]). complemento([early, migration, of, encephalitogenic, 'T\240\cells', into, the, 'CNS', in, a, transfer, 'EAE', model])]). relacion([sujeto(['Human', 'Th17', cells, do, also]), verbo([express]), '(', 'ALV-J)', infection, can]), verbo([cause]), complemento([tumors, and, immunosuppression])]). relacion([sujeto(['Using', 'co-immunoprecipitation', '(', 'co-IP),', we, next, demonstrate, that, the, envelope, protein, of, ev21, does, not]), verbo([interact]), complemento([with, the, 'M180', envelope, protein])]). relacion([sujeto(['We', further, show, that, the, envelope, protein, of, ev21, cannot]), verbo([activate]), complemento(['ALV-J', 'LTR', promoter, activity, using, 'luciferase-reporter', assays])]). relacion([sujeto(['This', is, the, first]), verbo([report]), complemento([of, interaction, among, the, endogenous, retrovirus, 'ev21,', 'ALV-J', and, the, 'late-feathering', chicken])]). relacion([sujeto(['Porcine', reproductive, and, respiratory, syndrome, '(', 'PRRS)', is, a, severe, respiratory, disease, that]), verbo([leads]), complemento([to, huge, economic, losses, in, the, pig, industry, throughout, the, world])]). relacion([sujeto(['Therefore,', new, control, strategies, to]), verbo([prevent]), complemento(['PRRS', virus, '(', 'PRRSV)', infection, are, urgently, required])]). relacion([sujeto(['We']), verbo([have]), complemento([previously, reported, that, complemento([that, 25, 'HC', with, a, low, 'IC50', value, significantly, decreased, the, replication, of, different, 'PRRSV', 'strains,', and, increased, the, production, of, 'IL-1β', and, 'IL-8', in, porcine, primary, alveolar, macrophages, and, the, lung, tissue])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', pigs, challenged, with, highly, pathogenic, 'PRRSV,', treatment, with, 25, 'HC', was]), verbo([associated]), complemento([with, an, obvious, reduction, in, the, level, of, viremia, and, viral, load, in, lung, samples, and, nasal, 'swabs,', as, well, as, decreased, lung, injury, and, an, increased, survival, rate])]). relacion([sujeto(['These', findings]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, 25, 'HC', could, be, a, promising, antiviral, drug, against, 'PRRSV', in, the, future])]). relacion([sujeto(['It', is, not, clear, how, hepatitis, 'B', virus, '(', 'HBV)']), verbo([modulates]), complemento([host, immunity, during, chronic, infection])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', addition, to, be]), verbo([associated]), complemento([with, metabolic, 'disorders,', direct, evidence, for, this, is, 'lacking,', and, the, role, of, cholesterol, metabolism, in, the, pathogenesis, of, deficiency, is, a, rare, monogenic, disorder]), verbo([causing]), complemento([lipoprotein, dysregulation, and, multiple, organ, 'dysfunctions,', including, renal, impairment])]). relacion([sujeto(['LCAT', knockout, mice]), verbo([have]), complemento([been, shown, informative, in, elucidating, mechanisms, of, many, major, clinical, morbid, phenotypes])]). relacion([sujeto(['Extended', characterization, of, the, 'LDL', 'receptor/LCAT', double, knockout, '(', 'Ldlr/Lcat-DKO', or, 'DKO)', mice, had]), verbo([led]), complemento([to, the, discovery, of, a, complemento([by, 'LCAT', deficiency, synergizes, with, cell, cholesterol, depletion, to, induce, satellite, 'cell-to-BAT', transdifferentiation])]). relacion([sujeto(['Metabolic', phenotyping, of, 'NR0B2)', is, an, unusual, orphan]), verbo([nuclear]), complemento([receptor, that, lacks, a, conventional, 'DNA-binding', domain, and, acts, as, a, modulator, of, transcriptional, activities, of, a, number, of, nuclear, receptors])]). relacion([sujeto(['Herein,', we]), verbo([report]), complemento([that, the, human, 'SHP', promoter, '(', 'hSHP)', is, activated, by, sterol, regulatory, 'element-binding', 'protein-1', '(', 'SREBP-1),', which, regulates, the, expression, of, various, genes, involved, in, cholesterol, and, fatty, acid, synthesis])]). relacion([sujeto(['Overexpression', of, 'SREBP-1']), verbo([activated]), complemento([the, human, but, not, mouse, 'SHP', 'promoter,', although, 'SREBP-2', had, little, effect, on, the, 'SHP', promoter, in, 'CV-1', cells])]). relacion([sujeto(['DNase', 'I', 'footprinting,', gel, shift, 'assays,', and, chromatin, immunoprecipitation, assays, demonstrated, that, 'SREBP-1']), verbo([binds]), complemento([directly, to, the, hSHP, promoter])]). relacion([sujeto(['Site-directed', mutagenesis, made, it, clear, that, the, hSHP, promoter, activation, by, 'SREBP-1', is, mostly]), verbo([mediated]), complemento([by, the, overexpression, of, 'SREBP-1c/ADD-1']), verbo([induced]), complemento(['SHP', mRNA, expression, and, repressed, 'CYP7A1', expression, in, 'HepG2', cells])]). relacion([sujeto(['Finally,', we]), verbo([found]), complemento([that, a, 'four-nucleotide', deletion, '(', -, 195, 'CT-GAdel)', in, the, hSHP, 'promoter,', which, is, reported, to, be, associated, with, altered, body, weight, and, insulin, secretion, in, 'human,', coincides, with, the, 'SRE1'])]). relacion([sujeto(['This', mutation, strongly]), verbo([decreased]), complemento([both, basal, and, 'SREBP-1', dependent, activities, of, the, hSHP, 'promoter,', because, of, the, reduced, binding, of, 'SREBP-1', to, the, mutated, 'SRE1'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Small', heterodimer, partner, '(', 'SHP;', 'NR0B2)', is, an, atypical, orphan]), verbo([nuclear]), complemento([receptor, that, lacks, a, conventional, 'DNA', binding, domain, '(', 'DBD)', and, represses, the, transcriptional, activity, of, various, nuclear, receptors])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', vitro, and, in, vivo, protein, interaction, studies, showed, that, 'SHP', physically]), verbo([interacts]), complemento([with, 'BETA2/NeuroD,', but, not, its, heterodimer, partner, 'E47'])]). relacion([sujeto(['SHP']), verbo([inhibited]), complemento(['BETA2/NeuroD-dependent', transactivation, of, an, 'E-box', 'reporter,', whereas, 'SHP', was, unable, to, repress, the, 'E47-mediated', transactivation, and, the, 'E-box', mutant, reporter, activity])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', 'addition,', 'SHP']), verbo([repressed]), complemento([the, 'BETA2-dependent', activity, of, glucokinase, and, 'cyclin-dependent', kinase, inhibitor, p21, gene, promoters])]). relacion([sujeto(['Gel', shift, and, in, vitro, protein, competition, assays, indicated, that, 'SHP']), verbo([inhibits]), complemento([neither, dimerization, nor, 'DNA', binding, of, 'BETA2', and, 'E47'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Rather,', 'SHP', directly]), verbo([repressed]), complemento(['BETA2', transcriptional, activity, and, 'p300-enhanced', 'BETA2/NeuroD', transcriptional, activity, by, inhibiting, interaction, between, 'BETA2', and, coactivator, p300])]). relacion([sujeto(['We', also, showed, that, 'C-terminal', repression, domain, within, 'SHP', is, also]), verbo([required]), complemento([for, 'BETA2', repression])]). relacion([sujeto(['However,', inhibition, of, 'BETA2', activity, was, not, observed, by, naturally, occurring, human, 'SHP', mutants, that, cannot]), verbo([interact]), complemento([with, 'BETA2/NeuroD'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Taken', 'together,', these, results]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, 'SHP', acts, as, a, novel, corepressor, for, basic, 'helix-loop-helix', transcription, factor, 'BETA2/NeuroD', by, competing, with, coactivator, p300, for, binding, to, 'BETA2/NeuroD', and, by, its, direct, transcriptional, repression, function])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', orphan]), verbo([nuclear]), complemento([receptor, small, heterodimer, partner, '(', 'SHP;', 'NR0B2)', is, an, unusual, orphan, nuclear, receptor, that, lacks, a, conventional, 'DNA-binding', domain, and, acts, as, a, modulator, of, transcriptional, activities, of, a, number, of, nuclear, receptors])]). relacion([sujeto(['We']), verbo([have]), complemento([previously, reported, that, the, orphan, nuclear, receptor, 'ERRgamma', activates, the, 'SHP', promoter])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', this, 'study,', we]), verbo([have]), complemento([found, that, basic, 'helix-loop-helix', '(', 'bHLH)', transcription, 'factors,', the, 'E2A', proteins, '(', 'E47,', 'E12', and, 'E2/5),', activated, the, human, but, not, the, mouse, 'SHP', promoter])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', 'contrast,', the, 'tissue-specific', 'E47', heterodimer, partner, 'BETA2']), verbo([repressed]), complemento([the, 'E47-', mediated, transactivation, of, the, human, 'SHP', '(', 'hSHP)', promoter])]). relacion([sujeto(['Using', serial, deletions, and, 'E-box', mutant, constructs, of, the, hSHP, 'promoter,', we, identified, two, 'E-boxes', '(', 'E6', and, 'E7)', as, 'E47-responsive', 'E-boxes,', which, are, not]), verbo([conserved]), complemento([in, the, mouse, 'SHP', promoter])]). relacion([sujeto(['Moreover,', gel, 'shift,', chromatin, immunoprecipitation, '(', 'ChIP)', and, northern, blot, assays, demonstrated, that, 'E47', directly]), verbo([binds]), complemento([to, the, hSHP, promoter, in, vivo, and, in, vitro, and, that, 'Id', proteins, inhibited, 'E47', binding, to, the, hSHP, promoter])]). relacion([sujeto(['Finally,', we]), verbo([found]), complemento([that, 'E47', and, steroidogenic, factor, 1, '(', 'SF-1),', a, regulator, of, the, 'SHP', 'promoter,', synergistically, activate, the, human, but, not, the, mouse, 'SHP', promoter])]). relacion([sujeto(['Our', findings]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, the, 'E2A', proteins, differentially, regulate, the, human, and, mouse, 'SHP', promoters, and, cooperate, with, orphan, nuclear, receptor, 'SF-1', for, transcriptional, activation, of, the, hSHP, promoter])]). relacion([sujeto(['We', identified, significant, loci]), verbo([associated]), complemento([with, gallstone, weight, on, chromosomes, 10, and, 4, ',', named, 'Lith7', and, 'Lith8,', respectively, '(', both, susceptibility, alleles, conferred, by, strain, 'I/LnJ)'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Positional', candidate, genes, with, higher, expression, in, 'I/LnJ', mice, are, 'Fxr', '(', official, 'symbol,', 'Nr1h4),', encoding, the]), verbo([nuclear]), complemento([bile, salt, 'receptor,', on, chromosome, 10, and, 'Shp1', '(', official, 'symbol,', 'Nr0b2),', encoding, the, small, heterodimer, partner, 1, ',', on, chromosome, 4])]). relacion([sujeto(['A', significant, locus]), verbo([associated]), complemento([with, gallstone, score, on, chromosome, 17, ',', named, 'Lith9', '(', susceptibility, allele, conferred, by, strain, 'PERA/Ei),', colocalizes, with, the, genes, 'Abcg5', and, 'Abcg8', that, encode, the, canalicular, cholesterol, transporter])]). relacion([sujeto(['Our', findings]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([a, primary, role, of, the, nuclear, bile, salt, receptor, 'FXR', and, the, canalicular, cholesterol, transporter, 'ABCG5/ABCG8', in, the, genetic, susceptibility, and, pathogenesis, of, cholesterol, cholelithiasis, in, these, strains, of, inbred, mice])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', bile, 'acid-activated', farnesoid, 'X', receptor, '(', 'FXR)', is, a]), verbo([nuclear]), complemento([receptor, regulating, bile, 'acid,', glucose, and, cholesterol, homeostasis])]). relacion([sujeto(['Obeticholic', acid, '(', 'OCA),', a, promising, drug, for, the, treatment, of, 'non-alcoholic', steatohepatitis, '(', 'NASH)', and, type, 2, 'diabetes,']), verbo([activates]), complemento(['FXR'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Transcriptomic', analysis, showed, that, 'well-known', 'FXR']), verbo([target]), complemento(['genes,', including, 'NR0B2', '(', 'SHP),', 'ABCB11', '(', 'BSEP),', 'SLC51A', '(', 'OSTα)', and, 'SLC51B', '(', 'OSTβ),', and, 'ABCB4', '(', 'MDR3)', are, regulated, by, 'OCA', in, hPCLS])]). relacion([sujeto(['ChIP-sequencing', in, mouse, liver, confirmed, 'FXR']), verbo([binding]), complemento([to, 'IR1', sequences, of, 'Akap13,', 'Cgnl1,', 'Dyrk3,', 'Pdia5,', 'Ppp1r3b', and, 'Tbx6'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Our', study, shows, that, hPCLS]), verbo([respond]), complemento([to, 'OCA', treatment, by, upregulating, 'well-known', 'FXR', target, 'genes,', demonstrating, its, suitability, to, study, 'FXR-mediated', gene, regulation])]). n, =, 348, ')', ',', their, parents, '(', n, =, 272, ')', ',', or, young, nondiabetic, adults, '(', n, =, 925, ')'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Our', study]), verbo([suggests]), complemento([that, genetic, variation, in, 'SHP', is, unlikely, to, be, common, in, the, predisposition, to, 'diabetes,', 'obesity,', or, increased, birth, weight, in, 'U'])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', small, heterodimer, partner, 'SHP', '(', 'NR0B2)', is, an, unusual]), verbo([nuclear]), complemento([receptor, that, lacks, the, typical, 'DNA', binding, domain, common, to, most, nuclear, receptors])]). relacion([sujeto(['SHP']), verbo([has]), complemento([been, reported, to, act, as, a, corepressor, for, several, nuclear, 'receptors,', but, its, exact, mechanism, of, action, is, still, elusive])]). relacion([sujeto(['Here', we, show, that, 'SHP', can]), verbo([interact]), complemento([with, the, liver, 'X', receptors, 'LXRalpha', '(', 'NR1H3)', and, 'LXRbeta', '(', 'NR1H2),', as, demonstrated, verbo([inhibits]), complemento([the, expression, of, an, artificial, reporter, driven, by, an, 'LXR-response', element, and, represses, the, transcriptional, activation, by, 'LXR', of, the, human, receptor, and, subsequently, induce, 'SHP,', leads, to, the, repression, of, the, human, 'ABCG1', 'gene,', an, established, 'LXR', target, gene])]). relacion([sujeto(['These', results, demonstrate, that, 'SHP', is, able, to]), verbo([interact]), complemento([with, 'LXR', and, to, modulate, its, transcriptional, activity])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', orphan]), verbo([nuclear]), complemento([receptor, small, heterodimer, partner, '(', 'SHP;', 'NR0B2)', interacts, with, a, wide, array, of, nuclear, receptors, and, represses, their, transcriptional, activity])]). relacion([sujeto(['SHP', expression, is]), verbo([regulated]), complemento([by, several, other, members, of, the, nuclear, receptor, 'superfamily,', including, the, orphan, receptors, 'SF-1', and, 'LRH-1,', and, the, bile, acid, receptor, 'FXR'])]). relacion([sujeto(['We']), verbo([have]), complemento([found, that, the, 'SHP', promoter, is, also, activated, by, the, estrogen, 'receptor-related', receptor, gamma, '(', 'ERRgamma)', but, not, the, related, 'ERRalpha', and, 'ERRbeta', isoforms])]). relacion([sujeto(['ERRgamma', transactivation, is, dependent, on, only, one, of, five, previously, characterized, 'DNA-binding', sites, for, 'SF-1,', and, this, element, differs, from, previously]), verbo([reported]), complemento(['ERR', response, elements])]). relacion([sujeto(['However,', treatment, with, the, histone, deacetylase, inhibitor, trichostatin, 'A', significantly]), verbo([increased]), complemento(['ERRalpha', and, 'ERRbeta', activity, on, this, element, indicating, that, the, lack, of, activity, of, 'ERRalpha', and, -, beta, may, depend, on, their, association, with, 'co-repressor', in, vivo])]). relacion([sujeto(['Furthermore,', using, protease, sensitivity, assays, on, 'DNA']), verbo([bound]), complemento([receptors, it, was, demonstrated, that, 'DNA', sequence, of, different, response, elements, may, cause, allosteric, modulation, of, 'ERR', 'proteins,', which, in, turn, may, be, responsible, for, the, differential, activities, of, these, receptors, on, different, response, elements])]). relacion([sujeto(['SHP']), verbo([inhibits]), complemento(['ERRgamma', transactivation, and, physically, interacts, with, all, three, members, of, 'ERR', 'subfamily,', as, demonstrated, by, both, yeast, 'two-hybrid', and, biochemical, assays])]). relacion([sujeto(['Several', recently, described, 'SHP', mutations]), verbo([associated]), complemento([with, moderate, obesity, in, humans, block, the, inhibition, of, 'ERRgamma', activity])]). relacion([sujeto(['Small', heterodimer, partner, '(', 'SHP,', 'NR0B2)', is, an, atypical, orphan]), verbo([nuclear]), complemento([receptor, that, inhibits, transcriptional, activation, by, several, other, nuclear, receptors])]). relacion([sujeto(['We', recently]), verbo([reported]), complemento([that, mutations, in, the, 'SHP', gene, are, associated, with, insulin, complemento([significant, associations, of, some, 'HLA', alleles, with, specific, cADRs, to, 'CBZ', and, 'PHT', in, 'North', 'Indians,', which, may, need, to, be, tested, before, 'AED-initiation;', '(', 'gain-of-new-function)', mutations, in, miRNAs, due, to, nucleotide, substitutions, have, not, been, reported])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', 'chondrocytes,', the, mutation]), verbo([causes]), that, endoplasmic, reticulum, '(', 'ER)', stress, plays, an, important, role, in, the, pathogenesis, of, 'Parkinson\'s', disease, '(', 'PD)'])]). relacion([sujeto(['However,', our, group, observed, complemento([with, 'MAVS', but, not, 'TBK1', by, immunoprecipitation, and, colocalized, with, 'MAVS'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Accordingly,', we, investigated, whether, 'BinCARD2', was]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, 'MAVS', activation, and, showed, that, siBinCARD2, did, not, affect, 'RIG-I/MAVS', binding, but, impaired, the, 'MAVS', oligomerization])]). relacion([sujeto(['Moreover,', we, infected, 'A549 cells', with, vesicular, stomatitis, virus, '(', 'VSV)', and]), verbo([found]), complemento([that, induction, of, 'IFN-β', and, 'IL-6', mRNA, after, 'VSV', infection, was, decreased, by, 'BinCARD2', knockdown])]). relacion([sujeto(['Thus,', these, data, may]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, 'BinCARD2', associates, with, 'MAVS', to, positively, modulate, the, oligomerization, in, the, 'RIG-I', like, receptors, pathway, and, activates, innate, immune, response])]). relacion([sujeto(['Transcriptomes', consist, of, several, classes, of, 'RNA', that]), verbo([have]), complemento(['wide-ranging', but, often, poorly, described, functions, and, the, deregulation, of, which, leads, to, numerous, diseases])]). 'Gag,']), verbo([found]), complemento([in, all, 'retroviruses,', is, a, polyprotein, comprising, three, major, functional, 'domains:', matrix, '(', 'MA),', capsid, '(', 'CA),', and, nucleocapsid, '(', '(', 'Ty),', the, classical, infective, 'stage,']), verbo([interact]), complemento([with, the, extracellular, matrix, '(', 'ECM),', an, obligatory, step, before, invasion, of, almost, all, mammalian, 'HSV-1-LXMW)', in, 'China', and]), verbo([found]), complemento(['it\'s', closely, related, to, 'HSV-1', strains, 'Patton', and, 'H129', in, the, 'US', by, the, first, and, next, generation, 'DNA', sequencing, viral, 'DNA', phylogenetic, analysis])]). relacion([sujeto(['Using', a, weight, 'matrix-based', program, 'Match,', we]), verbo([found]), complemento([the, 'UL54', transcription, strain])]). relacion([sujeto(['Further', validation, showed, that, 'HSV-1', and, 'HSV-2', shared, the, common, sequence]), verbo([binding]), complemento([to, 'Oct-1,', but, had, unique, sequences, to, complemento([in, the, manuscript, are, not, affected, by, figure, replacement])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', correct, version, of, this, figure, panel, appears, in, the, 'Author', 'Correction']), verbo([associated]), complemento([with, this, 'Article'])]). relacion([sujeto(['We']), verbo([have]), complemento([developed, a, homogeneous, 'time-resolved', fluorescence, '(', 'HTRF)-based', enzyme, transfer, '(', 'FRET)'])]). relacion([sujeto(['UV', crosslinking, and, immunoprecipitation, '(', 'CLIP)', coupled, with, 'high-throughput', sequencing, is, the, most, 'state-of-the-art', technology, relacion([sujeto(['Therefore,', the, small, tag, size, and, convenient, protocol, of, 'SpyCLIP']), verbo([provides]), complemento([a, robust, method, for, both, routine, characterization, and, 'high-throughput', studies, of, 'protein-RNA', interactions])]). relacion([sujeto(['Glycogen', storage, disease, 'type-Ia', '(', 'GSD-Ia),']), verbo([caused]), complemento([by, a, deficiency, in, are]), verbo([increased]), complemento([in, 'H/R-treated', cardiomyocytes, and, 'ischemia/reperfusion', '(', 'I/R)-treated', mice, heart])]). relacion([sujeto(['We']), verbo([found]), involved, in, the, development, process])]). relacion([sujeto(['Here,', we]), verbo([found]), complemento([that, the, deletion, of, m6A, '"', 'writer"', protein, 'methyltransferase-like', '(', -, 'Me-7,8-PDH2)', was]), verbo([found]), complemento([to, be, more, unstable, in, neutral, solution, than, 6, -, 'Me-7,8-PH2'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Whereas', quinoid, 6, -, methyldihydropterin, was]), verbo([found]), complemento([to, tautomerize, to, 6, -, 'Me-7,8-PH2', in, 95, '%', yield, in, 0.1, 'M', 'tris(hydroxymethyl)aminomethane', hydrochloride, '(', 'Tris-HCl),', pH, 7.4, ',', quinoid, 6, -, 'Me-PDH2', gives, only, 53, '%', 6, -, 'Me-7,8-PDH2,', the, remainder, decomposing, via, an, initial, opening, of, the, diazepine, ring])]). relacion([sujeto(['A', small, '(', 2, '%', ')', yield, of, 6, -, 'Me-PDH4', is]), verbo([found]), complemento([if, the, unstable, 'C4a-carbinolamine', intermediate, is, trapped, by, enzymatic, dehydration, and, reduction])]). relacion([sujeto(['These', cofactors, would, theoretically, form, the, same, oxide, of, quinoid, divicine, if, oxygen, activation]), verbo([involves]), complemento([a, carbonyl, oxide, intermediate])]). relacion([sujeto(['Tryptophan', '(', 'Trp),', as, the, precursor, of, 'serotonin,']), verbo([has]), complemento([been, introduced, in, the, treatment, of, depression, and, 'isomnia,', but, its, clinical, effectiveness, must, be, considered, with, caution])]). relacion([sujeto(['On', the, other, 'hand,', mainly, animal, studies, demonstrate, numerous, regulatory, 'processes,', the, importance, of, which]), verbo([has]), complemento([been, underestimated, until, today])]). relacion([sujeto(['It', is, proposed, that, the, different, steps]), verbo([leading]), verbo([decreased]), complemento([in, the, 'PFC'])]). relacion([sujeto(['We', did, not]), verbo([find]), complemento([any, changes, in, the, 'HIPPO', of, any, of, the, 'CRF', components, we, studied])]). relacion([sujeto(['When', we, compared, the, protein, expression, of, 'CRF', components, we]), verbo([found]), complemento([that, 'CRF', was, significantly, increased, and, 'CRF-R1,', 'CRF-R2', and, 'CRF-BP', significantly, decreased, in, the, 'PFC'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Our', results, in, the, postmortem, brain]), verbo([suggest]), complemento(['that,', as, found, by, clinical, studies, in, the, 'CSF,', there, are, significant, alterations, of, 'CRF', and, its, receptors, in, the, postmortem, brain, of, teenage, suicide, subjects])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', welding, process]), verbo([releases]), complemento([potentially, hazardous, gases, and, 'fumes,', mainly, composed, of, metallic, 'oxides,', fluorides, and, silicates])]). relacion([sujeto(['Long', term, system, diseases, '(', 'RSDs)'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Aside', from, general, airway, 'irritation,', 'WF', exposure, may, drive, direct, cellular, responses, in, the, respiratory, system, which]), verbo([increase]), complemento([risk, of, 'RSD,', but, these, are, not, well, understood])]). relacion([sujeto(['We', observed, many, genes, with, altered, expression, in, 'WF-exposed', tissues, were, also, among, differentially]), verbo([expressed]), complemento([genes, '(', 'DEGs)', in, 'RSD', 'tissues;', for, 'CB,', 'AS,', 'PE', and, 'LC', there, were, 34, ',', 27, ',', 50, and, 26, genes, respectively])]). relacion([sujeto(['DEG', 'analysis,', using, disease, association, 'networks,', 'pathways,', ontological, analysis, and, 'protein-protein', interaction, 'sub-network']), system, in, plants, and, their, tolerance, to, oxidative, stress])]). relacion([sujeto(['After', 14, days, of, 'growth,', the, presence, of, 'GLY']), verbo([led]), complemento([to, a, significant, apoptotic, 'regulators,', responsible, for]), verbo([inhibiting]), complemento([the, permeabilization, of, the, mitochondrial, outer, 'membrane,', and, a, promising, 'anti-cancer', target])]). relacion([sujeto(['Bcl-xL', exists, in, the, following, 'conformations,', each, believed, to, play, a, role, in, the, inhibition, of, 'apoptosis:', '(', 'a)', a, soluble, folded, 'conformation,', '(', 'b)', a, 'membrane-anchored', '(', by, its, 'C-terminal', α8, 'helix)', 'form,', which]), verbo([retains]), complemento([the, same, fold, as, in, solution, and, '(', 'c)', refolded, 'membrane-inserted', 'conformations,', for, which, no, structural, data, are, available])]). relacion([sujeto(['This', insertion, disrupts, the, packing, of, 'Bcl-xL', and]), verbo([releases]), complemento([the, regulatory, 'N-terminal', 'BH4', domain, '(', 'a1)', from, the, rest, of, the, protein, structure])]). relacion([sujeto(['Our', data, demonstrate, that, both, insertion, and, refolding, of, 'Bcl-xL', are]), verbo([modulated]), complemento([by, lipid, composition])]). relacion([sujeto(['We', hypothesize, that, conformational, rearrangements]), verbo([associated]), complemento([with, the, bilayer, insertion, of, 'Bcl-xL', result, in, its, switching, to, a, 'so-called', 'non-canonical', mode, of, apoptotic, inhibition])]). relacion([sujeto(['Presented', results]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, the, alteration, in, lipid, composition, before, and, during, apoptosis, can, serve, as, an, additional, factor, regulating, the, permeabilization, of, the, mitochondrial, outer, membrane])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', dynamic, variability, of, transcription, factors, '(', 'TFs)', and, their]), verbo([binding]), complemento([sites, makes, it, complemento([flux, was, reduced, from, 13.5, '\240\+\240\0'])]). relacion([sujeto(['This']), verbo([suggests]), complemento([that, a, significant, fraction, of, the, 'DHPRs', that, remained, 'functional,', could, not, activate, 'RyRs,', and, were, therefore, presumably, disconnected])]). relacion([sujeto(['These', results, are, broadly, consistent, with, the, original]), verbo([reports]), complemento([in, skinned, fibers])]). relacion([sujeto(['Uncoupling', was]), verbo([prevented]), complemento([by, the, addition, to, the, intracellular, solution, of, the, protease, inhibitor, leupeptin])]). relacion([sujeto(['This']), verbo([loss]), complemento([of, control, by, membrane, voltage, suggests, that, the, uncoupled, release, channels, might, have, another, mechanism, of, 'activation,', likely, by, 'Ca2+'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Malignant', hyperthermia, '(', 'MH)', is, a, pharmacogenetic, disorder, that]), verbo([has]), complemento([been, linked, to, the, skeletal, subunit, plays, a, key, role, in, skeletal, muscle, 'excitation-contraction', coupling, by, sensing, membrane, voltage, changes, and, then]), verbo([triggering]), complemento([intracellular, calcium, release])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', cytoplasmic, loops, connecting, four, homologous, α1S, structural, domains]), verbo([have]), complemento([diverse, 'functions,', but, their, structural, complemento([similarly, to, α1S, 'These', results, provide, new, insights, into, the, role, of, 'muscle-specific', proteins, on, the, structural, arrangement, of, α1S, intracellular, loops, and, verbo([release]), complemento(['channel,', 'respectively,', have, been, established, for, nearly, 25, 'years,', the, mechanism, underlying, communication, between, these, two, channels, remains, undefined])]). relacion([sujeto(['Schwann', cells, are, integral, components, of, vertebrate, neuromuscular, 'synapses;', in, their, 'absence,', 'pre-synaptic', nerve, terminals, withdraw, from, complemento([been, identified, as, a, myopathy, disease, gene, and, as, an, additional, essential, 'EC', coupling, component])]). relacion([sujeto(['STAC3']), verbo([interacts]), complemento([with, 'here,', we]), verbo([provide]), complemento([evidence, that, endogenous, 'STAC3', incorporates, into, triads, in, the, absence, of, the, 'DHPR', in, myotubes, and, muscle, fibers, of, dysgenic, mice])]). relacion([sujeto(['This']), verbo([finding]), complemento([demonstrates, that, 'STAC3', interacts, with, additional, triad, proteins, and, is, consistent, with, its, proposed, role, in, directly, or, indirectly, linking, the, 'DHPR', with, the, 'RyR1'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Our', understanding, of, 'ECC']), verbo([has]), complemento([increased, enormously, since, the, early, scientific, descriptions, of, the, phenomenon, of, electrical, activation, of, muscle, contraction, by, 'Galvani', that, date, back, to, the, end, of, the, eighteenth, century])]). relacion([sujeto(['Major', advances, in, electrical, and, optical, 'measurements,', including, muscle, fiber, voltage, clamp, to]), verbo([reveal]), complemento([membrane, electrical, 'properties,', in, conjunction, with, the, development, of, electron, microscopy, to, unveil, structural, details, provided, an, elegant, view, of, 'ECC', in, skeletal, muscle, during, the, last, century])]). 'ECC', in, skeletal, muscle])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', present, review, throws, light, upon, the, calcium, flux]), verbo([regulating]), complemento([signaling, channels, like, ryanodine, receptor, complex, '(', 'RyR1),', 'SERCA', '(', 'Sarco-endoplasmic', 'Reticulum', 'Calcium', 'ATPase),', 'DHPR', '(', 'Dihydropyridine', 'Receptor)', or, 'Cav1'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Understanding', these, pathways, will, further]), verbo([provide]), complemento([an, insight, for, establishing, new, therapeutic, approaches, for, the, prevention, and, treatment, of, muscle, atrophy, under, stress, 'conditions,', targeting, calcium, ion, channels, and, associated, regulatory, proteins])]). relacion([sujeto(['Patients', suffering, from, type, 1, hypokalaemic, periodic, paralysis, '(', 'HypoPP1)', experience, attacks, of, muscle, paralysis]), verbo([associated]), complemento([with, hypokalaemia])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', disease, arises, from, missense, mutations, in, the, gene, encoding, the, 'α1\240\subunit', of, the, dihydropyridine, receptor, '(', 'DHPR),', a, protein, complex, anchored, in, the, tubular, membrane, of, skeletal, muscle, fibres, which, controls, the]), verbo([release]), complemento([of, 'Ca2+', from, sarcoplasmic, reticulum, and, also, functions, as, a, 'Ca2+', channel])]). relacion([sujeto(['Early', studies]), verbo([have]), complemento([shown, that, muscle, fibres, from, 'HypoPP1', patients, are, abnormally, depolarized, at, rest, in, low, 'K+', to, the, point, of, inducing, muscle, inexcitability])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', relationship, between, 'HypoPP1', mutations, and, depolarization]), verbo([has]), complemento([long, remained, unknown])]). relacion([sujeto(['More', recent, investigations, conducted, in, the, closely, structurally, related, 'voltage-gated', 'Na+', and, 'K+', channels]), verbo([have]), complemento([shown, that, comparable, 'S4', arginine, substitutions, gave, rise, to, elevated, inward, currents, at, negative, potentials, called, gating, pore, currents])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', mouse, fibres, transfected, with, 'HypoPP1', mutated, 'channels,', the, elevated, resting, current, was]), verbo([found]), complemento([to, carry, 'H+', for, the, 'R1239H', 'arginine-to-histidine', mutation, in, a, 'S4', segment, and, 'Na+', for, the, 'V876E', 'HypoPP1', 'mutation,', which, has, the, peculiarity, of, not, being, located, in, 'S4', segments])]). relacion([sujeto(['Muscle', paralysis, probably, results, from, the, presence, of, a, gating, pore, current]), verbo([associated]), complemento([with, hypokalaemia, for, both, 'mutations,', possibly, aggravated, by, external, acidosis, for, the, 'R1239H', mutation])]). relacion([sujeto(['It']), verbo([has]), complemento([been, shown, that, calpains, are, involved, in, the, proteolysis, of, muscle, proteins, that, occurs, with, eccentric, contraction, '(', 'ECC)', and, that, exogenously, applied, nitric, oxide, decreases, the, 'calpain-mediated', proteolysis])]). relacion([sujeto(['Whole', muscle, analyses, '(', the, first, 'experiment)', revealed, that, 'ARG', attenuated, 'ECC-induced', force, deficit, and, autolysis, of, 'calpain-1,', and]), verbo([increased]), complemento([the, amounts, of, 'S-nitrosylated', 'calpain-1'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Regarding', ryanodine, receptor, '(', 'RyR)', and, dihydropyridine, 'UPR,', a, hallmark, of, chronic, liver, disease])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', relationship, between, bile, acids, and, hepatocytic, autophagy, is, less, clear, but, may]), verbo([involve]), complemento([altered, gene, expression, pathways])]). relacion([sujeto(['Based', on, previous, findings, that, bile, duct, ligation, '(', 'BDL)']), verbo([induces]), complemento(['autophagy,', we, hypothesized, that, retained, bile, acids, may, have, hepatoprotective, effects, in, 'PiZZ', transgenic, 'mice,', which, model, 'A1ATD'])]). relacion([sujeto(['PiZZ', liver, subjected, to, 'BDL', showed, up, to, 50, '%', clearance, of, 'ATZ', 'globules,', with]), verbo([increased]), complemento([expression, of, autophagy, proteins])]). relacion([sujeto(['Surprisingly']), verbo([nuclear]), complemento(['TFEB,', a, master, regulator, of, 'autophagy,', remained, unchanged])]). relacion([sujeto([pBDL, confirmed, that, 'ATZ', globule, clearance, was]), verbo([induced]), complemento([by, localized, stimuli, rather, than, diet, or, systemic, effects])]). relacion([sujeto(['Several', genes]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, bile, metabolism, were, overexpressed, in, 'globule-devoid', 'hepatocytes,', compared, to, 'globule-containing', cells])]). relacion([sujeto(['Retained', bile, acids]), verbo([led]), complemento([to, a, dramatic, reduction, of, 'ATZ', 'globules,', with, enhanced, hepatocyte, regeneration, and, autophagy])]). relacion([sujeto(['Recent', investigations]), verbo([have]), complemento([reported, many, markers, associated, with, human, liver, 'stem/progenitor', 'cells,', '"', oval, 'cells,"', and, identified, '"', 'niches"', in, diseased, livers, where, stem, cells, occur])]). relacion([sujeto(['However,', there]), verbo([has]), complemento([remained, a, need, to, identify, entire, lineages, of, stem, cells, as, they, differentiate, into, bile, ducts, or, hepatocytes])]). relacion([sujeto(['We']), verbo([have]), complemento([used, combined, immunohistochemical, staining, for, a, marker, of, hepatic, commitment, and, specification, '(', 'FOXA2', '[', 'Forkhead', box, 'A2]),', hepatocyte, maturation, '(', 'Albumin', and, 'HepPar1),', and, features, of, bile, ducts, '(', 'CK19', '[', cytokeratin, 19, ']', ')', to, identify, lineages, of, stem, cells, differentiating, toward, the, hepatocytic, or, bile, ductular, compartments, of, 'end-stage', cirrhotic, human, liver])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', beneficial, impact, of, mesenchymal, stem, cells, '(', 'MSC)', on, both, acute, and, chronic, liver, diseases]), verbo([has]), complemento([been, 'confirmed,', although, the, molecular, mechanisms, behind, it, remain, elusive])]). relacion([sujeto(['We', aim, to, identify, factors, secreted, by, 'differentiation,', 'CD54', '(', intercellular, adhesion, molecule, 1, ',', 'ICAM-1)']), verbo([increased]), complemento([and, 'CD166', '(', activated, leukocyte, cell, adhesion, 'molecule,', 'ALCAM)', decreased])]). relacion([sujeto(['These', comprised, cytokines]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, innate, immunity, and, growth, factors, regulating, liver, regeneration])]). regeneration])]). relacion([sujeto(['We']), verbo([have]), complemento([performed, a, screening, for, medicinal, foods, that, inhibit, hepatocytic, lipid, accumulation, through, activation, of, 'AMP-activated', protein, kinase, '(', 'AMPK),', which, is, a, critical, regulator, of, the, hepatic, lipid, metabolism])]). relacion([sujeto(['We']), verbo([found]), complemento([that, clove, '(', 'Syzygium', 'aromaticum),', which, is, commonly, used, as, a, 'spice,', markedly, inhibits, 'palmitate-inducible', lipid, accumulation, in, human, 'HepG2', hepatocytes])]). relacion([sujeto(['Analyses', of, the, clove, extracts]), verbo([found]), complemento([that, 'β-caryophyllene,', an, 'orally-active', 'cannabinoid,', is, the, principal, suppressor, of, the, lipid, 'accumulation,', and, stimulates, the, phosphorylation, of, 'AMPK', and, 'acetyl-CoA', carboxylase, 1, '(', 'ACC1)'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Our', data, also, showed, that, 'β-caryophyllene']), verbo([prevents]), complemento([the, translocation, of, sterol, regulatory, 'element-binding', 'protein-1c', '(', 'SREBP-1c)', into, the, nucleus, and, forkhead, box, protein, 'O1', '(', 'FoxO1)', complemento([by, the, cannabinoid, type, 2, 'receptor-dependent', 'Ca2+', signaling, pathway])]). relacion([sujeto(['Our', results]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, 'β-caryophyllene', has, the, compared, to, 'HepG2', and, 'HuH7', cells])]). relacion([sujeto(['ACT']), verbo([prevented]), complemento(['DEN-induced', cytotoxicity, '(', p, &, 'lt;', 0.001, ')', ',', 'DNA', 'damage,', and, genotoxicity, '(', micronuclei, 'test,', 'DNA', ladder, 'test,', 'Hoechst', 'staining,', cell, cycle, 'analysis)'])]). relacion([sujeto(['ACT', significantly, '(', p, &, 'lt;', 0.001, ')', scavenged, complemento([great, potential, to, produce, 'albumin(+)', hepatocytes])]). relacion([sujeto(['GRHL2']), verbo([suppresses]), complemento([transcription, of, miR122, and, thereby, restricts, the, differentiation, potential, of, adult, 'LPCs'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Rodent', cancer, bioassays, indicate, that, the, aryl, hydrocarbon, receptor, '(', 'AHR)', 'agonist,', 2, ',', 3, ',', 7, ',', 8, -, 'tetracholorodibenzo-p-dioxin', '(', 'TCDD),']), verbo([causes]), complemento([increases, in, both, hepatocytic, and, cholangiocytic, tumors])]). relacion([sujeto(['Effects', of, 'AHR', complemento([important, potential, for, therapeutic, 'strategies,', including, bioengineered, liver, approaches])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', cAMP, responsive, transcription, factor, cAMP, responsive, 'loxP/loxP)', mice, with, 'Cre', recombinase, expression, 'adeno-associated', virus])]). relacion([sujeto(['Strikingly,', we]), verbo([found]), complemento([no, difference, in, fed, and, fasted, glucose, 'levels,', or, in, 'glucose,', insulin, and, glucagon, tolerance, in, mice, fed, a, normal, chow, or, a, 'high-fat', diet])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', 'addition,', mRNA, levels, of, 'levels,', 'PPAR-α,', 'CREBH,', and, 'CPT1', 'expression,', and, suppressed, 'FAS', expression, '(', 'p<0'])]). relacion([sujeto(['CONCLUSIONS', 'Sitagliptin', can, protect, liver, tissue, and]), 'db/db\240\mice', by]), verbo([inhibiting]), complemento([lipogenesis, and, augmenting, fatty, acid, oxidation])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', aryl, hydrocarbon, receptor, '(', 'AhR)', is, now]), verbo([recognized]), complemento([as, an, important, physiological, regulator, in, the, immune, and, reproductive, 'systems,', and, in, the, development, of, the, liver, and, vascular, system])]). complemento([modes])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', dramatic, repositioning, is, influenced, by, a, differential, ability, to, establish, stable, 'face-to-face', 'π-π-stacking', with, the, 'LRH-1', a]), verbo([lead]), complemento([compound, that, conjugates, with, remarkably, 'high-efficiency', to, a, native, cysteine, residue, '(', 'Cys346)', lining, the, hydrophobic, cavity, in, the, ligand, 'cells,', beginning, as, early, as, 3, h, after, drug, treatment])]). relacion([sujeto(['These', data, show, that, 'PME8', and, 'PME9', are, potent, activators, of, 'hLRH-1', and]), verbo([suggest]), verbo([repressed]), complemento([expression, of, the, 'B-lymphocyte', chemoattractant, 'CXCL13', and, 'STAT4', as, well, as, induced, 'FGF21', evidenced, amelioration, of, 'steatosis-related', inflammation])]). relacion([sujeto(['Lastly,', 'STRING', network, analysis, highlighted, potential, '"', 'druggable"']), verbo([targets]), complemento([with, 'PLIN2,', 'CIDEC,', and, 'hypoxia-inducible', lipid, 'droplet-associated-protein', being, confirmed, by, immunofluorescence, microscopy])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', 'conclusion,', steatosis, and, steatohepatitis, specific, gene, regulations, informed, on, the, pathogenesis, of, 'NAFLD', to, broaden, the, perspective, of]), verbo([targeted]), complemento([therapies])]). relacion([sujeto(['Here', we, identify, the]), verbo([nuclear]), complemento([receptor, liver, receptor, homolog, 1, '(', 'LRH-1)', as, a, key, regulator, in, the, process, of, hepatic, tumorigenesis, through, the, coordination, of, a, noncanonical, glutamine, pathway, that, is, reliant, on, the, mitochondrial, and, cytosolic, transaminases, glutamate, pyruvate, transaminase, 2, '(', 'GPT2)', and, glutamate, oxaloacetate, transaminase, 1, '(', 'GOT1),', which, fuel, anabolic, metabolism])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', 'particular,', we, show, that]), verbo([gain]), complemento([and, loss, of, function, of, hepatic, 'LRH-1', modulate, the, expression, and, activity, of, mitochondrial, glutaminase, 2, '(', 'GLS2),', the, first, and, 'rate-limiting', step, of, this, pathway])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', robust, reduction, in, glutaminolysis, and, the, limiting, availability, of, 'α-ketoglutarate', in, turn]), verbo([inhibit]), complemento([mTORC1, signaling, to, eventually, block, cell, growth, and, proliferation])]). relacion([sujeto(['Collectively,', these, studies, highlight, the, importance, of, 'LRH-1', in, coordinating, 'glutamine-induced', metabolism, and, signaling, to]), verbo([promote]), complemento([hepatocellular, carcinogenesis])]). relacion([sujeto(['It']), verbo([has]), complemento([been, reported, that, 'Methyl-CpG', binding, protein, 2, '(', 'MeCP2)', had, a, high, expression, in, liver, fibrosis, and, played, a, central, role, in, its, pathobiology])]). relacion([sujeto(['Interestingly,', we]), verbo([found]), complemento([that, a, cryptolepine, derivative, '(', 'HZ-6h)', could, inhibit, liver, fibrosis, by, reducing, 'MeCP2', 'expression,', as, evidenced, by, the, dramatic, downregulation, of, 'α-smooth', muscle, actin, '(', 'α-SMA)', and, type, 'I', collagen, 'alpha-1', '(', 'Col1α1)', in, protein, levels, in, vitro])]). relacion([sujeto(['Meanwhile,', we, also]), verbo([found]), complemento([that, 'HZ-6h', could, reduce, the, cell, viability, and, promote, apoptosis, of, hepatic, stellate, cells, '(', 'HSCs)', treated, with, transforming, growth, factor, beta, 1, '(', 'TGF-β1)'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Then,', we, investigated, 'HZ-6h']), verbo([inhibits]), complemento([liver, fibrosis, by, downregulating, 'MeCP2', through, the, 'Shh', pathway, in, 'TGF-β1-induced', 'HSC-T6', cells])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', asialoglycoprotein, receptor, '(', 'ASGR),', which, is]), verbo([expressed]), complemento([mainly, in, 'hepatocytes,', is, downregulated, in, poorly, differentiated, hepatocellular, carcinoma, '(', 'HCC)'])]). relacion([sujeto(['We']), verbo([found]), complemento([that, 'ASGR1', was, downregulated, in, 'HCC', tissue, compared, with, adjacent, 'non-tumorous', liver, tissue, and, that, lower, 'ASGR1', expression, was, associated, with, higher, 'TNM', stage, and, poorer, prognosis, in, 'HCC', patients])]). relacion([sujeto(['ASGR1', overexpression]), verbo([inhibited]), complemento([hepatoma, cell, migration, and, invasion, in, vitro, and, in, 'vivo,', while, 'ASGR1', knockdown, had, the, opposite, effects])]). relacion([sujeto(['Furthermore,', 'ASGR1']), verbo([interacted]), complemento([directly, with, human, longevity, assurance, homolog, 2, of, yeast, 'LAG1', '(', 'LASS2)'])]). relacion([sujeto(['ASGR1']), verbo([decreased]), complemento(['V-ATPase', activity, in, hepatoma, 'cells,', and, this, was, reversed, by, 'LASS2', knockdown])]). relacion([sujeto(['Thus,', 'ASGR1', may]), verbo([act]), complemento([as, a, potential, metastasis, suppressor, in, 'HCC,', and, the, combination, of, 'ASGR1', and, 'LASS2', may, help, predict, the, prognosis, of, 'HCC', patients])]). relacion([sujeto(['Liver', receptor, 'homolog-1', '(', 'LRH1)']), verbo([has]), complemento([been, shown, to, promote, tumor, proliferation, and, development])]). relacion([sujeto(['However,', the, functions, of, 'LRH1', in]), verbo([mediating]), complemento([cancer, cells, chemoresistance, are, still, not, clear])]). relacion([sujeto(['Here,', we]), verbo([found]), complemento(['LRH1', levels, were, significantly, elevated, in, primary, complemento([in, human, 'NAFLD,', evidence, linking, this, 'phospholipid-bound', nuclear, receptor, to, hepatic, lipid, metabolism, is, lacking])]). relacion([sujeto(['Here,', we]), verbo([report]), that, the, 'SIRT1/AMPK', pathway, is]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, the, functions, of, the, three, 'flavonones,', and, the, most, effective, flavonone, against, hepatic, steatosis, might, be, significantly, lower, risk, of, death, in, the, groups, of, 'female,', tumor, size, &, 'gt;5', cm, in, a, dominant, model])]). relacion([sujeto(['Our', results, represent, the, first, demonstration, the, female, group, and, tumor, size, &, 'gt;5', cm, group, for, 'NR5A2', rs3790843, polymorphism])]). relacion([sujeto(['Liver', receptor, 'homolog-1', '(', 'LRH-1)', is, a]), verbo([nuclear]), complemento([receptor, '(', 'NR)', with, diverse, functions, in, 'development,', differentiation, and, metabolism, and, has, been, extensively, studied, in, the, enterohepatic, system])]). 62, kb, from, its, transcriptional, start, 'sites,', allowing, repression, of, 'CDKN1A', transcription])]). relacion([sujeto(['LRH-1', or, 'FOXA1', depletion]), verbo([induces]), 'LXRα-mediated', 'lipogenesis,', but, not, 'LXRα-stimulated', 'RCT'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Brown', fat]), verbo([activates]), complemento([uncoupled, respiration, in, response, to, cold, temperature, and, contributes, to, systemic, metabolic, homeostasis])]). relacion([sujeto(['To', 'date,', the, metabolic, action, of, brown, fat]), verbo([has]), complemento([been, primarily, attributed, to, its, exists, in, the, human, 'diet,']), verbo([has]), complemento([been, reported, to, have, 'anti-inflammatory', properties])]). relacion([sujeto(['Acute', lung, injury, was]), verbo([induced]), efflux])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', 'conclusion,', 'C3G']), verbo([has]), complemento([a, protective, effect, on, 'LPS-induced', acute, lung, injury])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', promising, 'anti-inflammatory', mechanisms, of, 'C3G', is]), verbo([associated]), complemento([with, 'up-regulation', of, the, 'LXRα-ABCG1', pathway, which, result, in, disrupting, lipid, rafts, by, depleting, showed, significantly]), verbo([decreased]), complemento(['Wnt', expression, accompanied, by, a, decrease, of, cellular, 'beta-catenin', '(', vs, 'WT)'])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', 'mMSC/LXRα/GFP', data, demonstrate, that, 'LXRα']), verbo([has]), complemento([an, inhibitory, effect, on, adipogenic, differentiation, in, mMSCs, with, 'Wnt/beta-catenin', signaling])]). relacion([sujeto(['These', results]), verbo([provide]), complemento([important, insights, into, the, pathophysiology, of, obesity, and, 'obesity-related', consequences, such, as, metabolic, syndrome, and, may, identify, increased, endothelial, function])]). relacion([sujeto(['Our', results, demonstrated, that, allicin]), verbo([enhanced]), complemento(['HUVEC', 'proliferation,', which, was, suppressed, by, 'LPS', and, decreased, the, endogenous, antioxidant, enzyme, activities, in, 'HUVECs'])]). relacion([sujeto(['These', protective, effects, were]), verbo([associated]), complemento([with, the, inhibition, of, mitochondrial, dysfunction, as, indicated, by, decreases, in, the, 'MMP', 'collapse,', cytochrome, c, synthesis, and, mitochondrial, 'ATP', release])]). relacion([sujeto(['Furthermore,', allicin]), verbo([increased]), complemento([the, expression, of, 'LXRα', in, a, 'dose-dependent', manner])]). relacion([sujeto(['Allicin-induced', attenuation, of, inflammation, was]), verbo([inhibited]), complemento([by, 'LXRα', siRNA, treatment])]). relacion([sujeto(['Finally,', allicin]), verbo([activated]), complemento(['NF-E2-related', factor, 2, '(', 'Nrf2),', which, controls, the, defense, against, oxidative, stress, and, inflammation])]). relacion([sujeto(['Taken', 'together,', the, present, data]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, allicin, attenuated, the, 'LPS-induced', vascular, injury, 'process,', which, may, be, closely, related, to, the, oxidative, stress, and, inflammatory, response, in, 'HUVECs'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Allicin']), verbo([modulated]), complemento(['Nrf2', activation, and, protected, the, cells, against, 'LPS-induced', vascular, injury])]). relacion([sujeto(['Our', findings]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, allicin, attenuated, the, 'LPS-induced', inflammatory, response, in, blood, vessels])]). relacion([sujeto(['THP‑1', cells, were, exposed, to, 100, '\240\nM', phorbol, myristate, 'acetate\240\(PMA)', for, 24, '\240\h,', and, then, to, oxydized, 'low-density', 'lipoprotein\240\(ox-LDL;', 50, '\240\mg/ml)', to]), verbo([induce]), complemento([foam, cell, formation])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', results, of, 'Oil\240\Red\240\O', 'ATP']), verbo([binding]), complemento([cassette, 'transporter\240\A1\240\(ABCA1)', expression, and, promoted, cholesterol, efflux])]). relacion([sujeto(['However,', these, effects, were, significantly, abolished, by, transfection, with, siRNA]), verbo([targeting]), complemento(['ABCA1'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Furthermore,', 'PPARγ/LXRα', signaling, was]), verbo([activated]), complemento([by, allicin, treatment])]). relacion([sujeto(['Overall,', our, data, demonstrate, that, the, 'allicin-induced', upregulation, of, 'ABCA1']), verbo([promotes]), complemento([cholesterol, efflux, and, reduces, lipid, accumulation, via, 'PPARγ/LXRα', signaling, in, 'THP‑1', 'macrophage-derived', foam, cells])]). relacion([sujeto(['Nuclear', receptors, '(', 'NRs)', are, a, class, of, transcription, factors, that]), verbo([regulate]), complemento([many, cellular, functions, through, manipulation, of, gene, expression, and, also, play, important, roles, in, 'tumorigenesis,', complemento([amyloid, 'β1-40', '(', 'Aβ1-40)', induced, inflammatory, and, senescent, responses, in, human, retinal, pigment, epithelial, '(', 'RPE)', cells])]). relacion([sujeto(['Expressions', of, complemento([significantly, in, the, control, 'group,', while, sTNFRSF1A, increased, significantly, in, both, 'groups,', but, with, no, significant, differences, between, groups])]). complications])]). relacion([sujeto(['Here', we, show, that, 'A-FABP']), verbo([increases]), complemento([thermogenesis, by, promoting, the, conversion, of, 'T4', to, 'T3', in, brown, adipocytes])]). relacion([sujeto(['While', previous, studies]), verbo([have]), complemento([identified, numerous, genetic, variants, associated, with, 'IOP,', these, loci, only, explain, a, fraction, of, 'IOP', '(', 'P', &, 'lt;', 5, ×, 10, -, 8, ')'])]). relacion([sujeto(['We']), verbo([have]), complemento([recently, shown, that, 'meat-type', chicken, source, is, prone, to, adapt, to, dietary, starch, substitution, with, fat, and, fiber])]). relacion([sujeto(['We', revealed, the, 'fine-tuned', regulation, of, many, hepatic, genes, encoding, key, enzymes, driving, glycogenesis, and, de, novo, fatty, acid, synthesis, pathways, and, of, some, genes]), verbo([participating]), complemento([in, oxidation])]). relacion([sujeto(['Among', the, genes]), verbo([expressed]), complemento([upon, consumption, of, a, 'high-fat,', 'high-fiber', 'diet,', we, highlighted, 'CPT1A,', which, encodes, a, key, enzyme, in, the, regulation, of, fatty, acid, oxidation])]). relacion([sujeto(['Conversely,', the, of, dihydromyricetin, on, atherosclerosis]), verbo([have]), complemento([been, well, 'established,', yet, the, detailed, mechanisms, are, not, fully, understood])]). relacion([sujeto(['Incubation', with, dihydromyricetin, significantly, attenuated, oxidized, 'low-density', lipoprotein, '(', 'ox-LDL)-mediated', cholesterol, and, lipid, accumulation, in, 'THP-1-derived', 'macrophages,', which, 'LXRα', expression, with, small, interfering, 'RNA', '(', 'siRNA)'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Moreover,', the, lesion, size, of, atherosclerosis, was, smaller, in, 'dihydromyricetin-treated', 'ApoE-/-', mice, compared, with, the, 'vehicle-treated', 'mice,', and, the, protein, expression, of, 'CD36,', 'SR-A,', 'ABCA1,', 'ABCG1', and, 'LXRα', in, aortas, was]), verbo([modulated]), complemento([similar, to, that, observed, in, 'THP-1-derived', macrophages])]). relacion([sujeto(['These', data]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, promotion, of, 'LXRα-ABCA1/ABCG1-dependent', cholesterol, efflux, is, of, 'LXRα']), verbo([target]), complemento(['genes,', such, as, those, encoding, sterol, regulatory, binding, protein, and, fatty, acid, 'synthase,', were, induced, time, dependently, by, 'TO901317,', both, 'LXR', subtypes, are]), verbo([expressed]), complemento([in, the, 'brain,', their, roles, in, this, tissue, remain, largely, unexplored])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', this, 'report,', we, show, that, 'LXR', agonists]), verbo([have]), complemento([marked, effects, on, gene, expression, in, murine, brain, tissue, both, in, vitro, and, in, vivo])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', primary, astrocyte, 'cultures,', 'LXR', agonists]), verbo([regulated]), complemento([several, established, 'LXR', target, 'genes,', including, 'ATP', binding, cassette, transporter, 'A1,', and, enhanced, cholesterol, demonstrating, the, importance, of, 'ABCA1', in, the, formation, of, 'HDL'])]). relacion([sujeto(['APD']), verbo([induced]), complemento(['ABCA1', mRNA, 'levels,', and, increased, efflux, of, both, 0.76, μM])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', nonprimate, 'species,', it]), verbo([has]), complemento([been, well, established, that, prostaglandin, 'F2', alpha, '(', 'PGF2alpha)', initiates, luteolysis])]). luteolysis])]). relacion([sujeto(['These', changes, in, cholesterol, efflux, and, uptake, are, 'controlled,', in, 'part,', by, the, liver, x, receptors, '(', 'LXR)', alpha, '(', 'NR1H3)', and, beta, 'RNA', polymerase, 'II-catalyzed', transcription])]). relacion([sujeto(['Various', studies]), verbo([have]), complemento([shown, that, the, insulin, receptor, '(', 'IR)', is, increased, in, most, human, breast, 'cancers,', and, both, 'ligand-dependent', malignant, transformation, and, increased, cell, growth, occur, in, cultured, breast, cells, overexpressing, the, 'IR'])]). relacion([sujeto(['However,', although, numerous, in, vivo, and, in, vitro, observations]), verbo([have]), complemento([indicated, an, important, contributory, role, for, the, 'IR', in, breast, cancer, cell, 'biology,', the, molecular, mechanisms, accounting, for, increased, 'IR', expression, in, breast, tumors, have, not, previously, been, elucidated])]). relacion([sujeto(['Herein,', we, did, immunoblot, analyses, of]), verbo([nuclear]), complemento([protein, from, cultured, breast, cancer, cells, and, normal, and, tumoral, tissues, from, breast, cancer, patients, combined, with, promoter, studies, by, using, a, series, of, human, 'wild-type', and, mutant, 'IR', promoter, constructs])]). relacion([sujeto(['We']), verbo([provide]), complemento([evidence, that, 'IR', overexpression, in, breast, cancer, is, dependent, on, the, assembly, of, a, transcriptionally, active, 'multiprotein-DNA', 'complex,', which, includes, the, 'high-mobility', group, 'A1', '(', 'HMGA1)', 'protein,', the, developmentally, regulated, activator, 'protein-2', '(', 'AP-2)', transcription, factor, and, the, ubiquitously, expressed, transcription, factor, 'Sp1'])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', cultured, breast, cancer, cells, and, human, breast, cancer, 'specimens,', the, expression, of, 'AP-2', was, significantly, higher, than, that, observed, in, cells, and, tissues, derived, from, normal, 'breast,', and, this, overexpression, paralleled, the]), verbo([increase]), complemento([in, 'IR', expression])]). relacion([sujeto(['However,', 'AP-2', 'DNA-binding', activity, was, undetectable, with, the, 'IR', gene, 'promoter,']), verbo([suggesting]), complemento([that, transactivation, of, this, gene, by, 'AP-2', might, occur, indirectly, through, physical, and, functional, cooperation, with, 'HMGA1', and, 'Sp1'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Our', findings, support, this, hypothesis, and]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, in, affected, 'individuals,', hyperactivation, of, the, 'AP-2', gene, through, the, overexpression, of, 'IR', may, play, a, key, role, in, breast, carcinogenesis])]). relacion([sujeto(['Human', glutathione, 'S-transferase', 'P1-1', '(', 'GSTP1-1)', is, an, ubiquitously]), verbo([expressed]), complemento([protein, that, plays, an, important, role, in, the, detoxification, and, xenobiotics, metabolism])]). relacion([sujeto(['It']), verbo([has]), complemento([been, shown, that, 'GSTP1-1', interacts, with, 'c-Jun', 'NH(2)-terminal', kinase, '(', 'JNK)', and, suppresses, its, activity])]). relacion([sujeto(['Here,', we]), verbo([report]), complemento([a, novel, function, of, 'GSTP1-1', in, regulating, tumor, necrosis, 'factor-alpha', '(', 'TNF-alpha)-triggered', signaling])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', present, experiments, showed, that, 'GSTP1-1', physically]), verbo([associated]), complemento([with, tumor, necrosis, factor, 'receptor-associated', factor, 2, '(', 'TRAF2)', in, vivo, and, in, vitro])]). relacion([sujeto(['Overexpression', of, 'GSTP1-1']), verbo([inhibited]), complemento(['TRAF2-induced', activation, of, both, 'JNK', and, p38, but, not, of, nuclear, 'factor-kappaB', '(', 'NF-kappaB)'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Glutathione', 'S-transferase', 'P1-1', also, attenuated, 'TRAF2-enhanced', apoptosis, 'signal-regulating', kinase, 1, '(', 'ASK1)', autophosphorylation, and]), verbo([inhibited]), complemento(['TRAF2-ASK1-induced', cell, apoptosis, by, suppressing, the, interaction, of, 'TRAF2', and, 'ASK1'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Conversely,', 'hyper-activation', of, 'ASK1', and, 'JNK'])]). relacion([sujeto(['A', mutant, 'GSTP1-1', lacking, 'TRAF', 'domain-binding', motif, exhibited, a, significant, decline, of, capacity, to]), verbo([bind]), complemento(['TRAF2', and, block, 'TRAF2-ASK1', signaling, compared, with, the, wild, type, of, 'GSTP1-1'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Moreover,', the, 'glutathione-conjugating', activity, of, 'GSTP1-1', was, not]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, the, regulation, of, 'TRAF2', signaling])]). relacion([sujeto(['These', findings, indicate, that, 'GSTP1-1', plays, an, important, regulatory, role, in, 'TNF-alpha-induced', signaling, by, forming, 'ligand-binding', interactions, with, 'TRAF2,', which]), verbo([provides]), complemento([a, new, insight, for, analysing, the, protective, effects, of, 'GSTP1-1', in, tumor, cells])]). relacion([sujeto(['Sp1', and, 'Sp3', are, ubiquitously]), verbo([expressed]), complemento([mammalian, transcription, factors, that, activate, or, repress, the, expression, of, a, variety, of, genes, and, are, thought, to, compete, for, the, same, 'DNA', binding, site])]). relacion([sujeto(['Domains', of, 'Sp1', and, 'Sp3', infrequently]), verbo([associate]), complemento([with, sites, of, transcription])]). relacion([sujeto(['Sp3', partitions, with, the, tightly]), verbo([bound]), complemento([nuclear, protein, fraction, of, hormone, 'MCF-7', cells])]). relacion([sujeto(['Chromatin', immunoprecipitation, '(', 'ChIP)', and, 're-ChIP', assays, revealed, that, although, both, 'Sp1', and, 'Sp3']), verbo([bind]), complemento([to, the, 'Sp1', and, 'Sp3,']), verbo([providing]), complemento([further, evidence, that, 'Sp3', is, not, a, functional, equivalent, of, 'Sp1'])]). relacion([sujeto(['This', reduction, coincides, with]), verbo([decreased]), complemento([abundance, of, 'GHR1A,', the, 'liver-specific', transcript, of, the, growth, hormone, receptor, '(', 'GHR)', 'gene,', suggesting, impaired, growth, relacion([sujeto(['Aromatic', hydrocarbon]), verbo([nuclear]), complemento([translocator, '(', 'Arnt)', is, an, ubiquitously, expressed, protein, that, contains, basic, 'helix-loop-helix', '(', receptor, '(', 'AhR)']), verbo([mediate]), complemento(['hypoxia-', and, 'dioxin-signal', 'pathway,', respectively])]). relacion([sujeto(['Arnt']), verbo([has]), complemento([been, identified, as, a, transcription])]). relacion([sujeto(['Here,', in, vivo, results]), verbo([provide]), complemento([evidence, that, 'Arnt', is, involved, in, not, only, 'xenobiotic-', but, also, 'hypoxia-induced', able, to, bind, 'hypoxia-responsive', 'DNA', elements])]). relacion([sujeto(['Given', that, the, expression, of, 'Arnt', is, 'limited,', 'HIF-1alpha', may, compete, with, 'AhR', for]), verbo([recruiting]), complemento(['Arnt', as, a, heteromeric, partner])]). relacion([sujeto(['A', major, question, remaining, in, glycobiology, is, how, a, glycosyltransferase, '(', 'GT)', that]), verbo([retains]), complemento([the, anomeric, linkage, of, a, sugar, catalyzes, the, reaction])]). relacion([sujeto(['Xyloside', 'α-1,3-xylosyltransferase', '(', 'XXYLT1)', is, a]), verbo([retaining]), complemento(['GT', that, regulates, 'Notch', receptor, activation, by, adding, xylose, to, the, 'Notch', extracellular, domain])]). relacion([sujeto(['Here,', using, natural, acceptor, and, donor, substrates, and, active, 'Mus', musculus, 'XXYLT1,', we]), verbo([report]), complemento([a, series, of, crystallographic, snapshots, along, the, 'reaction,', including, an, verbo([retaining]), complemento([mechanism, for, 'XXYLT1'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Unexpectedly,', the, epidermal, growth, 'factor-like', repeat, acceptor, substrate, undergoes, a, large, understanding, of, this]), verbo([retaining]), complemento([enzyme, will, accelerate, the, design, of, retaining, 'GT', inhibitors, that, can, modulate, 'Notch', activity, in, pathological, situations, in, which, 'Notch', dysregulation, is, known, to, cause, cancer, or, developmental, disorders])]). relacion([sujeto(['Tuberculosis', '(', 'TB)']), verbo([caused]), complemento([by, 'Mycobacterium', tuberculosis, '(', 'Mtb)', represents, one, of, the, greatest, threats, to, human, health])]). relacion([sujeto([',', 'Interferons', '(', 'IFNs)', in, combination, with, the, were, selectively, involved, in, 'Mtb-mediated', 'ISG', production])]). relacion([sujeto(['Therapeutic', medications, for, the, treatment, of, depression]), verbo([have]), complemento([serious, 'limitations,', particularly, delayed, onset, and, low, rates, of, efficacy])]). relacion([sujeto(['However,', the, discovery, that, a, single, subanesthetic, dose, of, 'ketamine,', a, glutamate, 'treatment-resistant,']), verbo([has]), complemento([invigorated, the, field])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', addition, to, these, remarkable, 'actions,', ketamine]), verbo([has]), complemento([proven, effective, for, the, treatment, of, suicidal, ideation])]). relacion([sujeto(['Efforts', are, under, way, to, develop, 'ketamine-like', drugs, with, fewer, side, effects, as, well, as, agents, that]), relacion([sujeto(['Cell', proliferation, in, both, normal, mucosa, and, adenocarcinomas, was]), verbo([increased]), complemento([in, 'bethanechol-treated', compared, to, control, mice])]). the, negative, correlation, between, 4, 'βOHC/C', and, 'BMI,', which, has, previously, been, reported, between, 4, 'βOHC/C', and, body, weight, in, healthy, 'volunteers,', extends, to, underweight, underweight, patients, compared, to, 'normal-weight', subjects])]). relacion([sujeto(['A', novel, innate, immune, 'strategy,']), verbo([involving]), complemento([specific, cholesterol, oxidation, products, as, 'effectors,', has, begun, to, reveal, connections, between, cholesterol, metabolism, and, immune, response, against, viral, infections])]). relacion([sujeto(['Indeed,', 25, -, macrophage, 'aging,', less, is, known, about, its, cellular, basis, or, what, defines, the, transition, from, physiologic, aging, to, disease])]). relacion([sujeto(['Although', the, levels, of, verbo([associated]), complemento([with, 'AMD'])]). relacion([sujeto(['A', growing, bulk, of, evidence]), verbo([suggests]), complemento([that, cholesterol, oxidation, 'products,', known, as, 'oxysterols,', are, potentially, involved, in, the, pathogenesis, of, major, chronic, 'diseases,', including, 'atherosclerosis,', 'Alzheimer\'s', 'disease,', and, inflammatory, bowel, disease])]). relacion([sujeto(['Oxysterols', are]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, various, key, steps, of, these, complex, 'processes,', mainly, thanks, to, their, ability, to, act, through, 'up-regulation', of, oxidative, 'stress,', 'inflammation,', and, cell, toxicity])]). relacion([sujeto(['This', review, summarizes, the, current, knowledge, of, the, effects]), verbo([induced]), complemento([by, these, compounds, on, 'cells,', after, their, accumulation, in, the, arterial, 'wall,', 'brain,', and, intestine])]). relacion([sujeto(['It', is, now, established, that, cholesterol, oxidation, products, '(', 'oxysterols)', are]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, several, events, underlying, 'Alzheimer\'s', disease, '(', 'AD)', pathogenesis])]). relacion([sujeto(['Of', 'note,', certain, oxysterols]), verbo([cause]), complemento([neuron, dysfunction, and, degeneration, 'but,', 'recently,', some, of, them, have, been, shown, also, to, have, neuroprotective, effects])]). deacetylase, sirtuin, 1, '(', 'SIRT1),', which, contributes, to, preventing, the, neurotoxic, accumulation, of, the, hyperphosphorylated, tau, protein])]). relacion([sujeto(['Unlike', 24, -, 'OH,', 7, -, ketocholesterol, '(', 7, -, 'K)', did, not]), verbo([modulate]), complemento([the, 'SIRT1-dependent', neuroprotective, pathway])]). relacion([sujeto(['To', confirm, the, neuroprotective, role, of, complemento(['NMDA', receptor, function, are, candidates, for, therapeutic, development, to, treat, neuropsychiatric, disorders])]). relacion([sujeto(['Fluorescent', imaging]), verbo([reveals]), complemento([that, the, analog, accumulates, diffusely, in, the, cytoplasm, of, neurons, through, an, 'energy-independent', mechanism])]). relacion([sujeto(['Oxysterols']), verbo([act]), complemento([through, various, intracellular, and, extracellular, receptors, and, serve, as, key, metabolic, 'signals,', coordinating, immune, activity, and, inflammation])]). relacion([sujeto(['Our', recent, work]), verbo([has]), complemento([identified, an, unexpected, link, between, cholesterol, 'metabolism,', innate, lymphoid, cell, function, and, intestinal, homeostasis])]). relacion([sujeto(['Moreover,', we]), verbo([found]), complemento([that, the, interaction, of, 'GPR183', with, oxysterols, regulates, intestinal, inflammation])]). relacion([sujeto(['Structures', of, 1, '⁻4', were, elucidated, by, the, detailed, 'NMR', spectroscopic, and, 'mass-spectrometric', analyses, as, well, as, by, comparison, of, the, corresponding, experimental, data, with, those]), efflux])]). relacion([sujeto(['Consistently,', the, latest, observations]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([a, function, of, 'ORP2', in, cholesterol, transport, to, the, plasma, membrane, '(', 'PM)', in, exchange, for, phosphatidylinositol, 4, ',', 5, -, bisphosphate, '(', 'PI4,5P2),', with, significant, impacts, on, the, concentrations, of, 'PM', cholesterol, and, 'PI4,5P2'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Study', in, an, adrenocortical, cell, line, further]), verbo([suggested]), complemento([a, function, of, 'ORP2', in, the, synthesis, of, steroid, hormones])]). relacion([sujeto(['ORP2', was, shown, to]), verbo([interact]), complemento([physically, with, 'F-actin', regulators, such, as, 'DIAPH1,', 'ARHGAP12,', 'SEPT9', and, 'MLC12,', as, well, as, with, 'IQGAP1', and, the, 'Cdc37-Hsp90', chaperone, complex, controlling, the, activity, of, 'Akt'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Interestingly,', mutations, in, 'OSBPL2', encoding, 'ORP2', are]), verbo([associated]), complemento([with, autosomal, dominant, 'non-syndromic', hearing, 'loss,', and, the, protein, was, found, to, localize, in, cochlear, hair, cell, stereocilia])]).
