cholesterol, in, various, cell, types, and, steroid, hormone, synthesis, in, adrenocortical, cells])]). relacion([sujeto(['However,', it, also, impacts, cellular, 'TG', and, carbohydrate, metabolism, and, 'F-actin-dependent', 'functions,']), verbo([revealed]), complemento([a, bewildering, spectrum, of, activities])]). relacion([sujeto(['Under', pathological, 'conditions,', cholesterol, oxidation, products, '(', 'oxysterols)', appear, in]), verbo([enhanced]), complemento([concentration, in, blood, and, cerebrospinal, 'fluid,', which, leads, to, cytotoxic, 'effect,', especially, in, central, nervous, system])]). relacion([sujeto(['However,', the, mode, of, action, of, oxysterols, on, the, membrane, level]), verbo([has]), complemento([not, been, fully, resolved])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', this, paper, we]), verbo([have]), complemento([investigated, the, interaction, between, 7, 'α-', 'hydroxycholesterol,', 7, 'α-OH', '(', one, of, the, most, abundant, oxysterol, in, human, 'body)', verbo([have]), complemento([not, been, elucidated])]). relacion([sujeto(['We']), verbo([found]), complemento([that, 'COUP-TFII-V2', was, significantly, expressed, in, 'Huh7', 'cells,', in, which, loci]), verbo([associated]), complemento([with, 'CRC', 'risk;', 'P', values, for, the, most, significant, variant, in, each, locus, ranged, from, 3.92, '\240\×', 10, '(', -, 8, ')', to, 1.24, '\240\×', 10, '(', -, 12, ')', :, 6, p21])]). relacion([sujeto(['We', also, identified, 2, risk, variants, at, loci, previously]), verbo([associated]), complemento([with, 'CRC:', 10, q25])]). relacion([sujeto(['These', risk, 'variants,']), verbo([conferring]), complemento([an, approximate, 10, '%', -, 18, '%', increase, in, risk, per, 'allele,', are, located, either, inside, or, near, 'protein-coding', genes, that, include, transcription, factor, 'EB', '(', lysosome, biogenesis, and, 'autophagy),', eukaryotic, translation, initiation, factor, 3, ',', subunit, 'H', '(', initiation, of, 'translation),', cytochrome, 'P450,', family, 17, ',', subfamily, 'A,', polypeptide, 1, '(', 'steroidogenesis),', 'splA/ryanodine', receptor, domain, and, 'SOCS', box, containing, 2, '(', proteasome, 'degradation),', and, ribosomal, protein, 'S2', '(', ribosome, 'biogenesis)'])]). relacion([sujeto(['We', identified, susceptibility, loci, and, genes]), verbo([associated]), complemento([with, 'CRC', 'risk,', linking, 'CRC', predisposition, to, steroid, 'hormone,', protein, synthesis, and, 'degradation,', and, autophagy, pathways, and, providing, added, insight, into, the, mechanism, of, 'CRC', pathogenesis])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', children, and, adolescents, treated, with, 'risperidone,', hyperprolactinemia, is, a, frequent, complication, that, may]), verbo([have]), complemento([clinical, repercussions])]). relacion([sujeto(['Several', genes]), verbo([have]), complemento([been, associated, with, this, occurrence])]). relacion([sujeto(['Among', verbo([increased]), complemento(['(', 99, -, 467, ;, 'P', &, 'lt;', 0.001, ')'])]). relacion([sujeto([microRNAs, '(', miRNAs, or, 'miRs)', are, small, 'non-coding', 'RNAs', that, are]), that, searched, for, predictors, of, outcome, of, enzalutamide, therapy])]). relacion([sujeto(['Thiazolidinediones,', including, 'rosiglitazone,']), verbo([activate]), complemento([the, peroxisome, complemento([effect, was, 'augmented,', in, 'HepG2', cells, with, 'RNA', 'interference-mediated', 'PXR', knockdown])]). relacion([sujeto(['These', results]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, 'HNF4alpha', plays, a, central, role, in, the, control, of, 'SULT2A1', transcription, and, that, 'rifampicin-liganded', 'PXR', suppresses, 'SULT2A1', expression, by, interfering, with, 'HNF4alpha', activity])]). relacion([sujeto(['By', 'contrast,', the, 'rifampicin-inducible', 'SULT2A1', expression, that, occurs, in, many, human, hepatocyte, preparations, seems, to, be]), verbo([mediated]), complemento([through, a, 'PXR-independent', mechanism])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', transcription, of, the, gene, '(', 'CYP7A1)', encoding, cholesterol, 7, 'alpha-hydroxylase,', a, key, enzyme, in, cholesterol, 'homeostasis,', is]), verbo([repressed]), complemento([by, bile, acids, via, multiple, mechanisms, involving, members, of, the, nuclear, receptor, superfamily])]). relacion([sujeto(['Here,', we, describe, a, regulatory, mechanism, that, can, be, exploited, for]), verbo([modulating]), complemento([bile, acid, synthesis])]). relacion([sujeto(['By', dissecting, the, mechanisms, of, 'CYP7A1', 'transcription,', we]), verbo([found]), complemento([that, bile, acids, stimulate, the, sequential, recruitment, of, the, histone, deacetylases, '(', 'HDACs)', 7, ',', 3, ',', and, 1, ',', and, of, the, corepressor, 'SMRTalpha', '(', silencing, mediator, of, retinoid, and, thyroid, 'receptors-alpha)', and, the, nuclear, corepressor])]). relacion([sujeto(['Bile', 'acids,', but, not, the, farnesoid, 'X', 'receptor-selective', agonist, 'GW4064,']), verbo([increase]), complemento([the, nuclear, concentration, of, 'HDAC7,', which, promotes, the, assembly, of, a, repressive, complex, that, ultimately, represses, 'CYP7A1', transcription])]). relacion([sujeto(['Interestingly,', despite, its, high, basal, expression, 'level,', small, heterodimer, partner, '(', 'SHP)', is]), verbo([associated]), complemento([with, the, 'CYP7A1', promoter, only, at, a, later, stage, of, bile, acid, repression])]). relacion([sujeto(['Gene', silencing, with, small, interfering, 'RNA', confirms, that, 'HDAC7', is, the, key, factor]), verbo([required]), complemento([for, the, repression, of, 'CYP7A1', 'transcription,', whereas, knockdown, of, 'SHP', does, not, prevent, the, 'down-regulation', of, 'CYP7A1'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Administration', of, the, 'HDAC', inhibitors, valproic, acid, or, trichostatin, 'A', to, genetically, hypercholesterolemic, mice]), verbo([increases]), complemento(['Cyp7a1', messenger, 'RNA', and, bile, acid, synthesis, and, consequently, markedly, reduces, total, plasma, and, 'low-density', lipoprotein, cholesterol])]). relacion([sujeto(['By', using, a, combination, of, 'molecular,', 'cellular,', and, animal, 'models,', our, study, highlights, the, importance, of, 'HDACs', in, the, feedback, regulation, of, 'CYP7A1', transcription, and, identifies, these, enzymes, as, potential]), verbo([targets]), complemento([to, modulate, bile, acid, synthesis, and, for, the, treatment, of, hypercholesterolemia])]). acid, metabolism])]). relacion([sujeto(['To', examine, whether, activation, of, 'CAR', can]), verbo([prevent]), complemento([cholesterol, gallstone, 'formation,', we, treated, 'C57BL6/J', mice, adipocytes])]). relacion([sujeto(['Although', the, glucose, tolerance, was, comparable, to, that, in, 'HFD', 'mice,', the, insulin, response, during, 'IPGTT', was, significantly, higher, and, the, associated, with, each, of, these, 'UM', mutations])]). relacion([sujeto(['We', then, performed, 'NR-to-NR', and, 'NR-to-genome', expression, correlation, analyses, to]), verbo([find]), complemento([potential, 'NR-driven', transcriptional, programs, activated, in, 'UM', and, 'CM'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Given', the, plethora, of, available, 'NR', 'agonists,', 'antagonists,', and, selective, receptor, 'modulators,', pharmacologic, manipulation, of, these, 'NRs', and, their, transcriptional, outputs, may]), verbo([lead]), complemento([to, a, more, comprehensive, understanding, of, key, 'UM', pathways, and, how, we, can, leverage, them, for, better, therapeutic, alternatives])]). relacion([sujeto(['Metabolic', syndrome, '(', 'MetS)']), verbo([has]), complemento([been, in, 'αT3-1', pituitary, gonadotrophs, and]), verbo([found]), complemento([that, 'IP(3)R1', ubiquitination, is, highly, 'complex,', with, receptors, being, modified, at, multiple, sites, by, and, 'linkage-specific', ubiquitin, 'antibodies,', we]), verbo([found]), complemento([that, all, 'IP(3)R', types, are, subject, to, ubiquitination, at, approximately, the, same, locations, and, 'that,', independent, of, cell, 'type,', 'IP(3)Rs', are, modified, by, monoubiquitin, and, 'Lys-48-', and, 'Lys-63-linked', ubiquitin, 'chains,', although, in, differing, proportions])]). relacion([sujeto(['Remarkably,', the, attached, 'Lys-48-', and, 'Lys-63-linked', ubiquitin, chains, are, homogeneous, and, are, segregated, to, separate, 'IP(3)R', 'subunits,', and, 'Lys-48-linked', ubiquitin, 'chains,', but, not, 'Lys-63-linked', 'chains,', are]), verbo([required]), complemento([for, 'IP(3)R', degradation])]). relacion([sujeto(['Together,', these, data]), verbo([provide]), complemento([unique, insight, into, the, complexities, of, ubiquitination, of, an, endogenous, 'ubiquitin-proteasome', pathway, substrate, in, unperturbed, mammalian, cells])]). relacion([sujeto(['Importantly,', although, 'Lys-48-linked', ubiquitin, chains, appear, to]), verbo([trigger]), complemento([proteasomal, 'degradation,', the, presence, of, 'Lys-63-linked', ubiquitin, chains, suggests, that, ubiquitination, of, 'IP(3)Rs', may, have, physiological, consequences, beyond, signaling, for, degradation])]). relacion([sujeto(['Some', 'Chinese', pig, 'breeds,', such, as, relacion([sujeto(['Autophagy', is, a, tightly]), verbo([regulated]), complemento([lysosomal, degradation, pathway, for, maintaining, cellular, homeostasis, and, responding, to, stresses])]). relacion([sujeto(['Beclin', 1, and, its]), verbo([interacting]), complemento(['proteins,', including, the, class, 'III', 'phosphatidylinositol-3', kinase, 'Vps34,', play, crucial, roles, in, autophagy, regulation, in, mammals])]). relacion([sujeto(['We', identified]), verbo([nuclear]), complemento([receptor, binding, factor, 2, '(', 'Nrbf2)', as, a, 'Beclin', 1, -, interacting, protein, 'Nrbf2'])]). relacion([sujeto(['We', next, used, the, human, retinal, pigment, epithelial, cell, line, 'RPE-1', as, a, model, system, and, showed, that, transiently, knocking, down, 'Nrbf2', by, siRNA]), verbo([increased]), complemento([autophagic, flux, under, both, 'nutrient-rich', and, starvation, conditions])]). relacion([sujeto(['To', investigate, the, mechanism, by, which, 'Nrbf2']), verbo([regulates]), complemento(['autophagy,', we, demonstrated, that, 'Nrbf2', interacted, and, colocalized, with, 'Atg14L,', suggesting, that, 'Nrbf2', is, a, component, of, the, isolation, membrane, markers])]). relacion([sujeto(['These', results]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, 'Nrbf2', is, involved, in, autophagosome, biogenesis])]). relacion([sujeto(['Furthermore,', 'activity,', autophagosome, 'biogenesis,', and, autophagic, flux])]). relacion([sujeto(['This', work]), verbo([reveals]), complemento([a, novel, aspect, of, the, intricate, mechanism, for, the, 'Beclin', 1, -, 'Vps34', 'protein-protein', interaction, network, to, achieve, precise, control, of, autophagy])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', 'Beclin', 1, -, 'Vps34', 'complex,', the, core, component, of, the, class, 'III', 'phosphatidylinositol-3', kinase, '(', 'PI3K-III),']), verbo([binds]), complemento(['Atg14L', or, 'UVRAG', to, control, different, steps, of, autophagy])]). relacion([sujeto(['Here', we]), verbo([report]), complemento([the, identification, of, 'NRBF2', as, a, component, in, the, specific, 'PI3K-III', complex, and, a, modulator, of, 'PI3K-III', activity])]). relacion([sujeto(['Through', its, microtubule, interaction, and, trafficking, '(', 'MIT)', 'domain,', 'NRBF2']), verbo([binds]), complemento(['Atg14L', directly, and, enhances, 'Atg14L-linked', 'Vps34', kinase, activity, and, autophagy, induction])]). relacion([sujeto(['NRBF2-deficient', cells, exhibit]), verbo([enhanced]), complemento([vulnerability, to, endoplasmic, biological, processes])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', n6, fatty, acids, linoleic, acid, '(', 'LA),', 'γ-linolenic', acid, '(', 'GLA),', 'dihomo-GLA,', arachidonic, 'acid,', and, adrenic, acid, were]), '(', 'rs10740118;', 'P=8'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Our', findings]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, along, with, the, 'FADS', gene, 'cluster,', additional, genes, may, influence, n6, 'PUFA', composition])]). relacion([sujeto(['A', protein, named]), verbo([nuclear]), complemento([receptor, binding, 'factor-2', '(', 'NRBF-2)', was, identified, by, yeast, 'two-hybrid', 'screening,', as, an, interaction, partner, of, peroxisome, 'proliferator-activated', receptor, alpha, as, well, as, several, other, nuclear, receptors])]). relacion([sujeto(['NRBF-2', exhibited, a, gene, activation, 'function,', when, tethered, to, a, heterologous, 'DNA']), verbo([binding]), complemento(['domain,', in, both, mammalian, cells, and, yeast])]). relacion([sujeto(['Macroautophagy', is, a, 'kinase)', 'Vps34', '(', vacuolar, protein, sorting, 34, ')'])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', autophagic, functions, of, 'Vps34']), verbo([require]), complemento([its, recruitment, to, a, complex, that, 'APP-CTFs', through, modulating, autophagy])]). relacion([sujeto(['NRBF2/Atg38']), verbo([has]), complemento([been, identified, as, the, fifth, subunit, of, the, 'macroautophagic/autophagic', class, complemento([by, 'MTORC1', at, 'S113', and, 'S120'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Phosphorylated', 'NRBF2', preferentially]), verbo([interacts]), complemento([with, 'PIK3C3/PIK3R4'])]). through, phosphorylation])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', structural, organization, of, heterotetrameric, complexes, is, starting, to, 'emerge,', but, little, is, known, about, organization, of, physiological, functions, of, complex, organisms])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', this, 'respect,', they, are, often, described, as, drugable]), verbo([targets]), complemento([for, a, number, of, pathological, states, including, hypercholesterolemia, and, atherosclerosis])]). relacion([sujeto(['HNF4alpha', '(', 'NR2A1)', is, a, recently, '\'', 'deorphanized\'']), verbo([nuclear]), complemento([receptor, which, is, bound, in, vivo, by, linoleic, 'acid,', although, this, natural, ligand, does, not, seem, to, promote, transcriptional, activation])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', 'mouse,', 'HNF4alpha', is, a, major, regulator, of, liver, development, and, hepatic, lipid, metabolism, and, mutations, in, human]), verbo([have]), complemento([been, linked, to, diabetes])]). the, normal, functioning, of, 'BAT'])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', mechanism, of, their, effect, on, 'BAT,', 'however,']), verbo([has]), complemento([not, yet, been, elucidated])]). complemento([receptor, coactivator, recruitment, assay, was, carried, out, in, 2, different, assay, 'formats,', 'namely,', 'AlphaScreen', and, 'time-resolved', fluorescence, resonance, energy, 'transfer,', which, probed, the, same, biochemical, binding, events, but, with, different, detection, technologies])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', results]), verbo([provide]), complemento([further, support, that, the, choice, of, assay, format, or, technology, is, a, critical, factor, in, 'HTS', assay, development])]). relacion([sujeto(['The']), verbo([nuclear]), complemento([receptors, farnesoid, 'X', receptor, '(', 'FXR)', and, peroxisome, 'proliferator-activated', receptor, '(', 'PPAR)gamma', exert, 'counter-regulatory', effects, on, hepatic, stellate, cells, '(', 'HSCs)', and, protect, against, liver, fibrosis, development, in, rodents])]). relacion([sujeto(['Here,', we, investigated, whether, 'FXR', ligands]), verbo([regulate]), complemento(['PPARgamma', expression, in, 'HSCs', and, models, of, liver, fibrosis, induced, in, rats, by, porcine, serum, and, carbon, tetrachloride, administration, and, bile, duct, ligation])]). relacion([sujeto(['Our', results, demonstrate, that, 'HSCs', 'trans-differentiation']), verbo([associated]), complemento([with, suppression, of, 'PPARgamma', mRNA, 'expression,', whereas, 'FXR', mRNA, was, unchanged])]). relacion([sujeto(['Exposure', of, cells, to, natural, and, synthetic, ligands, of, 'FXR,', including, 6, -, ethyl, chenodeoxycholic, acid, '(', 6, -, 'ECDCA),', a, synthetic, derivative, of, chenodeoxycholic, 'acid,', reversed, this, effect, and]), verbo([increased]), complemento(['PPARgamma', mRNA, by, approximately, 40, -, fold])]). relacion([sujeto(['Submaximally', effective, 'TGF)beta1'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Cotreatment', with, 6, -, 'ECDCA', potentiates, the, antifibrotic, activity, of, 'rosiglitazone,', a, 'PPARgamma', 'ligand,', in, the, porcine, serum, model, as, measured, by, morphometric, analysis, of, liver, collagen, 'content,', 'hydroxyproline,', and, liver, expression, of, 'alpha1(I)', collagen, 'mRNA,', 'alpha-smooth', muscle, 'actin,', 'fibronectin,', 'TGFbeta1,', and, tissue, inhibitor, of, metalloprotease, 1, and, 2, ',', whereas, it]), verbo([enhanced]), complemento([the, expression, of, 'PPARgamma', and, uncoupling, protein, 2, ',', a, 'PPARgamma-regulated', 'gene,', by, 2, -, fold])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', farnesoid, 'X', receptor, '(', 'FXR)', is]), verbo([expressed]), complemento([by, and, regulates, hepatic, stellate, cells, '(', 'HSCs)'])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', the, present, 'study,', we, investigated, whether, 6, -, ethyl, chenodeoxycholic, acid, '(', 6, -, 'ECDCA', or, 'INT-747),', a, semisynthetic, derivative, of, chenodeoxycholic, acid, '(', 'CDCA),']), verbo([modulates]), complemento([tissue, metalloproteinase, inhibitor, '(', 'TIMP)-1', and, matrix, metalloprotease, '(', 'MMP)-2', 'expression/activity', in, complemento([small, heterodimer, partner, '(', 'SHP)', mRNA, by, 3, -, fold, and, reduces, basal, and, 'thrombin-stimulated', expression, of, 'alpha1(I)collagen,', 'alpha-smooth', muscle, actin, '(', complemento([the, sensitivity, of, 'HSCs', to, proapoptogenic, stimuli])]). relacion([sujeto(['Administration', of, 3, 'mg/kg', 6, -, 'ECDCA,', but, not, 15, 'mg/kg', ursodeoxycholic, 'acid,', potential, cooperation, between, cytokine, and, bile, 'acid-signaling', pathways, during, hepatic, inflammatory, events])]). relacion([sujeto(['Peroxisomal', 'beta-oxidation', is, an, essential, step, in, bile, acid, 'synthesis,', since, it, is]), verbo([required]), complemento([for, shortening, of, 'C27-bile', acid, intermediates, to, produce, mature, 'C24-bile', acids])]). relacion([sujeto(['An', 'receptor,', but, not, 'PPARalpha'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Site-directed', mutagenesis, and, electrophoretic, mobility, shift, assay, studies, confirmed, that, this, distal, 'PPRE', '(', 'dPPRE),', a, direct, repeat]), verbo([nuclear]), complemento([receptor, motif, containing, one, intervening, 'nt,', represented, a, functional, 'PPRE'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Results', also, indicate, that, relacion([sujeto(['Feeding', 'SC-435', to, the, rabbits, blocked, bile, acid, 'absorption,']), verbo([decreased]), complemento(['SHP', 'mRNA,', and, increased, 'ASBT', expression])]). nonactivating, ligands, for, 'FXR,', did, not]), verbo([repress]), complemento(['ASBT', promoter, activity])]). relacion([sujeto(['Thus', the, rabbit, 'ASBT', promoter, is, 'negative-feedback']), verbo([regulated]), complemento([by, bile, acids, via, a, functional, 'FTF', binding, site])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', this, 'study,', we, demonstrate, that, 'FXR']), verbo([regulates]), complemento([the, expression, of, at, least, two, secreted, 'factors,', complement, component, 'C3', and, 'FGF15,', the, rat, ortholog, of, 'FGF19,', known, to, influence, lipid, metabolism])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', analysis, of, the, human, complement, 'C3', gene]), verbo([reveals]), complemento([the, presence, of, functional, 'FXR', response, elements, in, the, proximal, promoter, of, 'C3'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Furthermore,', rats, given, a, single, dose, of, an, 'FXR', agonist, exhibit, an]), verbo([increase]), complemento([in, the, plasma, concentration, of, complement, 'C3', regulates, secretion, of, factors, that, ultimately, can, affect, lipid, metabolism, in, an, endocrine, or, paracrine, manner])]). relacion([sujeto(['Moreover,', 'WAY', remarkably]), verbo([decreased]), complemento([portal, endotoxin, 'level,', and, lowered, serum, 'TNFα', concentration])]). relacion([sujeto(['Moreover,', 'WAY']), verbo([suppressed]), complemento(['LPS-induced', 'HepG2', and, 'Huh7', cells])]). relacion([sujeto(['WAY']), verbo([suppressed]), complemento(['TNFα-induced', 'ADRP', 'up-regulation', via, competing, with, 'AP-1', for, 'ADRP', promoter, binding, 'SREBP-2', overexpression]), verbo([suppressed]), complemento(['GW4064/FXR-mediated', increase, in, reporter, activities, in, regions, containing, the, 'IR-1', motif, '(', +, 848, to, +, 5200, ')', in, the, 'FGF19', gene])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', electrophoretic, mobility, shift, 'assays,']), verbo([binding]), complemento([of, the, 'FXR/retinoid', 'X', receptor, α, heterodimer, to, the, 'assays,', specific]), verbo([binding]), complemento([of, 'FXR', to, the, 'IR-1-containing', region, of, the, 'FGF19', gene, '(', +, 3214, to, +, 3404, ')', was, increased, in, 'LS174T', cells, by, treatment, with, cholesterol, and, 25, -, hydroxycholesterol])]). relacion([sujeto(['Specific']), verbo([binding]), complemento([of, 'SREBP-2', to, 'FXR', was, observed, in, 'glutathione-S-transferase', '(', 'GST)', 'pull-down', assays])]). relacion([sujeto(['These', results]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, 'SREBP-2', negatively, regulates, the, 'FXR-mediated', transcriptional, activation, of, the, 'FGF19', gene, in, human, intestinal, cells])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', aged, liver, is, more, sensitive, to, the, drug, treatments, and]), verbo([has]), complemento([a, high, probability, of, developing, liver, disorders, such, as, 'fibrosis,', 'cirrhosis,', and, cancer])]). relacion([sujeto(['We']), verbo([have]), complemento([examined, liver, response, to, 'CCl4', treatments, using, old, 'WT', mice, and, young, 'C/EBPα-S193D', knockin, 'mice,', which, express, an, 'aged-like', isoform, of, 'C/EBPα'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Both', animal, models]), verbo([have]), complemento([altered, chromatin, structure, as, well, as, increased, liver, injury, and, proliferation, after, acute, 'CCl4', treatments])]). relacion([sujeto(['We']), verbo([found]), complemento([that, these, 'age-related', changes, are, associated, with, the, repression, of, key, regulators, of, liver, 'biology:', 'C/EBPα,', 'Farnesoid', 'X', 'Receptor', '(', 'FXR)', and, telomere, reverse, transcriptase, '(', 'TERT)'])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', quiescent, livers, of, old, 'WT', and, young, 'S193D', 'mice,', the, inhibition, of, 'TERT', is]), verbo([mediated]), complemento([by, 'HDAC1-C/EBPα', complexes])]). relacion([sujeto(['After', 'CCl4', 'treatments,', 'TERT,', 'C/EBPα', and, 'FXR', are]), verbo([repressed]), complemento([by, different, mechanisms])]). relacion([sujeto(['These', mechanisms, include, the]), verbo([increase]), complemento([of, a, dominant, negative, 'isoform,', 'C/EBPβ-LIP,', and, subsequent, repression, of, 'C/EBPα,', 'FXR,', and, 'TERT', promoters])]). relacion([sujeto(['To', examine, if, these, alterations, are]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, 'drug-mediated', liver, 'diseases,', we, performed, chronic, treatments, of, mice, with, 'CCl4'])]). relacion([sujeto(['We']), verbo([found]), complemento([that, 'C/EBPα-S193D', mice, developed, fibrosis, much, more, rapidly, than, 'WT', mice])]). relacion([sujeto(['Thus,', our, data, show, that, the, 'age-associated', alterations, of, 'C/EBP', proteins, create, favorable, conditions, for, the]), verbo([increased]), complemento([liver, proliferation, after, 'CCl4', treatments, and, for, development, of, 'drug-mediated', liver, diseases])]). relacion([sujeto(['Type', 'I', diabetes, was]), verbo([induced]), complemento([in, female, 'C57BL/6', mice, with, multiple, low, dose, intraperitoneal, injections, of, streptozotocin, '(', 'STZ)', at, least, 2, weeks, prior, to, mating, with, normoglycemic, male, mice])]). relacion([sujeto(['We']), verbo([have]), complemento([previously, shown, that, expression, of, the, transcription, factor, 'ARNT/HIF1beta', is, reduced, in, islets, of, humans, with, type, 2, diabetes])]). relacion([sujeto(['We']), verbo([have]), complemento([now, found, that, 'ARNT', is, also, reduced, in, livers, of, diabetics])]). relacion([sujeto(['L-ARNT', 'KO', mice, had, normal, blood, glucose, but]), verbo([increased]), complemento([fed, insulin, levels])]). relacion([sujeto(['These', mice, also, exhibited, features, of, type, 2, diabetes, with]), verbo([increased]), complemento([hepatic, 'gluconeogenesis,', increased, lipogenic, gene, 'expression,', and, low, serum, 'beta-hydroxybutyrate'])]). relacion([sujeto(['These', effects, appear, to, be, secondary, to]), verbo([increased]), complemento([expression, of, 'CCAAT/enhancer-binding', protein, alpha, '(', 'C/EBPalpha),', farnesoid, 'X', receptor, '(', 'FXR),', and, sterol, response, 'element-binding', protein, 1, c, '(', 'SREBP-1c)', and, a, reduction, in, phosphorylation, of, 'AMPK', without, changes, in, the, expression, of, enzymes, in, 'ketogenesis,', fatty, acid, 'oxidation,', or, 'FGF21'])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', farnesoid, 'X', receptor, '(', 'FXR),', a, member, of, the]), verbo([nuclear]), complemento([hormone, receptor, 'superfamily,', plays, an, essential, role, in, the, regulation, of, enterohepatic, circulation, and, lipid, homeostasis])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', this, 'study,', we]), verbo([report]), complemento([that, two, synthetic, 'FXR', 'agonists,', 'WAY-362450', and, 'GW4064,', suppressed, 'interleukin-6-induced', 'CRP', expression, in, human, 'Hep3B', hepatoma, cells])]). relacion([sujeto(['Knockdown', of, 'FXR', by, short, interfering, 'RNA', attenuated, the, inhibitory, effect, of, the, 'FXR', agonists, and, also]), verbo([increased]), complemento([the, ability, of, 'interleukin-6', to, induce, 'CRP', production])]). relacion([sujeto(['These', data]), verbo([provide]), complemento([new, evidence, for, direct, 'anti-inflammatory', properties, of, 'FXR'])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', this, blind, 'experiment,', participants, were, requested, to, predict, the, structures, and]), verbo([binding]), complemento([affinities, of, complexes, between, the, 'Farnesoid', 'X', nuclear, receptor, and, 102, different, ligands])]). relacion([sujeto(['Only', 6, /, 35]), verbo([targets]), complemento([were, within, 2.5, '\240\Å', 'RMSD', from, the, 'reference,', which, prompted, us, to, investigate, the, limiting, factors, and, revise, our, protocol, for, 'Stage2'])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', choice, of, the, receptor, conformation, appeared, to]), verbo([have]), complemento([the, strongest, influence, on, the, results])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', docking, protocol, was, applied, to, all, 102, ligands, to, generate, poses, for]), verbo([binding]), complemento([affinity, prediction])]). relacion([sujeto(['We', developed, a, modified, version, of, our, 'contact-based']), verbo([binding]), complemento([affinity, predictor, 'PRODIGY,', using, the, number, of, interatomic, contacts, classified, by, their, type, and, the, intermolecular, electrostatic, energy])]). relacion([sujeto(['This', simple, 'structure-based']), verbo([binding]), complemento([affinity, predictor, shows, a, 'Kendall\'s', 'Tau', correlation, of, 0.37, in, ranking, the, ligands, '(', 7, th, best, out, of, 77, 'methods,', 5, 'th/25', 'groups)'])]). relacion([sujeto(['This', results, in, an, enrichment, factor, of, 2.5, compared, to, a, random, predictor, for, ranking, ligands, within, the, top, 25, '%', ',', making, it, a, promising, approach, to, identify]), verbo([lead]), complemento([compounds, in, virtual, screening])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', farnesoid, 'X', receptor, '(', 'FXR)', is, an, important]), verbo([target]), complemento([for, drug, discovery])]). relacion([sujeto(['Small', molecules]), verbo([induce]), complemento([a, conformational, change, in, 'FXR', that, modulates, its, binding, to, 'co-regulators,', thus, resulting, in, distinct, 'FXR', functional, profiles])]). relacion([sujeto(['However,', the, mechanisms, for, selectively]), verbo([recruiting]), complemento(['co-regulators', by, 'FXR', remain, 'elusive,', partly, because, of, the, lack, of, 'FXR-selective', modulators])]). relacion([sujeto(['We']), verbo([report]), complemento([the, identification, of, two, natural, 'terpenoids,', tschimgine, and, 'feroline,', as, novel, 'FXR', modulators])]). relacion([sujeto(['Remarkably,', their, crystal, structures, uncovered, a, secondary]), verbo([binding]), complemento([pocket, important, for, ligand, binding])]). relacion([sujeto(['Further,', tschimgine, or, feroline]), verbo([induced]), complemento([dynamic, conformational, changes, in, the, activation, function, 2, '(', 'AF-2)', 'surface,', thus, leading, to, differential, 'co-regulator', recruiting, 'profiles,', modulated, by, both, hydrophobic, and, selective, 'hydrogen-bond', interactions, unique, to, specific, 'co-regulators'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Our', findings, thus]), verbo([provide]), complemento([a, novel, structure, template, for, optimization, for, 'FXR-selective', modulators, of, clinical, value])]). relacion([sujeto(['OCT1']), verbo([has]), complemento([unique, expression, pattern])]). relacion([sujeto(['It']), verbo([has]), complemento([the, highest, expression, among, drug, transporters, in, normal, human, hepatocytes, with, large, interindividual, 'variability,', but, it, has, negligible, expression, in, other, tissues, or, their, tumors])]). relacion([sujeto(['Nowadays,', it, is, clear, 'drug-metabolizing', enzymes, highly]), verbo([expressed]), complemento([in, hepatocytes, and, controlled, by, 'HNF4α', or, other, 'liver-enriched', transcription, factors])]). 80, micelles, at, the, room, temperature])]). relacion([sujeto(['Micellar', solubilizations, of, the, 'phytochemicals,', which, were]), verbo([found]), complemento([to, be, facilitated, with, culture])]). relacion([sujeto(['On', the, other, 'hand,', 'NMDA-treatment', failed, to]), verbo([increase]), complemento([the, 'MCP-1', production, in, the, enriched, astrocyte, 'cultures,', stimulate, serine, phosphorylation, of, the, receptor])]). relacion([sujeto(['Presently,', agrin, is, the, only, extracellular, factor, known, to]), verbo([stimulate]), complemento([phosphorylation, of, the, 'AChR', on, tyrosine, residues])]). relacion([sujeto(['For', glutamate, 'receptors,', 'non-NMDA', receptor, phosphorylation, by, 'PKA', is]), verbo([stimulated]), complemento([by, 'dopamine,', while, 'NMDA', receptor, phosphorylation, by, 'PKA', and, 'PKC', can, be, induced, via, the, activation, of, 'beta-adrenergic', 'receptors,', and, metabotropic, glutamate, or, opioid, 'receptors,', respectively])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', 'addition,', 'Ca2+', influx, through, the, 'NMDA', receptor]), verbo([has]), complemento([been, shown, to, activate, 'PKC'])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', mammalian, striatin, family, consists, of, three, 'proteins,', 'striatin,', 'S/G2']), verbo([nuclear]), complemento(['autoantigen,', and, zinedin])]). relacion([sujeto(['Striatin', family, members]), verbo([have]), complemento([no, intrinsic, catalytic, 'activity,', but, rather, function, as, scaffolding, proteins])]). relacion([sujeto(['Remarkably,', they, organize, multiple, 'diverse,', large, signaling, complexes, that]), verbo([participate]), complemento([in, a, variety, of, cellular, processes])]). these, assemblies, the, name, 'striatin-interacting', phosphatase, and, kinase, '(', 'STRIPAK)', complexes])]). relacion([sujeto(['Recently,', there]), verbo([has]), complemento([been, a, great, increase, in, functional, and, mechanistic, studies, aimed, at, identifying, and, understanding, the, roles, of, 'STRIPAK', and, 'STRIPAK-like', complexes, in, cellular, processes, of, multiple, organisms])]). relacion([sujeto(['These', studies]), verbo([have]), complemento([identified, novel, 'STRIPAK', and, 'STRIPAK-like', complexes, and, have, explored, their, roles, in, specific, signaling, pathways])]). relacion([sujeto(['Together,', the, results, of, these, studies]), verbo([have]), complemento([sparked, increased, interest, in, striatin, family, complexes, because, they, have, revealed, roles, in, 'signaling,', cell, cycle, 'control,', 'apoptosis,', vesicular, 'trafficking,', 'Golgi', 'assembly,', cell, 'polarity,', cell, 'migration,', neural, and, vascular, 'development,', and, cardiac, function])]). relacion([sujeto(['Moreover,', 'STRIPAK', complexes]), verbo([have]), complemento([been, connected, to, clinical, 'conditions,', including, cardiac, 'disease,', 'diabetes,', 'autism,', and, cerebral, cavernous, malformation])]). relacion([sujeto(['A', large, number, of, experimental, and, clinical, studies]), verbo([have]), complemento([confirmed, that, brief, remifentanil, exposure, can, enhance, pain, sensitivity, presenting, as, 'opioid-induced', hyperalgesia, '(', 'OIH)'])]). relacion([sujeto(['N-methyl-D-aspartate', '(', 'NMDA)', receptor, antagonists]), verbo([have]), complemento([been, reported, to, inhibit, morphine, analgesic, tolerance, in, many, studies])]). relacion([sujeto(['Recently,', we]), verbo([found]), complemento([that, glycogen, synthase, 'kinase-3β', '(', 'GSK-3β)', modulated, 'NMDA', receptor, trafficking, in, a, rat, model, of, 'remifentanil-induced', postoperative, hyperalgesia])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', the, current, 'study,', it, was, demonstrated, that, 'GSK-3β', inhibition]), verbo([prevented]), complemento(['remifentanil-induced', hyperalgesia, via, regulating, the, expression, and, function, of, spinal, 'NMDA', receptors, in, vivo, and, in, vitro])]). relacion([sujeto(['We']), verbo([found]), complemento([that, remifentanil, infusion, at, 1, 'μg·kg(-1)·min(-1)', and, 2, 'μg·kg(-1)·min(-1)', caused, mechanical, and, thermal, 'hyperalgesia,', 'up-regulated', 'NMDA', receptor, subunits, 'NR1', and, 'NR2B', expression, in, both, membrane, fraction, and, total, lysate, of, the, spinal, cord, dorsal, horn, and, increased, 'GSK-3β', activity, in, spinal, cord, dorsal, horn])]). relacion([sujeto(['GSK-3β', inhibitor, 'TDZD-8', significantly, attenuated, 'remifentanil-induced', mechanical, and, thermal, hyperalgesia, from, 2, h, to, 48, h, after, 'infusion,', and, this, was]), verbo([associated]), complemento([with, reversal, of, 'up-regulated', 'NR1', and, 'NR2B', subunits, in, both, membrane, fraction, and, total, lysate])]). relacion([sujeto(['Furthermore,', remifentanil, incubation]), verbo([increased]), complemento([amplitude, and, frequency, of, 'NMDA', 'receptor-induced', current, in, dorsal, horn, 'neurons,', which, was, prevented, with, the, application, of, 'TDZD-8'])]). relacion([sujeto(['These', results]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, inhibition, of, 'GSK-3β', can, significantly, ameliorate, 'remifentanil-induced', hyperalgesia, via, modulating, the, expression, and, function, of, 'NMDA', 'receptors,', which, present, useful, insights, into, the, mechanistic, action, of, 'GSK-3β', inhibitor, as, potential, 'anti-hyperalgesic', agents, for, treating, 'OIH'])]). relacion([sujeto(['There', is, mounting, evidence, that, the, 'autophagosome-lysosomal', degradation, is, 'impaired,', which, could, disturb, the, processing, of, 'APP', and]), verbo([provoke]), complemento(['AD', pathology])]). relacion([sujeto(['Beclin', 1, is, a, molecular, platform, assembling, an, interactome, with]), verbo([stimulating]), complemento([and, suppressive, components, which, regulate, the, initiation, of, the, autophagosome, formation])]). relacion([sujeto(['Recent', studies]), verbo([have]), complemento([indicated, that, the, expression, 'Beclin', 1, is, reduced, in, 'AD', brain])]). relacion([sujeto(['Moreover,', the, deficiency, of, 'Beclin', 1, in, cultured, neurons, and, transgenic, mice]), verbo([provokes]), complemento([the, deposition, of, 'amyloid-β', peptides, whereas, its, overexpression, reduces, the, accumulation, of, 'amyloid-β'])]). relacion([sujeto(['There', are, several, potential, 'mechanisms,', which, could]), verbo([inhibit]), complemento([the, function, of, 'Beclin', 1, interactome, and, thus, impair, autophagy, and, promote, 'AD', pathology])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', mechanisms, include, '(', 'i)', reduction, of, 'Beclin', 1, expression, or, its]), verbo([increased]), complemento([proteolytic, cleavage, by, 'caspases,', '(', 'ii)', sequestration, of, 'Beclin', 1, to, 'non-functional', 'locations,', such, as, tau, 'tangles,', '(', 'iii)', formation, of, inhibitory, complexes, between, 'Beclin', 1, and, antiapoptotic, 'Bcl-2', proteins, or, 'inflammasomes,', '(', 'iv)', interaction, of, 'Beclin', 1, with, inhibitory, neurovirulent, 'proteins,', e])]). relacion([sujeto(['We', will, shortly, introduce, the, function, of, 'Beclin', 1, interactome, in, autophagy, and, 'phagocytosis,', review, the, recent, evidence, indicating, that, 'Beclin', 1]), verbo([regulates]), complemento([autophagy, and, 'APP', processing, in, 'AD,', and, finally, examine, the, potential, mechanisms, through, which, 'Beclin', 1, dysfunction, could, be, involved, in, the, pathogenesis, of, 'AD'])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', the, search, for, new, drug, 'targets,', that, may, help, point, the, way, to, develop, 'fast-acting', treatments, for, mood, 'disorders,', we]), verbo([have]), complemento([explored, molecular, pathways, regulated, by, 'ketamine,', an, 'NMDA', receptor, 'antagonist,', which, has, consistently, shown, antidepressant, response, within, a, few, hours, of, administration])]). relacion([sujeto(['Using', 'Sprague-Dawley', rats, we, investigated, the, effects, of, ketamine, on, the, presynaptic]), verbo([release]), complemento([machinery, responsible, for, neurotransmitter, release, at, 1, ',', 2, and, 4, h, as, well, as, 7, days, after, administration, of, a, single, subanesthetic, dose, of, ketamine, '(', 15, 'mg/kg)'])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', 'parallel,', we]), verbo([found]), complemento([a, selective, reduction, in, the, expression, of, the, synaptic, vesicle, protein, synaptotagmin, 'I', and, an, increase, in, the, levels, of, synapsin, 'I', in, hippocampal, synaptosomes, suggesting, a, mechanism, by, which, ketamine, reduces, 'SNARE', complex, 'formation,', in, 'part,', by, regulating, the, number, of, synaptic, vesicles, in, the, nerve, terminals])]). relacion([sujeto(['Moreover,', ketamine, reduced, 'Thr(286)-phosphorylated', αCaMKII, and, its, interaction, with, syntaxin, 1, 'A,', which, identifies, 'CaMKII', as, a, potential]), verbo([target]), complemento([for, second, 'messenger-mediated', actions, of, ketamine])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', 'addition,', despite, previous]), verbo([reports]), complemento([of, 'ketamine-induced', inhibition, of, 'GSK-3,', we, were, unable, to, detect, regulation, of, its, activity, after, ketamine, administration])]). relacion([sujeto(['Our', findings, demonstrate, that, ketamine, rapidly]), verbo([induces]), complemento([changes, in, the, hippocampal, presynaptic, machinery, similar, to, those, that, are, obtained, only, with, chronic, treatments, with, traditional, antidepressants])]). relacion([sujeto(['This']), verbo([suggests]), complemento([that, reduction, of, neurotransmitter, release, in, the, hippocampus, has, possible, relevance, for, the, rapid, antidepressant, effect, of, ketamine])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', open, field, 'test,', 'BPA', at, 0.4, ',', 4, ',', or, 40, 'mg/kg/day']), verbo([increased]), complemento([the, frequency, of, rearing, and, time, in, the, central, area, of, the, 'males,', while, 'BPA', at, 0.4, 'mg/kg/day', reduced, the, frequency, of, rearing, in, the, females])]). relacion([sujeto(['Exposure', to, 'BPA', '(', 0.4, or, 40, 'mg/kg/day)', extended, the, average, escape, pathlength, to, the, hidden, platform, in, 'Morris', water, maze, task, and, shortened, the, 'step-down', latency, 24, h, after, footshock, of, the, 'males,', but, no, changes, were]), verbo([found]), complemento([in, the, females, for, these, measures])]). relacion([sujeto(['Meanwhile,', 'BPA']), verbo([induced]), complemento([a, reduced, numeric, synaptic, density, and, a, negative, effect, on, the, structural, parameters, of, synaptic, 'interface,', including, an, enlarged, synaptic, cleft, and, the, reduced, length, of, active, zone, and, 'PSD', 'thickness,', in, the, hippocampus, of, the, male, mice])]). relacion([sujeto(['These', results]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, 'long-term', exposure, to, low, levels, of, 'BPA', in, adulthood, 'sex-specifically', impaired, spatial, and, passive, avoidance, memory, of, mice])]). relacion([sujeto(['These', effects, may, be]), verbo([associated]), complemento([with, the, higher, susceptibility, of, the, hippocampal, synaptic, plasticity, 'processes,', such, as, remodeling, of, spinal, synapses, and, the, expressions, of, synaptic, proteins, '(', e])]). relacion([sujeto(['Increasing', evidence]), verbo([reveals]), complemento([that, 'kalirin,', a, 'Rho-guanine', nucleotide, exchange, 'factor,', modulates, 'PSD-95-NR2B-dependent', neuroplasticity])]). relacion([sujeto(['Our', laboratory, recently, demonstrated, that, 'serum-inducible', and, 'glucocorticoid-inducible', kinase, 1, '(', 'SGK1)']), verbo([participates]), complemento([in, 'inflammation-associated', pain, hypersensitivity, by, modulating, spinal, glutamatergic, neurotransmission])]). relacion([sujeto(['Because', kalirin, is, one, of, the, proteins, in, 'PSD', that, is, highly]), verbo([phosphorylated]), complemento([by, various, 'kinases,', we, tested, whether, kalirin, could, be, a, downstream, target, of, spinal, 'SGK1', that, participates, in, neuropathic, pain, development, via, regulation, of, the, 'PSD-95-NR2B', 'coupling-dependent', phosphorylation, of, 'NR2B'])]). relacion([sujeto(['We', observed, that, spinal, nerve, ligation, '(', 'SNL,', 'L5)', in, male, 'Sprague', 'Dawley', rats, resulted, in, behavioral, 'allodynia,', which, was]), verbo([associated]), complemento([with, phosphorylated, 'SGK1', '(', 'pSGK1),', 'kalirin,', and, phosphorylated, 'NR2B', '(', 'pNR2B)', expression, and, an, increase, in, 'pSGK1-kalirin-PSD-95-pNR2B', coprecipitation, in, the, ipsilateral, dorsal, horn, '(', 'L4-L5)'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Small-interfering', 'RNA', '(', 'siRNA)', that]), verbo([targeted]), complemento([spinal, kalirin, mRNA, expression, '(', 10, 'μg,', 10, 'μl;', i])]). relacion([sujeto(['We']), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, nerve, injury, could, induce, spinal, 'SGK1', phosphorylation, that, subsequently, interacts, with, and, upregulates, kalirin, to, participate, in, neuropathic, pain, development, via, 'PSD-95-NR2B', 'coupling-dependent', 'NR2B', phosphorylation])]). relacion([sujeto(['Long-term', potentiation, '(', 'LTP)', of, synaptic, transmission, in, the, 'CA1', region, of, the, hippocampus, depends, on, the, activation, of, 'N-methyl-D-aspartate', receptors, '(', 'NMDARs),', which, can, be]), verbo([regulated]), complemento([by, 'Ca²⁺-dependent', release, of, 'D-serine', from, astrocytes])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', detailed, mechanism, underlying, astrocytic, 'd-serine']), verbo([release]), complemento([is, still, unknown])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', hippocampal, slices, prepared, from, 'Sprague-Dawley', 'rats,', we]), verbo([found]), complemento([that, clamping, astrocytic, '[', 'Ca²⁺]', at, 100, -, 150, nM, or, puffing, artificial, cerebrospinal, fluid, '(', 'ACSF)', into, the, extracellular, space, '(', weak, mechanical, 'stimulation)', enhanced, the, synaptic, activation, of, 'NMDARs'])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', enhancement, was, blocked, by, the, 'NMDAR', glycine, site, antagonist, 5, ',', 7, -, dichlorokynurenic, 'acid,', glycine, 'saturation,', and, infusion, of, astrocytes, with, 'D-amino', acid, oxidase, and, the, serine, racemase, inhibitor, 'L-erythro-3-hydroxyaspartate,']), verbo([suggesting]), complemento([the, involvement, of, astrocytic, 'D-serine', release])]). relacion([sujeto(['Intracellular', 100, -, 150, nM, '[', 'Ca²⁺]', or, puffing, 'ACSF']), verbo([stimulated]), complemento([astrocytes, to, generate, 'D-serine-containing', large, vesicles, '(', 1, -, 3, 'μm),', exocytotic, fusion, of, which, released, 'D-serine'])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', formation, of, astrocytic, large, vesicles]), verbo([involved]), complemento([the, intracellular, fusion, of, small, vesicles, 'and/or', other, organelles])]). relacion([sujeto(['Spontaneous', fusion, of, large, vesicles, occurred, occasionally, in, astrocytes, at, 'rest,', contributing, to, baseline, 'D-serine', 'levels,', which]), verbo([increased]), complemento([the, rising, slope, of, 'NMDAR', 'post-burst', potentiation, '(', 'PBP)', without, altering, the, 'PBP', peak, amplitude])]). relacion([sujeto(['Thus,', under, physiological, 'conditions,', astrocytic, 'D-serine']), verbo([release]), complemento([by, large, vesicles, facilitated, weak, 'theta-burst', '(', 'TBS', consisting, of, five, 'bursts),', but, not, strong, 'TBS', '(', 'TBS', consisting, of, 10, 'bursts)', 'stimulation-induced', 'LTP'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Several', lines, of, evidence]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, common, polygenic, variation, influences, brain, function, in, humans])]). relacion([sujeto(['Genetic', markers, moderately]), verbo([associated]), complemento(['(', 'p<10(-4))', with, whole, brain, activation, phenotypes, constructed, by, applying, principal, components, to, contrast, 'maps,', were, tested, for, pathway, enrichment, using, permutation, based, methods])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', most, significant, pathways, are, related, to, post, 'NMDA', receptor, activation, 'events,', driven, by, genetic, variants, in, 'calcium/calmodulin-dependent', protein, kinase, 'II', '(', 'CAMK2G,', 'CAMK2D)', and, a, 'calcium-regulated', nucleotide, exchange, factor, '(', 'RASGRF2)', in, which, all, are]), verbo([activated]), complemento([by, intracellular, 'calcium/calmodulin'])]). relacion([sujeto([3, ×, 10, '(', -, 9, ')', ')', ',', a, region, primarily]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, semantic, processing, but, also, involved, in, processing, negative, emotions])]). relacion([sujeto(['These', findings]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, pathway, analysis, of, 'GWAS', results, derived, from, principal, component, analysis, of, fMRI, data, is, a, promising, 'method,', to, our, 'knowledge,', not, previously, described])]). relacion([sujeto(['Understanding', how, brief, synaptic, events, can]), verbo([lead]), complemento([to, sustained, changes, in, synaptic, structure, and, strength, is, a, necessary, step, in, solving, the, rules, governing, learning, and, memory])]). relacion([sujeto(['Activation', of, 'ERK1/2', '(', extracellular, signal]), verbo([regulated]), complemento([protein, kinase, 1, /, 2, ')', plays, a, key, role, in, the, control, of, functional, and, structural, synaptic, plasticity])]). relacion([sujeto(['One', of, the]), verbo([triggering]), complemento([events, that, activates, 'ERK1/2', cascade, is, an, 'NMDA', receptor, '(', 'NMDAR)-dependent', rise, in, free, intracellular, 'Ca(2+)', concentration])]). relacion([sujeto(['Here', we, demonstrate, that, although, synaptic, activation, in, mouse, cultured, cortical, neurons]), verbo([induces]), complemento([intracellular, 'Ca(2+)', elevation, via, both, 'GluN2A', and, 'GluN2B-containing', 'NMDARs,', only, 'GluN2B-containing', 'NMDAR', activation, leads, to, a, 'long-lasting', 'ERK1/2', phosphorylation])]). relacion([sujeto(['We', show, that, 'αCaMKII,', but, not, 'βCaMKII,', is, critically]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, this, 'GluN2B-dependent', activation, of, 'ERK1/2', 'signaling,', through, a, direct, interaction, between, 'GluN2B', and, αCaMKII])]). relacion([sujeto(['We', then, show, that, interfering, with, 'GluN2B/αCaMKII', interaction]), verbo([prevents]), complemento([synaptic, activity, from, inducing, 'ERK-dependent', increases, in, synaptic, 'AMPA', receptors, and, spine, volume])]). relacion([sujeto(['Thus,', in, a, developing, circuit, 'model,', the, brief, activity, of, synaptic, 'GluN2B-containing', receptors, and, the, interaction, between, 'GluN2B', and, αCaMKII]), verbo([have]), complemento([a, role, in, 'long-term', plasticity, via, the, control, of, 'ERK1/2', signaling])]). relacion([sujeto(['Our', findings]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, the, roles, that, these, major, molecular, elements, have, in, learning, and, memory, may, operate, through, a, common, pathway])]). relacion([sujeto(['Synaptic', 'plasticity,', the, cellular, basis, of, learning, and, 'memory,']), verbo([involves]), complemento([the, dynamic, trafficking, of, 'AMPA', receptors, '(', 'AMPARs)', into, and, out, of, synapses])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', 'particular,', the, identity, of, 'AMPAR', scaffolding, 'molecule(s)']), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, the, maintenance, of, 'GluA2-containing', 'AMPARs', is, completely, unknown])]). relacion([sujeto(['Here', we]), verbo([report]), complemento([that, the, synaptic, scaffolding, molecule, '(', 'S-SCAM;', also, called, 'membrane-associated', guanylate, kinase, 'inverted-2', and, atrophin, interacting, 'protein-1)', plays, the, critical, role, of, maintaining, synaptic, strength])]). relacion([sujeto(['Increasing', 'S-SCAM', levels, in, rat, hippocampal, neurons]), verbo([led]), complemento([to, specific, increases, in, the, surface, 'AMPAR', 'levels,', enhanced, 'AMPAR-mediated', synaptic, 'transmission,', and, enlargement, of, dendritic, 'spines,', without, significantly, effecting, 'GluN', levels, or, 'NMDA', receptor, '(', 'NMDAR)', 'EPSC'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Conversely,']), verbo([decreasing]), complemento(['S-SCAM', levels, by, 'RNA', 'interference-mediated', knockdown, caused, the, loss, of, synaptic, 'AMPARs,', which, was, followed, by, a, severe, reduction, in, the, dendritic, spine, density])]). relacion([sujeto(['Importantly,', 'S-SCAM']), verbo([regulated]), complemento([synaptic, 'AMPAR', levels, in, a, 'manner,', dependent, on, 'GluA2', not, 'GluA1,', sensitive, to, 'N-ethylmaleimide-sensitive', fusion, protein, 'interaction,', and, independent, of, activity])]). relacion([sujeto(['Further,', 'S-SCAM']), verbo([increased]), complemento([surface, 'AMPAR', levels, in, the, absence, of, 'PSD-95,', while, 'PSD-95', was, dependent, on, 'S-SCAM', to, increase, surface, 'AMPAR', levels])]). relacion([sujeto(['Finally,', 'S-SCAM', overexpression, hampered, 'NMDA-induced', internalization, of, 'AMPARs', and]), verbo([prevented]), complemento([the, induction, of, long, 'term-depression,', while, 'S-SCAM', knockdown, did, not])]). relacion([sujeto(['Together,', these, results]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, 'S-SCAM', is, an, essential, 'AMPAR', scaffolding, molecule, for, the, 'GluA2-containing', pool, of, 'AMPARs,', which, are, involved, in, the, constitutive, pathway, of, maintaining, synaptic, strength])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', expression, levels, of, its, 'NR1', subunit, are, altered, dramatically, by, morphine, but, no, changes, in, its, alternative, splicing]), verbo([have]), complemento([been, reported])]). relacion([sujeto(['Morphine']), verbo([decreased]), complemento([pain, sensitivity, as, expected, but, also, increased, motivational, reward, seeking, in, this, task])]). relacion([sujeto(['NMDAR', antagonism, potentiated, this, reward, seeking, behavior]), verbo([suggesting]), complemento([that, instead, of, attenuating, 'tolerance,', 'MK-801', may, actually, alter, the, rewarding, 'and/or', motivational, properties, of, morphine])]). relacion([sujeto(['When', 'combined,', 'MK-801', and, morphine, had, an, additive, effect, which]), verbo([led]), complemento([to, altered, splicing, in, the, 'accumbens,', 'AMY,', and, the, 'HIPP'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Chronic', arsenic, exposure]), verbo([has]), complemento([an, adverse, effect, on, neurobehavioral, function])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', 'NMDA', receptor, and, the, postsynaptic, signaling, proteins, 'CaMKII,', postsynaptic, density, protein, 95, '(', 'PSD-95),', synaptic, 'Ras', 'GTPase-activating', protein, '(', 'SynGAP)', and]), verbo([nuclear]), complemento([activated, 'extracellular-signal', regulated, kinase, '(', 'ERK1/2)', play, important, roles, in, synaptic, 'plasticity,', learning, and, memory])]). relacion([sujeto(['Decreased', protein, expression, of, 'NR2A,', 'PSD-95', and, 'p-CaMKII', α, in, the, hippocampus, of, 'arsenite-exposed', rats, was, 'observed,', while, the, expression, of, 'SynGAP,', a, negative, regulator, of, 'Ras-MAPK', 'activity,', was]), verbo([increased]), complemento([when, compared, with, the, controls])]). relacion([sujeto(['Additionally,']), verbo([decreased]), complemento(['p-ERK1/2', activity, was, found, in, the, hippocampus, of, 'arsenite-exposed', rats])]). relacion([sujeto(['These', data]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, altered, expression, of, 'NMDA', receptor, complex, and, postsynaptic, signaling, proteins, may, explain, 'arsenic-induced', neurotoxicity])]). relacion([sujeto(['NMDA', receptor, activation]), verbo([leads]), complemento([to, 'clathrin-dependent', endocytosis, of, postsynaptic, 'AMPA', receptors])]). relacion([sujeto(['Although', this, process, controls, 'long-term', depression, '(', 'LTD)', induction, in, the, 'hippocampus,', how, it, is]), verbo([regulated]), complemento([by, neuronal, activities, is, not, completely, clear])]). relacion([sujeto(['Here,', we, show, that, 'Ca²⁺', influx, through, the, 'NMDA', receptor]), verbo([activates]), complemento([calcineurin, and, protein, phosphatase, 1, to, dephosphorylate, phosphatidylinositol, 4, -, phosphate, 5, -, kinaseγ661, '(', 'PIP5Kγ661),', the, major, phosphatidylinositol, 4, ',', 5, -, bisphosphate, '(', 'PI(4,5)P₂)-producing', enzyme, in, the, brain])]). relacion([sujeto(['Bimolecular', fluorescence, complementation, analysis, revealed, that, the, dephosphorylated, 'PIP5Kγ661', became]), verbo([associated]), complemento([with, the, clathrin, adaptor, protein, complex, 'AP-2', at, postsynapses, in, situ])]). relacion([sujeto(['NMDA-induced', 'AMPA', receptor, endocytosis, and, 'low-frequency', 'stimulation-induced', 'LTD', were, completely, blocked, by]), verbo([inhibiting]), complemento([the, association, between, dephosphorylated, 'PIP5Kγ661', and, 'AP-2', and, by, overexpression, of, a, 'kinase-dead', 'PIP5Kγ661', mutant, in, hippocampal, neurons])]). relacion([sujeto(['Furthermore,', knockdown, of, 'PIP5Kγ661']), verbo([inhibited]), complemento([the, 'NMDA-induced', 'AMPA', receptor, endocytosis])]). relacion([sujeto(['Therefore,', 'NMDA', receptor, activation, controls, 'AMPA', receptor, endocytosis, during, hippocampal, 'LTD', by]), verbo([regulating]), complemento(['PIP5Kγ661', activity, at, postsynapses])]). relacion([sujeto(['It']), verbo([induces]), complemento([convulsions, due, to, its, antagonism, of, the, 'γ-aminobutyric', acid, 'A', receptor, '(', 'GABA(A)R)'])]). relacion([sujeto(['We']), verbo([have]), complemento([previously, reported, that, 'long-term', exposure, to, dieldrin, causes, the, internalization, of, the, 'N-methyl-D-aspartate', receptor, '(', 'NMDAR)', as, a, result, of, persistent, 'GABA(A)R', inhibition])]). relacion([sujeto(['Because', the, neurosteroids, 17, 'β-estradiol', '(', 'E2)', and, allopregnanolone, are, known, to]), verbo([modulate]), complemento([the, function, and, trafficking, of, 'GABA(A)R', and, 'NMDAR,', we, examined, the, effects, of, 'E2', and, allopregnanolone, on, 'dieldrin-induced', 'GABA(A)R', 'inhibition,', 'NMDAR', 'internalization,', and, neuronal, death, in, cortical, neurons])]). relacion([sujeto(['We']), verbo([found]), complemento([that, 1, nM, 'E2', increased, the, membrane, expression, of, 'NR1/NR2B', receptors, and, postsynaptic, density, 95, but, did, not, induce, their, physical, association])]). relacion([sujeto(['We', also]), verbo([found]), complemento([that, exposure, to, 60, nM, dieldrin, for, 6, d, in, vitro, caused, the, internalization, of, 'NR1', and, 'NR2B', but, not, 'NR2A'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Treatment', with, either, 1, nM, 'E2', or, 10, μM, allopregnanolone]), verbo([prevented]), complemento([the, 'dieldrin-induced', reduction, in, membrane, levels, of, the, 'NR1/NR2B', receptors])]). relacion([sujeto(['Furthermore,', prolonged, exposure, to, 200, nM, dieldrin, 'down-regulated', the, expression, of, 'NR2A;', this, was]), verbo([inhibited]), complemento([only, by, allopregnanolone])]). relacion([sujeto(['Although', both, hormones, restored, 'NMDAR', 'function,', as, measured, by, the, 'NMDA-induced', rise, in, intracellular, 'calcium,', allopregnanolone, '(', but, not, 'E2)', reversed, the, inhibition, of, 'GABA(A)R', and, neuronal, death]), verbo([caused]), complemento([by, prolonged, exposure, to, dieldrin])]). relacion([sujeto(['Our', results, indicate, that, allopregnanolone, protects, cortical, neurons, against, the, neurotoxicity]), verbo([caused]), complemento([by, 'long-term', exposure, to, dieldrin, by, maintaining, 'GABA(A)R', and, 'NMDAR', functionality])]). relacion([sujeto(['N-methyl-D-aspartate', '(', 'NMDA)', 'receptors,', critical, in, learning, and, 'ERK)', 1, /, 2])]). relacion([sujeto(['At', 3, months, 'post-anesthesia,', rats, treated, with, anesthesia, at, 18, -, 'months-old', demonstrated, spatial, learning, impairment, corresponding, to, acute, and, 'long-term']), verbo([increases]), complemento([in, 'NR2B', protein, expression, and, a, reduction, in, 'phospho-ERK1/2', in, the, hippocampus, and, cortex])]). relacion([sujeto(['Ro', 25, -, 6981, pretreatment, attenuated, the]), verbo([increase]), complemento([in, acute, 'NR2B', protein, expression])]). relacion([sujeto(['Our', findings]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([a, role, for, discussed])]). relacion([sujeto(['A', small, number, of, 'rare,', recurrent, genomic, copy, number, variants, '(', 'CNVs)', are, known, to, substantially]), verbo([increase]), complemento([susceptibility, to, schizophrenia])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', a, sample, of, 662, schizophrenia, 'proband-parent', 'trios,', we]), verbo([found]), complemento([that, rare, de, novo, directly]), verbo([regulate]), complemento(['DLG', family, members])]). relacion([sujeto(['Genes', that]), verbo([mediate]), complemento([mate, preferences, potentially, play, a, key, role, in, promoting, and, maintaining, biological, diversity])]). relacion([sujeto(['Results']), verbo([reveal]), complemento([that, one, poeciliid, 'fish,', the, 'Northern', 'swordtail,', exhibits, robust, these, 'species,']), verbo([suggesting]), complemento([that, this, genetic, pathway, may, potentially, act, as, a, substrate, for, the, evolution, of, mate, preference, behavior])]). relacion([sujeto(['CALHM1', '(', calcium, homoeostasis, modulator, 1, ')', ',', a, membrane, protein, with, similarity, to, 'NMDA', '(', 'N-methyl-D-aspartate)', receptor, channels, that, localizes, in, the, plasma, membrane, and, the, 'ER', '(', endoplasmic, 'reticulum)', of, 'neurons,']), verbo([has]), complemento([been, shown, to, generate, a, 'plasma-membrane', 'Ca(2+)', conductance, and, has, been, proposed, to, influence, 'Alzheimer\'s', disease, risk])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', the, present, study, we]), verbo([have]), complemento([investigated, the, effects, of, 'CALHM1', on, by, using, targeted, aequorins, for, selective, monitorization, of, 'Ca(2+)', transport, by, organelles])]). relacion([sujeto(['We']), verbo([find]), complemento([that, 'CALHM1', increases, 'Ca(2+)', leak, from, the, 'ER', 'and,', more, 'importantly,', reduces, 'ER', 'Ca(2+)', uptake, by, decreasing, both, the, transport, capacity, and, the, 'Ca(2+)', affinity, of, 'SERCA', '(', 'sarcoplasmic/endoplasmic', reticulum, 'Ca(2+)-ATPase)'])]). relacion([sujeto(['This', reduction, in, the, 'Ca(2+)', content, of, the, 'ER']), verbo([triggered]), complemento([the, 'UPR', '(', 'GRP78', '(', 'glucose-regulated', protein, of, 78, 'kDa)', and, 'XBP1', '(', 'X-box-binding', protein, 1, ')'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Thus', 'CALHM1', might]), verbo([provide]), complemento([a, relevant, link, between, 'Ca(2+)', homoeostasis, 'disruption,', 'ER', stress, and, cell, damage, in, the, pathogenesis, of, neurodegenerative, diseases])]). relacion([sujeto(['Synapse-associated', protein, 102, '(', 'SAP102)', is, a, 'MAGUK', that, is, highly]), verbo([expressed]), complemento([early, in, development, and, mediates, receptor, trafficking, during, synaptogenesis])]). relacion([sujeto(['Mutations', in, human, 'SAP102']), verbo([cause]), complemento([mental, 'retardation,', which, is, often, accompanied, with, abnormalities, in, dendritic, spines])]). relacion([sujeto(['However,', little, is, known, about, the, role, of, 'SAP102', in]), verbo([regulating]), complemento([synapse, formation, or, spine, morphology])]). relacion([sujeto(['We', now]), verbo([find]), complemento([that, 'SAP102', contains, a, novel, 'NMDA', receptor, binding, site, in, the, 'N-terminal', 'domain,', which, is, specific, for, the, 'NR2B', subunit])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', interaction, between, 'SAP102', and, 'NR2B', is, 'PDZ', '(', postsynaptic, 'density-95/Discs', 'large/zona', 'occludens-1)', domain, independent, and, is]), verbo([regulated]), complemento([by, alternative, splicing, of, 'SAP102'])]). relacion([sujeto(['We', show, that, 'SAP102', that, possesses, an, 'N-terminal', insert, is, developmentally]), verbo([regulated]), complemento([at, both, mRNA, and, protein, levels])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', 'addition,', expression, of, 'SAP102']), verbo([increases]), complemento([synapse, formation])]). relacion([sujeto(['Furthermore,', the, alternative, splicing, of, 'SAP102']), verbo([regulates]), complemento([dendritic, spine, morphology])]). relacion([sujeto(['SAP102', containing, the, 'N-terminal', insert]), verbo([promotes]), complemento([lengthening, of, dendritic, spines, and, preferentially, promotes, the, formation, of, synapses, at, long, 'spines,', whereas, a, short, hairpin, 'RNA', knockdown, of, the, same, 'SAP102', splice, variant, causes, spine, shrinkage])]). relacion([sujeto(['Finally,', blocking, 'NMDA', receptor, activity]), verbo([prevents]), complemento([the, spine, lengthening, induced, by, the, 'N-terminal', splice, variant, of, 'SAP102'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Thus,', our, data]), verbo([provide]), complemento([the, first, evidence, that, 'SAP102', links, 'NMDA', receptor, activation, to, alterations, in, spine, morphology])]). relacion([sujeto(['Membrane', receptors, transduce, external, signals, into, cellular, responses, by]), verbo([activating]), complemento([cytosolic, metabolic, pathways])]). relacion([sujeto(['Regulation', of, the, spatial, and, temporal, distribution, of, membrane, receptors, begins, to, be]), verbo([recognized]), complemento([as, an, important, mechanism, for, controlling, the, magnitude, and, time, course, of, cellular, signaling, '[', 1, ']'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Similarly,', 'short-term', changes, in, synaptic, function, can, be, achieved, by, altering, the, levels, of, key, surface, proteins]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, synaptic, 'transmission,', such, as, neurotransmitter, receptors, and, transporters, '[', 1, ']'])]). relacion([sujeto(['These', processes]), verbo([increase]), complemento([the, complexity, of, the, signaling, mechanisms, in, peripheral, and, central, synapses])]). relacion([sujeto(['Protein', trafficking, 'studies,', carried, out, in, yeast, and, mammalian, 'cells,']), verbo([have]), complemento([revealed, the, underlying, mechanism, by, which, proteins, travel, between, intracellular, compartments, and, the, plasma, membrane])]). relacion([sujeto(['Membrane', proteins, are]), verbo([synthesized]), complemento([in, the, endoplasmic, reticulum, '(', 'ER),', and, ensuing, posttranslational, modifications, such, as, glycosylation, take, place, in, both, the, 'ER', and, the, 'Golgi', apparatus])]). relacion([sujeto(['Appropriately', folded, and, assembled, membrane, proteins, are, subsequently, sorted, out, into, vesicles, for, trafficking, and, delivery, to, the, cell, surface, by, a, constitutive, or]), verbo([regulated]), complemento([pathway, of, vesicle, exocytosis, '[', 4, ']'])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', constitutive, exocytotic, route, is, primarily, used, by, cells, for, turnover, of, both, membrane, proteins, and, 'lipids,', thus]), verbo([ensuring]), complemento([the, removal, of, aged, or, damaged, membrane, components])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', 'contrast,', the]), verbo([regulated]), complemento([secretory, pathway, is, used, by, specialized, 'cells,', such, as, endocrine, 'cells,', 'neurons,', acinar, cells, of, the, 'pancreas,', mast, 'cells,', 'insulin-sensitive', 'cells,', and, many, other, cell, 'types,', as, a, mechanism, of, cellular, communication])]). relacion([sujeto(['Regulated', exocytosis, is, produced, only, in, response, to, a, stimulus, that]), verbo([provokes]), complemento([the, 'mobilization,', 'docking,', and, fusion, of, an, intracellular, pool, of, vesicles, stored, near, the, membrane, region, where, they, will, fuse, and, release, their, components, '[', 1, '–', 5, ']'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Mechanistically,', both, types, of, exocytosis, use, a, cascade, of, 'protein–protein', interactions, to]), verbo([ensure]), complemento([the, efficient, delivery, of, their, vesicle, cargo, to, the, membrane, '[', 2, ',', 5, ']'])]). relacion([sujeto(['At', a, molecular, 'level,', vesicle, traffic, uses, the, 'SNAREs', '(', soluble, 'N-ethylmaleimide-sensitive', factor, attachment, protein, 'receptors),', a, large, family, of, proteins, that, are, present, on, all, organelles, and]), verbo([mediate]), complemento([intracellular, vesicle, trafficking, and, secretion, '(', 'Figure', 23.1, ')', '[', 2, ',', 5, ']'])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', interaction, of, complementary, 'SNARE', proteins]), verbo([found]), complemento([on, opposing, membranes, exemplifies, an, attractive, 'lock-and-key', 'mechanism,', which, presumably, underlies, the, remarkable, specificity, of, vesicle, docking, to, target, membranes, and, their, consequent, fusion, '[', 5, ']'])]). relacion([sujeto(['For', 'instance,', the, interaction, of, the, vesicle, membrane, 'SNARE', '(', 'v-SNARE)', synaptobrevin, 2, ',', and, the, corresponding, 'SNAREs', in, the]), verbo([target]), complemento([membrane, '(', 't-SNAREs),', syntaxin, 1, and, 'SNAP25,', results, in, the, formation, of, a, remarkably, stable, ternary, complex, that, ensures, the, docking, and, fusion, of, vesicles, at, the, active, zone, upon, receiving, the, 'stimulus,', normally, an, increase, in, the, intracellular, concentration, of, 'Ca2+', '(', '[', 'Ca', '[', 2, ']', ']', 'i)'])]). relacion([sujeto([+, 5, 'Similarly,', molecular, interactions, of, synaptobrevin, 2, analogues, with, syntaxin, 1, and, 'SNAP25-like']), verbo([target]), complemento([membrane, proteins, are, thought, to, be, essential, for, vesicle, targeting, and, fusion, in, all, eukaryotes, '[', 2, ']'])]). relacion([sujeto(['It', is, quite, well, established, that, a, significant]), verbo([increase]), complemento([in, '[', 'Ca2+]i', is, required, for, triggering, the, 'SNARE-mediated', fusion, of, secretory, 'vesicles,', although, 'SNARE-dependent', relacion([sujeto(['Nonetheless,', the, rate, of, vesicle, recycling, is]), verbo([regulated]), complemento([by, changes, in, the, '[', 'Ca2+]i', 'Vesicle', exocytosis, is, a, highly, regulated, process, counterbalanced, by, endocytosis, of, membrane, components, that, ensures, constant, plasma, membrane, content])]). relacion([sujeto(['Internalization', of, receptors, and, transporters, is]), verbo([mediated]), complemento([by, a, general, 'clathrin-dependent', pathway, that, moves, endocytosed, proteins, to, the, endosome, for, appropriate, sorting, into, 'vesicles,', either, for, release, or, for, transport, depending, on, their, final, destination, '[', 3, ',', 4, ']'])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', endosome, also]), verbo([provides]), complemento([a, mechanism, to, maintain, the, proper, composition, of, release, vesicle, proteins, by, adding, newly, synthesized, vesicle, 'proteins,', removing, aged, polypeptides, for, 'degradation,', and, separating, nonsecretory, vesicle, proteins, '[', 3, ']'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Recent', evidence]), verbo([suggests]), complemento([that, synaptic, vesicles, are, most, likely, formed, at, the, nerve, terminal, by, endocytosis])]). relacion([sujeto(['This', novel, notion, considers, that, newly]), verbo([synthesized]), complemento([membrane, proteins, traffic, to, the, nerve, terminal, in, transport, packets, and, become, incorporated, into, synaptic, vesicles, at, the, 'synapse,', thus, indicating, that, synaptic, vesicle, formation, relies, primarily, on, an, endocytotic, pathway, '[', 3, ',', 4, ']'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Traditionally,', the, constitutive, exocytotic, pathway]), verbo([has]), complemento([been, associated, to, the, traffic, of, membrane, proteins, to, the, cell, 'surface,', while, the, regulated, secretory, pathway, has, been, implicated, in, the, 'activity-dependent', release, of, 'neurotransmitters,', 'neuropeptides,', and, hormones])]). relacion([sujeto(['However,', complemento([by, a, regulated, release, pathway, as, well, '[', 2, '–', 4, ']'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Indeed,', cumulative, evidence, indicates, that, the, function, of, these, plasma, membrane, 'P2X4', '[', 9, ']'])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', 'addition,', several, studies]), verbo([have]), complemento([demonstrated, that, this, signaling, pathway, is, also, commonly, used, by, members, of, the, transient, receptor, potential, '(', 'TRP)', family, of, ion, channels, for, modulation, of, their, physiological, function, '[', 10, ']'])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', 'CB(1)', receptor, agonist, 1400, 'W,', in, relatively, large, 'doses,']), verbo([inhibited]), complemento([in, a, non, 'dose-dependent', manner])]). relacion([sujeto(['These', findings]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, verbo([targeting]), complemento([of, this, adaptor, protein, might, represent, a, novel, therapeutic, strategy, to, suppress, seizure, activities])]). relacion([sujeto(['Sub-anesthetic', doses, of, ketamine]), verbo([have]), complemento([been, found, to, provide, rapid, antidepressant, 'actions,', indicating, that, the, cellular, signaling, systems, targeted, by, ketamine, are, potential, sites, for, therapeutic, intervention])]). relacion([sujeto(['Ketamine']), verbo([acts]), complemento([as, an, antagonist, of, 'N-methyl-D-aspartate', '(', 'NMDA)', 'receptors,', and, animal, studies, relacion([sujeto(['Treatment', with, an, antidepressant, dose, of, ketamine]), verbo([increased]), complemento([the, hippocampal, membrane, level, of, the, 'AMPA', glutamate, receptor, '(', 'GluA)1', complemento([reduced, phosphorylation, of, 'PSD-95,', diminishing, the, internalization, of, 'AMPA', 'GluA1', subunits, to, allow, for, augmented, signaling, through, 'AMPA', receptors, following, optimization, of, this, dissociated, neuronal, system, to, more, closely, reproduce, in, vivo, circuits]), verbo([has]), complemento([not, yet, been, explored])]). relacion([sujeto([1, :, 3, ')', at, lower, in, the, 1, :, 3, 'cocultures,', indicating]), verbo([enhanced]), complemento([loss, of, striatal, 'SPNs'])]). relacion([sujeto([1, :, 3, 'ratio,', we]), verbo([found]), complemento([that, relacion([sujeto(['However,', 'SPNs', in, the, cocultures, plated, at, the, lower, cortical, ratio, exhibited, reduced, membrane, capacitance, along, with, significantly, shorter, total, dendritic, 'length,']), verbo([decreased]), complemento([dendritic, 'complexity,', and, fewer, excitatory, 'synapses,', consistent, with, their, trend, toward, reduced, miniature, excitatory, postsynaptic, higher, in, the, less, cortical, coculture])]). relacion([sujeto(['Consistently,', 'SPNs', in, cocultures, with, reduced, cortical, input, showed]), verbo([decreased]), complemento([basal, 'pro-survival', signaling, through, cAMP, response, element, binding, protein, and, enhanced, sensitivity, to, 'NMDA-induced', apoptosis])]). relacion([sujeto(['Altogether,', our, study, indicates, that, abundance, of, cortical, input]), verbo([regulates]), complemento(['SPN', dendritic, arborization, and, 'survival/death', signaling])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', transmembrane, protein, assembly, 'γ-secretase', is, a, key, protease, in]), verbo([regulated]), complemento([intramembrane, processing, '(', 'RIP)', of, around, 100, 'type-1', transmembrane, proteins])]). relacion([sujeto(['Importantly,', it]), verbo([has]), complemento([a, pathological, role, in, 'Alzheimer', disease, '(', 'AD)', as, it, generates, the, neurotoxic, amyloid, 'β-peptide', from, the, amyloid, precursor, protein, '(', 'APP)'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Here,', we]), verbo([have]), complemento([used, a, powerful, combination, of, the, two, nanoscopy, techniques, 'STORM', and, 'STED', microscopy, to, visualize, the, location, of, 'γ-secretase', in, neurons, using, an, 'active-site', specific, 'probe,', with, a, focus, on, the, synapse])]). relacion([sujeto(['Importantly,', the, expression, of, 'γ-secretase']), verbo([increased]), complemento([in, the, 'pre-', and, postsynaptic, compartments, with, the, size, of, the, 'synapse,', suggesting, a, correlation, between, 'γ-secretase', activity, and, synapse, maturation])]). relacion([sujeto(['N-Methyl-d-aspartate', receptors, '(', 'NMDARs)', are, major]), verbo([targets]), complemento([of, both, acute, and, chronic, 'alcohol,', as, well, as, regulators, of, plasticity, in, a, number, of, brain, regions])]). relacion([sujeto(['Recent', work]), verbo([suggests]), complemento([that, chronic, alcohol, treatment, preferentially, modulates, both, the, expression, and, subcellular, localization, of, 'NMDARs', containing, the, 'GluN2B', subunit])]). relacion([sujeto(['Signaling', through, synaptic, and, extrasynaptic, 'GluN2B-NMDARs']), verbo([has]), complemento([already, been, implicated, in, the, pathophysiology, of, various, other, neurological, disorders])]). relacion([sujeto(['NMDARs']), verbo([interact]), complemento([with, a, large, number, of, proteins, at, the, glutamate, 'synapse,', and, a, better, understanding, of, how, alcohol, modulates, this, proteome, is, needed])]). relacion([sujeto(['We', employed, a, 'discovery-based', proteomic, approach, in, subcellular, fractions, of, hippocampal, tissue, from, chronic, intermittent, alcohol, '(', 'CIE)-exposed', 'C57Bl/6J', 'CA1', following, 'CIE'])]). relacion([sujeto(['These', data]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, 'CIE', specifically, disrupts, 'mGlu1/5', -, 'LTD,', representing, a, possible, connection, relacion([sujeto(['Excessive', 'N-methyl-D-aspartate', receptor, '(', 'NMDAR)', activation, and, the, resulting, activation, of, neuronal, nitric, oxide, synthase, '(', 'nNOS)']), verbo([cause]), complemento([neuronal, injury])]). relacion([sujeto(['We']), verbo([report]), complemento([that, 'Homer1a', was, both, upregulated, by, and, protected, against, 'NMDA-induced', neuronal, injury, in, vitro, and, in, vivo])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', neuroprotective, activity, of, 'Homer1a', was]), verbo([associated]), complemento([with, 'NMDA-induced', 'Ca2+', 'influx,', oxidative, stress, and, the, resultant, downstream, signaling, activation])]). relacion([sujeto(['Additionally,', we]), verbo([found]), complemento([that, 'Homer1a', functionally, regulated, 'NMDAR', channel, properties, in, whereas, the, dynamic, global, changes, at, these, synapses, have, remained, unknown])]). relacion([sujeto(['However,', 423, proteins, were, significantly]), verbo([regulated]), complemento([4, h, using, intact, mitochondria, isolated, from, fed, rat, liver, or, from, 'Saccharomyces', cerevisiae]), verbo([expressing]), complemento(['CPT1A', show, that, 'CPT1A', 'self-assembles', into, an, of, its, quaternary, structure, is, a, trimer])]). relacion([sujeto(['When', studied, in, blue, 'native-PAGE,', the, 'CPT1A', hexamer, could, be, 'observed,', 'however,']), verbo([suggesting]), complemento([that, under, these, native, conditions, 'CPT1A', trimers, might, be, arranged, as, dimers])]). relacion([sujeto(['Moreover,', the, oligomeric, state, of, 'CPT1A', was]), verbo([found]), complemento([unchanged, by, starvation, and, by, 'streptozotocin-induced', 'diabetes,', conditions, characterized, by, changes, in, 'malonyl-CoA', sensitivity, of, 'CPT1A'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Finally,', gel, filtration, analysis, of, several, 'yeast-expressed', chimeric, 'CPTs', demonstrates, that, the, first, 147, 'N-terminal', residues, of, 'CPT1A,', encompassing, its, two, transmembrane, 'segments,']), verbo([trigger]), complemento([trimerization, independently, of, its, catalytic, 'C-terminal', domain])]). relacion([sujeto(['Based', on, these, 'findings,', we, facilitating, substrate, channeling])]). relacion([sujeto(['Although', nickel, and, cobalt, compounds]), verbo([have]), complemento([been, known, to, cause, induction, of, the, transcription, factor, 'hypoxia-inducible', factor, 1, '(', 'HIF-1)', and, activation, of, a, battery, of, 'hypoxia-inducible', genes, in, the, 'cell,', the, molecular, mechanisms, of, this, induction, remain, unclear])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', 'post-translational', modification, of, 'HIF-1a,', the, 'oxygen-sensitive', subunit, of, 'HIF-1,']), verbo([regulates]), complemento(['stabilization,', nuclear, of, their, 'N-terminal', cytoplasmic, tail])]). relacion([sujeto(['We', show, here, that, although, the, cytoplasmic, tail, seems, to, play, no, role, in, the, dimerization, of, 'PBP1b,', as, was, originally, 'suspected,', only, the, 'full-length', protein, is, able, to, protect, the, cells, against, lysis, when, both, 'PBP1a', and, 'PBP3', are]), verbo([inhibited]), complemento([by, '(', 'aa)']), verbo([has]), complemento([a, calculated, molecular, mass, of, 91.2, kDa, corresponding, to, the, size, of, the, protein, expressed, in, vitro, and, in, vivo])]). relacion([sujeto(['A', relacion([sujeto(['The', observed, extensive, homology, in, the]), verbo([modular]), complemento([design, of, the, 'Pa', 'PBP1A', with, the, bifunctional, 'Ec', 'PBP1A', suggests, structural, and,
