agents]), verbo([has]), complemento([been, discovered, which, exert, their, activity, by, blockade, of, 'myristoylCoA:', protein, 'N-myristoyltransferase', '(', 'NMT;', 'EC', 2.1])]). relacion([sujeto(['Genetic', experiments]), verbo([have]), complemento([established, that, 'NMT', is, needed, to, maintain, the, viability, of, 'Candida', albicans, and, 'Cryptococcus', 'neoformans,the', two, principal, causes, of, systemic, fungal, infections, in, immunocompromised, humans])]). relacion([sujeto(['Beginning', with, a, weak, octapeptide, inhibitor, 'ALYASKLS-NH2', '(', 2, ',', 'Ki', =, 15.3, +, /, -, 6.4, 'microM),', a, series, of, 'imidazole-substituted', 'Ser-Lys', dipeptide, amides]), verbo([have]), complemento([been, designed, and, synthesized, as, potent, and, selective, inhibitors, of, 'Candida', albicans, 'NMT'])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', strategy, that]), verbo([led]), complemento([to, these, inhibitors, evolved, from, the, identification, of, those, functional, groups, in, the, 'high-affinity', octapeptide, substrate, 'GLYASKLS-NH2', 1, a, necessary, for, tight, 'binding,', truncation, of, the, 'C-terminus,', replacement, of, the, four, amino, acids, at, the, 'N-terminus', by, a, spacer, 'group,', and, substitution, of, the, glycine, amino, group, with, an, 'N-linked', 2, -, methylimidazole, moiety])]). relacion([sujeto(['Initial', 'structure-activity', studies]), verbo([led]), complemento([to, the, identification, of, 31, as, a, potent, and, selective, peptidomimetic, inhibitor, with, an, 'IC50', of, 56, nM, and, 250, -, fold, selectivity, versus, human, 'NMT'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Groups', bulkier, than, 'methyl,', such, as, 'ethyl,', 'isopropyl,', or, 'iodo,', at, the, imidazole, 2, -, position]), verbo([have]), complemento([a, detrimental, effect, on, potency])]). relacion([sujeto(['Further', refinement, of, 31, by, grafting, an, 'alpha-methyl', group, at, the, benzylic, position, adjacent, to, the, serine, residue]), verbo([led]), complemento([to, 61, with, an, 'IC50', of, 40, nM])]). relacion([sujeto(['Subsequent', chiral, chromatography, of, 61, culminated, in, the, discovery, of, the, most, potent, 'Candida', 'NMT', inhibitor, 61, a]), verbo([reported]), complemento([to, date, with, an, 'IC50', of, 20, nM, and, 400, -, fold, selectivity, versus, the, human, enzyme])]). relacion([sujeto(['An', 'C-terminal', region, of, the, coding, sequence]), verbo([has]), complemento([the, ability, to, stabilize, the, native, 'three-dimensional', structure, and, further, affect, substrate, affinity])]). relacion([sujeto(['CarD']), verbo([has]), complemento([a, unique, 'two-domain', architecture, composed, 'of:', '(', 1, ')', a, 'C-terminal', 'DNA-binding', domain, that, resembles, eukaryotic, high, mobility, group, 'A', '(', 'HMGA)', 'proteins,', which, are, relatively, 'abundant,', nonhistone, components, of, chromatin, that, remodel, 'DNA', and, prime, it, for, the, assembly, of, 'multiprotein-DNA', complexes, essential, for, various, 'DNA', 'transactions,', and, '(', 2, ')', an, 'N-terminal', domain, involved, in, interactions, with, 'CarG', and, 'RNA', 'polymerase,', which, is, also, the, founding, member, of, the, large, 'CarD_TRCF', family, of, bacterial, proteins])]). relacion([sujeto(['CarG,', which, does, not]), verbo([bind]), complemento(['DNA', 'directly,', has, a, 'zinc-binding', motif, of, the, type, found, in, the, archaemetzincin, class, of, metalloproteases, 'that,', in, 'CarG,', appears, to, play, a, purely, structural, role])]). relacion([sujeto(['This', review, aims, to]), verbo([provide]), complemento([an, overview, of, the, known, molecular, details, and, insights, emerging, from, the, study, of, the, singular, pathway, of, proteasomal, proteolysis, and, the, leucine, at, the, 'N-terminus', appears, to, be, the, key, residue, recognized, by, 'N-end', rule, pathway])]). relacion([sujeto(['MprF', plays, a, deleted, for, either, 'NAT3', or, 'MDM20', displayed, different, growth, rates, and, morphologies, in, specific, stress, 'conditions,', demonstrating, that, the, two, 'NatB', subunits, have, partly, acetyltransferase])]). relacion([sujeto(['Dynamic', toggling, of, enhancers]), verbo([provides]), complemento([a, basis, for, 'B', cells, to, undergo, rapid, transcriptional, and, phenotypic, changes, in, response, to, signaling, or, environmental, cues])]). relacion([sujeto(['Cohesin\'s', 'Smc1', and, 'Smc3', subunits, form, 'V-shaped', 'heterodimers,', the, nucleotide]), verbo([binding]), complemento([domains, '(', 'NBDs)', of, which, bind, the, 'C-', and, 'N-terminal', 'domains,', 'respectively,', of, the, 'α-kleisin', 'subunit,', forming, a, large, tripartite, ring, within, in, '"', 'DNA', exit, gate])]). relacion([sujeto(['"', 'How', 'Scc3', and, 'Pds5,', regulatory, subunits]), verbo([bound]), complemento([to, 'α-kleisin,', regulate, cohesion, establishment, and, with, slow, inhibitory, postsynaptic, potentials])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', 'conclusion,', these, results]), verbo([provide]), complemento([the, first, direct, evidence, that, 'NK(1)R', mediate, relacion([sujeto(['These', results, also, demonstrate, that, slow, inhibitory, synaptic, 'transmission,', which, may, be]), verbo([mediated]), complemento([by, 5, -, 'hydroxytryptamine,', is, more, prevalent, in, the, myenteric, plexus, than, previously, indicated])]). relacion([sujeto(['Future', demographic, developments, will, challenge, urology, with, a, steadily]), verbo([increasing]), complemento([incidence, of, lower, urinary, tract, symptoms, '(', 'LUTS)', derived, from, the, aging, bladder])]). relacion([sujeto(['Obstruction,', instability, and, 'hypocontractility,', which, may, be]), verbo([caused]), complemento([by, changes, in, the, receptor, profile, of, the, 'detrusor,', are, typical, pathophysiologic, findings, in, geriatric, bladder, dysfunction])]). relacion([sujeto(['Muscarinic', '(', 'M(2),', 'M(3)),', purinergic, '(', 'P2X,', 'P2Y)', and, adrenergic, receptors, '(', 'alpha(1),', 'beta(3))', are]), verbo([targets]), complemento([of, efferent, norepinephrine, and, increases, 'alpha-adrenergic', bladder, susceptibility])]). relacion([sujeto(['Pharmacogenetics,', the, inherited, basis, for, interindividual, differences, in, drug, 'response,']), verbo([has]), complemento([rapidly, expanded, with, the, advent, of, new, molecular, tools, and, the, sequencing, of, the, human, 'genome,', yielding, pharmacogenomics])]). 'rare,', whereas, 'alpha(2)-AR', and, 'beta-AR', subtype, variants, are, quite, common])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', largest, amount, of, data, is, available, regarding, variants, of, the, latter, e])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', vitro, and, in, vivo, studies]), verbo([have]), complemento([yielded, inconsistent, 'results;', definitive, conclusions, are, limited])]). relacion([sujeto(['Thus,', complemento([been, shown, to, activate, 'G', 'protein-activated', inwardly, rectifying, 'K(+)', channels, '(', 'GIRKs)', via, pertussis, 'toxin-sensitive', 'G', proteins, in, atrial, myocytes, and, 'receptors,', while, the, 'Pd-1A/Pd-2A', to, 'fast-twitch', muscle, cell, connections, are, likely, 'cholinergic,', but, with, a, different, receptor, type])]). relacion([sujeto(['Two', 'ColQ', cascade, that, drives, the, expression, profiles, of, 'ColQ', in, responding, to, activity, challenge, in, cultured, myotubes])]). relacion([sujeto(['Blocking', open, ion, channels]), verbo([provides]), complemento([a, promising, way, to, modulate, synaptic, transmission])]). relacion([sujeto(['Using', the, 'muscle-type', acetylcholine, receptor, '(', 'AChR)', as, a, test, 'system,', we, seek, to, develop, blockers, that]), verbo([have]), complemento([blockade, kinetics, tunable, via, structural, modifications])]). relacion([sujeto(['Here', we, investigate, whether, the, blockade, kinetics, can, be]), verbo([modulated]), complemento([by, specifying, the, length, of, a, 'poly(ethylene', 'glycol)', '(', 'PEG)', spacer, incorporated, into, the, blocker])]). relacion([sujeto(['Single-channel', electrophysiological, experiments, show, that, simple, 'bis(trimethylammonium)', compounds, '(', 1, 'a-', 3, ')', both]), verbo([activate]), complemento([the, 'AChR', and, block, the, open, channel])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', blockade, kinetics, are]), verbo([found]), complemento([to, depend, on, spacer, 'length:', both, the, association, and, dissociation, rate, constants, decrease, with, increasing, spacer, length])]). relacion([sujeto(['The']), verbo([decrease]), complemento([in, the, association, rate, constant, can, be, quantitatively, explained, by, the, entropic, cost, of, polymer, confinement, in, the, transmembrane, 'lumen,', while, the, decrease, in, the, dissociation, rate, constant, is, consistent, with, 'weak,', additive, noncovalent, interactions, between, the, channel, and, the, spacer])]). relacion([sujeto(['These', results]), verbo([provide]), complemento([useful, insights, into, the, future, design, of, kinetically, tunable, 'open-channel', blockers, for, the, 'AChR'])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', developmental, neurotoxicity, of, organophosphates, such, as, chlorpyrifos, '(', 'CPF)']), verbo([involves]), complemento([multiple, mechanisms, that, ultimately, compromise, the, function, of, specific, neurotransmitter, 'systems,', notably, acetylcholine, '(', 'ACh)', and, serotonin, '(', 5, -, 'hydroxytryptamine,', 5, 'HT)'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Studies', in, mammalian, models, incorporate, both, direct, effects, on, brain, development, and, indirect, effects]), verbo([mediated]), complemento([through, maternal, physiology, and, 'maternal/neonatal', interactions])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', higher, dose]), verbo([caused]), complemento([a, reduction, in, cholinesterase, activity, but, there, was, no, consistent, downregulation, of, 'm(2)-muscarinic', 'ACh', receptors, as, would, have, been, expected, from, 'ACh', hyperstimulation])]). relacion([sujeto(['Both', doses, evoked, significant, reductions, in, the, presynaptic, 'high-affinity', choline, 'transporter,', the, 'rate-limiting', factor, in, 'ACh', 'biosynthesis,', as, monitored, by]), verbo([binding]), complemento([of, 'hemicholinium-3'])]). relacion([sujeto(['This']), verbo([suggests]), complemento([that, 'CPF', reduces, 'ACh', presynaptic, activity, rather, than, compromising, the, development, of, 'ACh', projections, per, se])]). relacion([sujeto(['These', effects, in, the, chick, model, recapitulate, many, of, the, actions, of, early, gestational, 'CPF', exposure, in, 'rats,', and, thus]), 'GABA']), verbo([release]), complemento([in, response, to, activation, of, inhibitory, 5, -, 'HT', 'heteroreceptors,', e])]). relacion([sujeto([',', 5, -, 'HT(1A)', or, 5, -, 'HT(1B)', receptors, on, 'GABAergic', interneurons, is]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, paradoxical, facilitation, of, hippocampal, acetylcholine, and, striatal, dopamine, 'release,', respectively])]). relacion([sujeto(['Such', 5, -, 'HT', heteroreceptors, are, considered, potential]), verbo([targets]), complemento([for, appropriate, 5, -, 'HT', receptor, ligands, 'which,', by, enhancing, the, release, of, a, relevant, 'neurotransmitter,', can, compensate, for, its, hypothesized, deficiency, in, distinct, brain, areas])]). relacion([sujeto(['Examples', for, such, deficiencies, are, the, impaired]), verbo([release]), complemento([of, hippocampal, or, neocortical, 'acetylcholine,', striatal, 'dopamine,', and, hippocampal, or, neocortical, noradrenaline, in, disorders, such, as, in, females, '(', to, 30, '%', of, control, 'approximately),', only, 'alpha(1A)-AR', level, diminished, '(', about, 50, '%', ')', in, males])]). relacion([sujeto(['beta(1)-AR']), verbo([decreased]), '%', ')'])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', 'conclusion,', in, mice, the, stress, reaction, is, sexually, dimorphic, and, an, intact, 'hypothalamo-pituitary-adrenocortical', system, is]), verbo([required]), complemento([for, the, normal, reaction, of, pulmonary, adrenergic, and, 'MR', to, stress])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', this, 'study,', we, analyzed, the, prognostic, value, of, the, liver, 'X', 'receptor-alpha', '(', 'LXR-alpha),', a]), verbo([nuclear]), complemento([receptor, of, a, family, of, cholesterol, derivatives, called, 'oxysterols,', in, patients, with, radically, resected, 'NSCLC'])]). relacion([sujeto(['At', least, with, regard, to, promotion, and, progression, of, 'cancer,', oxysterols, actually, appear, as, typical, 'Janus', 'molecules,', by]), verbo([inducing]), complemento([early, inflammatory, reaction, against, cancer, expansion, and, apoptotic, death, of, cancer, 'cells,', but, on, the, other, hand, sustaining, a, complex, survival, signaling, pathway, that, eventually, turns, in, favor, of, the, neoplastic, process, itself])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', 'pro-tumoral', and, 'anti-tumoral', properties, of, this, class, of, compounds, is]), verbo([mediated]), complemento([by, both, 'LXR-dependent', and, independent, mechanisms])]). relacion([sujeto(['They', are, the, natural, ligands, of, liver, 'X', receptors, '(', 'LXRs)', and, are, generally]), verbo([recognized]), complemento([as, hypocholesterolemic, and, 'anti-inflammatory', molecules, although, this, latter, property, is, still, controversial])]). relacion([sujeto(['Most', oxysterol, studies]), verbo([have]), complemento([been, performed, in, 'macrophages,', whereas, the, effects, of, oxysterols, in, neutrophils, are, poorly, known])]). relacion([sujeto(['An']), verbo([increase]), complemento([in, 'ROS', production, was, observed, within, a, short, period, of, time, '(', 'minutes)', with, both, molecules])]). relacion([sujeto(['These', oxysterols, also]), were]), verbo([associated]), complemento([with, high, lysozyme, enzyme, secretion, at, 5, and, 18, '\240\h', of, incubation])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', present, paper, describes, for, the, first, complemento([in, maintaining, cellular, cholesterol, levels])]). relacion([sujeto(['Recently,', oxysterols]), verbo([have]), complemento([been, demonstrated, to, modulate, the, function, of, immune, cells, and, tumor, growth])]). relacion([sujeto(['LXR-dependent', oxysterol, effects, can, be, ascribed, to, the, activation, of, 'LXRα,', 'LXRβ', or, 'LXRαβ', 'isoforms,', which]), verbo([induces]), complemento([transcriptional, activation, or, 'trans-repression', of, target, genes])]). relacion([sujeto(['Oxysterol-LXR', signaling]), verbo([has]), complemento([recently, been, shown, to, inhibit, antitumor, immune, 'responses,', as, well, as, to, modulate, tumor, cell, growth])]). relacion([sujeto(['Several', lines, of, evidence]), verbo([have]), complemento([indicated, that, the, activation, complemento([endogenous, and, exogenous, 'cues,', ensuring, a, homeostatic, control, of, development, and, metabolism])]). relacion([sujeto(['Gene', 'duplication,']), verbo([loss]), complemento([and, mutation, have, shaped, the, repertoire, and, function, of, 'NRs', in, metazoans])]). relacion([sujeto(['Previous', studies]), verbo([suggested]), complemento([that, 'LXRα', and, 'LXRβ', genes, emerged, in, the, mammalian, ancestor])]). relacion([sujeto(['These', findings, show, that, 'LXR', duplicated, before, gnathostome, 'radiation,', followed, by, asymmetric, paralogue]), verbo([loss]), complemento([in, some, lineages])]). relacion([sujeto(['We']), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, a, tighter, control, of, cholesterol, levels, in, vertebrates, was, achieved, through, the, exploitation, of, a, wider, range, of, 'oxysterols,', an, ability, contingent, on, 'ligand-binding', pocket, remodeling])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', 'contrast,', its, synthetic, epimer, 22, '(', 'S)-hydroxycholesterol', '(', 22, 'SHC,', 8, ')']), verbo([has]), complemento([shown, specific, antagonistic, effects, in, recent, 'studies,', avoiding, unwanted, side, effects, provided, by, potent, 'LXR', agonists])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', terms, of, 'LXR', 'modulation,', the, aim, of, this, study, was, to, compare, 22, 'SHC', '(', 8, ')', ',', 22, 'RHC', '(', 1, ')', and]), verbo([synthesized]), complemento([ligands, with, 'keto-', and, amide, functionality, in, the, 22, nd, position, of, the, cholesterol, scaffold])]). relacion([sujeto(['A', new]), verbo([synthesized]), complemento([amide, 'derivate,', 'Fernholtz', cyclohexylamide, '(', 13, ')', was, shown, to, reduce, lipogenesis, in, a, 'dose-responsive', manner, and, abolish, the, effect, of, the, potent, 'LXR', agonist, 'T0901317', when, administered, simultaneously])]). relacion([sujeto(['When', 'inhaled,', ozone, '(', 'O3)']), verbo([interacts]), complemento([with, cholesterols, of, airway, epithelial, cell, membranes, or, the, 'lung-lining', 'fluid,', generating, chemically, reactive, oxysterols])]). relacion([sujeto(['As', 'expected,', 'O3-derived', oxysterols]), verbo([have]), complemento([a, 'pro-inflammatory', effect, and, increase, 'NF-κB', activity])]). relacion([sujeto(['Interestingly,', expression, of, the, cholesterol, efflux, pump, 'ATP-binding', cassette, transporter, 1, '(', 'ligands,', that]), verbo([modulate]), complemento([their, transcriptional, responses])]). relacion([sujeto(['This', change, in, the, activity, profile, is]), verbo([triggered]), complemento([by, a, relacion([sujeto(['We', showed, earlier, that, 'NPC1']), verbo([binds]), complemento([cholesterol, and, oxysterols])]). relacion([sujeto(['Here', we, localize, the]), verbo([binding]), complemento([site, to, luminal, 'loop-1,', a, 240, -, amino, acid, domain, with, 18, cysteines])]). relacion([sujeto(['This', loop]), verbo([bound]), complemento(['[', '(', 3, ')', 'H]cholesterol', cholesterol, competed, strongly, for]), verbo([binding]), complemento([of, '[', '(', 3, ')', 'H]cholesterol,', but, weakly, for, '[', '(', 3, ')', 'H]25-HC', binding])]). relacion([sujeto(['Binding', of, '[', '(', 3, ')', 'H]cholesterol', but, not, '[', '(', 3, ')', 'H]25-HC', was]), verbo([inhibited]), complemento([by, detergents])]). relacion([sujeto(['We', also, studied, 'NPC2,', a, soluble, protein, whose, deficiency]), verbo([causes]), complemento([a, similar, disease, phenotype])]). relacion([sujeto(['NPC2']), verbo([bound]), complemento(['cholesterol,', but, not, oxysterols])]). relacion([sujeto(['Epicholesterol', and, cholesteryl, sulfate, competed, for, '[', '(', 3, ')', 'H]cholesterol']), verbo([binding]), complemento([to, 'NPC2,', but, not, 'NPC1'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Glutamine', 79, in, luminal, 'loop-1', of, 'NPC-1', is, important, for, sterol, 'binding;', a, 'Q79A', mutation, abolished]), verbo([binding]), complemento([of, '[', '(', 3, ')', 'H]cholesterol', and, '[', '(', 3, ')', 'H]25-HC', to, 'full-length', 'NPC1'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Thus,', the, sterol]), verbo([binding]), complemento([site, on, luminal, 'loop-1', is, not, essential, for, 'NPC1', function, in, 'fibroblasts,', but, it, may, function, in, other, cells, where, 'NPC1', deficiency, produces, more, complicated, lipid, abnormalities])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', processes, may]), verbo([involve]), complemento([the, 'ATP-binding', cassette, transporter, 'A1', '(', 'ABCA1),', a, transport, protein, shown, to, be, crucial, in, apolipoprotein, 'A-I', '(', 'apoA-I)-mediated', mobilization, of, cellular, cholesterol, and, phospholipid])]). relacion([sujeto(['Upon', incubation, of, the, type, 'I-like', pneumocytes, with, were]), verbo([enhanced]), complemento([to, maximum, levels, after, 8, to, 16, hours, and, remained, elevated, for, 24, hours])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', the, presence, of, 'apoA-I', and, 9, relacion([sujeto(['Lipid', efflux, was]), verbo([inhibited]), complemento([by, 'Probucol'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Sucrose', density, gradient, analysis, of, the, media, from]), verbo([stimulated]), complemento([with, the, channel, pores])]). relacion([sujeto(['Here', we, use, the, excitation, generalized, polarization, '(', 'GPex)', of, 6, -, 'lauroyl-2-(dimethylamino)naphthalene', '(', verbo([required]), complemento([in, order, to, detect, a, biphasic, change, in, membrane, properties, at, specific, sterol, mole, fractions, '(', 'Cr)', '(', e])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', depth, of, the, 'GPex', dip]), verbo([increases]), complemento([with, increasing, incubation, time, and, eventually, reaches, a, 'plateau,', at, which, the, maximum, area, covered, by, superlattices, is, expected, to, be, achieved])]). relacion([sujeto(['These', effects, can, be, attributed, to, the]), verbo([increased]), complemento(['inter-bilayer', lipid, exchange, and, the, increased, 'vesicle-vesicle', interactions, present, at, high, lipid, '(', 'vesicle)', concentrations, as, well, as, the, decreased, interactions, between, oxysterols, and, phospholipids])]). relacion([sujeto(['These', possible, explanations]), verbo([have]), complemento([been, incorporated, into, a, kinetic, model, that, is, able, to, calculate, the, effects, of, sterol, oxidation, and, lipid, concentration, on, the, depth, of, the, 'GPex', dip])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', depth, of, the, 'GPex', 'dip,', the]), verbo([required]), complemento([incubation, time, for, the, dip, 'formation,', and, the, lipid, concentration, dependence, of, the, 'GPex', dip, vary, with, 'Cr,', suggesting, different, physical, properties, for, different, sterol, superlattices])]). relacion([sujeto(['These', results, improve, our, mechanistic, understanding, of, sterol, superlattice, formation, and, explain, why, some, 'studies,', especially, those]), verbo([requiring]), complemento([high, lipid, 'concentrations,', did, not, detect, a, biphasic, change, in, membrane, properties, at, 'Cr'])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', mechanisms, directing, the, intracellular, trafficking, of, this, nearly, insoluble, molecule]), verbo([have]), complemento([received, increased, attention, through, the, discovery, of, the, steroidogenic, acute, regulatory, protein, '(', to]), verbo([involve]), complemento([the, 'recently-described', protein, 'StarD4,', which, is, expressed, in, most, cells])]). relacion([sujeto(['Steroidogenic', cells, must, also, move, large, complemento([in, concert, with, the, peripheral, benzodiazepine, 'receptor,', but, the, precise, itinerary, of, a, cholesterol, molecule, entering, the, mitochondrion, remains, unclear])]). complemento([that, lipid, oxidation, is, important, in, atherogenesis, and, in, epidemiological, studies, dietary, antioxidants, appear, protective, against, cardiovascular, events])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', the, 53, patients, who, received, 'alpha-tocopherol', there, was, a, significant]), verbo([increase]), complemento([in, plasma, 'alpha-tocopherol', concentrations, '(', from, '(', 'OSBPs)', comprise, a, large, conserved, family, of, proteins, in, eukaryotes, with, high, affinity, for, 'oxysterols,', but, their, precise, function, has, not, been, defined, yet])]). relacion([sujeto(['One', member, of, this, family, in, 'humans,', 'HLM/OSBP2', 'protein,']), verbo([has]), complemento([recently, been, reported, as, a, potential, marker, for, solid, tumor, the, maintenance, of, the, undifferentiated, state, necessary, for, leukemogenesis])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', difference, in, 'acetylcholine-mediated', vasodilation, in, the, microcirculation, was, -, 52.1, '%', -, point, '(', 95, '%', confidence, interval, -, 132.8, to, 28.1, ')', ;, in, 'sodium-nitroprusside-mediated', vasodilation, in, the, 'microcirculation,', 2.6, '%', -, point, '(', -, ')', ;, and, in, oxidised, 'LDL', -, 1.6, 'U/l', '(', -, 6.7, to, 3.5, ')'])]). relacion([sujeto(['We']), verbo([have]), complemento([shown, that, endothelial, 'function,', blood, 'pressure,', and, complemento([no, evidence, of, an, effect, on, vascular, function, of, calcium, dobesilate, in, humans])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', the, present, 'work,', we]), verbo([report]), complemento([the, possibility, of, modifying, the, electrostatic, properties, of, the, skin, by, treating, human, epidermis, with, compounds, whose, structures, possess, a, large, molecular, dipole, moment])]). relacion([sujeto(['Data', are, presented, showing, that, such, a, modification, can, be, used, to]), verbo([enhance]), complemento([dermal, drug, delivery])]). relacion([sujeto(['Using', was]), verbo([induced]), complemento([using, 3, ',', 5, -, 'diethoxycarbonyl-1,4-dihydrocollidine', '(', 'DDC)', '(', 100, 'mg/kg,', i])]). relacion([sujeto(['DDC', treatment]), verbo([caused]), complemento([that, peripheral, benzodiazepine, receptor, ligands, act, on, liver, mitochondrial, 27, -, hydroxylation, of, cholesterol, by, a, mechanism, coupled, to, these, receptors, and, that, the, time, of, exposure, of, peripheral, benzodiazepine, receptors, to, ligands, is, a, major, factor])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', modulation, of, 27, -, hydroxycholesterol, production, may]), verbo([have]), complemento([a, physiological, role, in, liver, and, possibly, in, other, tissues])]). relacion([sujeto(['Among', the, different]), verbo([targets]), complemento([of, the, cytodamaging, effects, of, cholesterol, oxides, in, endothelial, 'cells,', cytoskeleton, is, one, of, the, most, 'relevant,', due, to, the, large, variety, of, biological, events, controlled, by, this, subcellular, structure])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', modifications, of, the, intermediate, filament, network]), verbo([caused]), complemento([by, three, cholesterol, oxides, '(', 'cholestane-3beta,5alpha,6beta-triol,', 'CH,', 7, -, 'keto-cholesterol,', 'KC,', and, 25, -, 'OH-cholesterol,', 'COH)', was, investigated, in, the, endothelial, cell, line, 73, /, 73, using, immunofluorescence, and, laser, scanner, confocal, microscopy])]). relacion([sujeto(['All', three, cholesterol, oxides]), verbo([promoted]), complemento([a, redistribution, of, vimentin, filaments, that, took, place, well, before, cell, detachment, and, the, occurrence, of, any, detectable, sign, of, cell, death])]). relacion([sujeto(['COH']), verbo([promoted]), complemento([the, aggregation, of, vimentin, filaments, in, thick, and, irregular, bundles, that, delimited, apparently, empty, regions])]). relacion([sujeto(['All', these, changes, occurred, independently, of, gross, modifications, in, microtubule, 'organization,', which, was, generally]), verbo([retained]), complemento([except, for, the, appearance, of, immunoreactive, tubulin, spots, throughout, the, cytoplasm])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', different, rearrangements]), verbo([caused]), complemento([by, 'CH,', 'KC,', and, 'COH', may, derive, from, different, pathobiochemical, processes, triggered, by, these, compounds])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', both, cell, lines, 7, 'beta-OH', at, 30, mu, 'M']), verbo([induces]), complemento([cell, death, by, apoptosis, within, the, first, hours, of, treatment])]). relacion([sujeto(['It', is, interesting, to, note, that, the, simultaneous, treatment, of, 'U-937', cells, by, equimolar, concentrations, of, 7, 'beta-OH', and, 25, -, 'OH']), verbo([leads]), complemento([to, a, considerably, decreased, induction, of, apoptosis])]). relacion([sujeto(['Taken', 'together,', these, results, indicate, for, the, first, time, 'that:', 1, ')', cell, type])]). relacion([sujeto(['Obesity', and, the, related, entity, metabolic, syndrome, are, characterized, by, altered, lipid, metabolism, and]), verbo([associated]), complemento([with, increased, morbidity, risk, for, cardiovascular, disease, and, cancer])]). relacion([sujeto(['We']), verbo([found]), complemento([considerable, differences, in, oxysterols, profiling, in, the, two, relacion([sujeto(['Apolipoprotein', 'M', '(', 'apoM)', plays, an, important, role, in, the, biogenesis, and, the, metabolism, of, 'anti-atherogenic', 'HDL', particles, in, plasma, and, is]), receptor, and, heterodimers, of, retinoid, 'X', receptor, with, receptors, for, retinoic, 'acid,', thyroid, 'hormone,', fibrates, '(', peroxisome, 'proliferator-activated', 'receptor),', and, for, this, receptor, in, cholesterol, homoeostasis])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', aim, of, this, study, was, to, take, a, combination, of, animal, and, cell, culture, approaches, to, examine, the, individual, responses, of, vascular, cells, to, varying, inflammatory, factors, in, order, to]), verbo([gain]), complemento([insights, on, the, 'mechanism(s)', by, which, 'poly(ADP-ribose)', markedly, increases, in, response, to, inflammation])]). relacion([sujeto(['This']), verbo([increase]), complemento([in, 'alpha1-AT', synthesis, results, in, an, increase, in, 'peptides,', like, its, 'alpha-hydroxylase', mRNA, or, its, promoter])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', 'DNA', element]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, the, 'C-36-mediated', regulation, of, 7, 'alpha-', and, 12, peptide, specifically]), verbo([interacts]), complemento([with, 'FTF', and, induces, a, conformational, change, that, results, in, loss, of, its, 'DNA', binding, 'ability,', which, results, in, 'Prox1']), verbo([interacts]), complemento([with, 'LSD1', to, recruit, the, repressive, 'LSD1/NuRD', complex, to, 'CYP7A1', promoter, and, 'co-represses', transcription, through, epigenetic, verbo([nuclear]), complemento([receptor, signaling, 'molecules,', but, the, broader, functional, roles, of, 'LRH-1', and, these, new, ligands, remain, to, be, established])]). element, binding, 'protein-1', '(', 'SREBP-1),', decreasing, lipid, accumulation])]). relacion([sujeto(['Therefore,', the, aim, of, the, present, work, was, to, study, whether, a]), verbo([soy]), complemento([protein, diet, may, prevent, the, development, of, fatty, liver, through, the, regulation, of, transcription, factors, involved, in, lipid, metabolism, in, hyperinsulinemic, and, hyperleptinemic, 'Zucker', obese, 'fa/fa', rats])]). relacion([sujeto(['Serum', and, hepatic, cholesterol, and, triglyceride, 'levels,', as, well, as, 'VLDL-triglyceride', and, 'LDL-cholesterol,', were, significantly, lower, in, rats, fed]), verbo([soy]), complemento([protein, than, in, rats, fed, a, casein, diet, for, 160, days])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', reduction, in, hepatic, cholesterol, was]), verbo([associated]), complemento([with, a, low, expression, of, liver, 'X', 'receptor-alpha', and, its, target, 'genes,', 7, -, alpha, hydroxylase, and, 'ABCA1'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Soy', protein, also]), verbo([decreased]), complemento([the, expression, of, 'SREBP-1', and, several, of, its, target, 'genes,', 'FAS,', 'stearoyl-CoA', 'desaturase-1,', and, delta5, and, delta6, 'desaturases,', decreasing, lipogenesis, even, in, the, presence, of, hyperinsulinemia])]). relacion([sujeto(['Reduction', in, 'SREBP-1', was, not]), verbo([associated]), complemento([with, the, presence, of, soy, isoflavones])]). relacion([sujeto(['Finally,']), verbo([soy]), complemento([protein, reduced, 'SREBP-1', expression, in, 'adipocytes,', preventing, 'hypertrophy,', which, also, helps, prevent, the, development, of, hepatic, lipotoxicity])]). relacion([sujeto(['The']), verbo([nuclear]), complemento([receptors, liver, 'X', receptor, '(', 'LXR)', alpha, and, farnesoid, 'X', receptor, '(', 'FXR)', are, positive, and, negative, regulators, of, cholesterol, 7, 'alpha-hydroxylase', '(', 'CYP7A1)', 'transcription,', respectively])]). relacion([sujeto(['To', clarify, their, five, diets, for, 2, 'weeks:', a, standard, 'diet,', cholic, 'acid,', 'cholesterol,', 'cholesterol+high', 'fat,', or, an, atherogenic, diet, '(', cholic, 'acid+cholesterol+high', 'fat)'])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', mRNA, level, of, 'ATP-binding', cassette, transporter, '(', 'ABC)', 'A1', 'gene,', one, of, 'LXRalpha']), verbo([target]), complemento(['genes,', significantly, increased, on, the, diets, containing, cholic, acid, 'and/or', 'cholesterol+high', 'fat,', but, not, on, the, diet, containing, cholesterol, alone])]). relacion([sujeto(['On', the, other, 'hand,', the, mRNA, levels, of, the, 'FXR']), verbo([target]), complemento([genes, 'ABCB11,', 'ABCC2,', and, short, heterodimer, partner, increased, only, on, the, diet, containing, cholic, acid, with, or, without, 'cholesterol+high', fat])]). relacion([sujeto(['Thus,', in, the, atherogenic, 'diet-fed', 'mice,', cholic, acid, component, is, needed, for, the, 'FXR', 'activation,', and, 'FXR', dominantly]), verbo([regulates]), complemento(['CYP7A1', transcription])]). relacion([sujeto(['Peroxisome', 'proliferator-activated', receptor, gamma, 'coactivator-1alpha', '(', 'PGC-1alpha)']), verbo([has]), complemento([been, shown, to, play, an, important, role, in, energy, metabolism, by, coordinating, transcriptional, programs, involved, in, mitochondrial, 'biogenesis,', adaptive, 'thermogenesis,', 'gluconeogenesis,', and, fatty, acid, oxidation])]). relacion([sujeto(['PGC-1alpha', also, plays, a, crucial, role, in, cholesterol, metabolism, by, serving, as, a, coactivator, of, the, liver, 'X', 'receptor-alpha', and]), verbo([inducing]), complemento([the, expression, of, cholesterol, 7, -, 'alpha-hydroxylase'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Transient', cotransfection, assays, demonstrate, that, 'PGC-1alpha']), verbo([enhances]), complemento(['ligand-mediated', 'FXR', transcription, when, either, 'full-length', 'FXR', or, 'Gal4', 'DNA', binding, 'domain-FXR-ligand', binding, domain, chimeras, were, analyzed])]). relacion([sujeto(['PGC-1alpha-mediated', coactivation, of, 'FXR', was, highly, 'ligand-dependent', and, absolutely]), verbo([required]), complemento([an, intact, activation, 'function-2', '(', 'AF-2)', domain, of, 'FXR', and, the, 'LXXLL', motif, in, 'PGC-1alpha'])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', integrity, of, the, charge, clamp, was, 'required,', further, illustrating, the, role, of, the, ligand]), verbo([binding]), complemento([domain, of, 'FXR', in, 'PGC-1alpha', recognition])]). relacion([sujeto(['Together,', these, results, indicate, that, 'PGC-1alpha', functions, as, a, potent, coactivator, for, 'FXR', and, further, implicates, its, role, in, the, regulation, of, genes, that, are]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, bile, acid, and, lipid, metabolism])]). newly, discovered, transcription, 'factor,', 'LXR,']), verbo([regulates]), complemento([the, catabolic, degradation, of, cholesterol, by, activation, of, the, gene, controlling, cholesterol, 7, 'alpha-hydroxylase,', the, 'rate-limiting', enzyme, in, the, formation, of, bile, acids])]). relacion([sujeto(['Excessive', dietary, cholesterol]), verbo([leads]), complemento([to, increased, oxysterol, formation])]). relacion([sujeto(['Oxysterol']), verbo([binds]), complemento([to, 'LXR', and, thereby, induces, transcription, of, cholesterol, 7, 'alpha-hydroxylase,', thus, increasing, the, removal, of, cholesterol, as, bile, acids])]). relacion([sujeto(['Initially,', we, observed, that, up, to, 40, '%', of, the, overall, transcriptional, activity, of, the, promoter, in, 'HepG2', cells, was]), verbo([associated]), complemento([with, 'DNA', sequences, from, -, 65, to, -, 1, of, the, human, gene])]). relacion([sujeto(['Within', this, 'region,', a]), verbo([binding]), complemento(['HNF-1;', 'instead,', it, is, bound, by, the, orphan, receptors, 'ARP-1', '(', 'COUP-TFII)', and, 'LXRalpha,', that, are, implicated, in, dietary, regulation])]). relacion([sujeto(['LXRalpha', and, -, beta, are]), verbo([nuclear]), complemento([receptors, that, regulate, the, metabolism, of, several, important, 'lipids,', including, cholesterol, and, bile, acids])]). relacion([sujeto(['Previously,', we]), verbo([have]), complemento([proposed, that, 'LXRs', regulate, these, pathways, through, their, interaction, with, 'specific,', naturally, occurring, 'oxysterols,', including, 22, '(', 'R)-hydroxycholesterol,', 24, '(', 'S)-hydroxycholesterol,', and, 24, '(', 'S),25-epoxycholesterol'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Using', a, ligand]), verbo([binding]), complemento([assay, that, incorporates, scintillation, proximity, technology, to, circumvent, many, of, the, problems, associated, with, assaying, extremely, hydrophobic, 'ligands,', we, now, demonstrate, that, these, oxysterols, bind, directly, to, 'LXRs', at, concentrations, that, occur, in, vivo])]). relacion([sujeto(['To', characterize, further, the, structural, determinants]), verbo([required]), complemento([for, potent, 'LXR', 'ligands,', we, synthesized, and, tested, a, series, of, related, compounds, for, binding, to, 'LXRs', and, activation, of, transcription])]). relacion([sujeto(['These', studies, revealed, that, 'position-specific', monooxidation, of, the, sterol, side, chain, is, requisite, for, 'LXR', 'high-affinity']), verbo([binding]), complemento([and, activation])]). relacion([sujeto(['Enhanced']), verbo([binding]), complemento([and, activation, can, also, be, achieved, through, the, use, of, 24, -, oxo, ligands, that, act, as, hydrogen, bond, acceptors, in, the, side, chain])]). relacion([sujeto(['Accumulation', of, cholesterol]), verbo([causes]), complemento([both, repression, of, genes, controlling, cholesterol, biosynthesis, and, cellular, uptake, and, induction, of, cholesterol, 7, 'alpha-hydroxylase,', which, leads, to, the, removal, of, cholesterol, by, increased, metabolism, to, bile, acids])]). relacion([sujeto(['Here,', we]), verbo([report]), complemento([that, 'LXRalpha', and, 'LXRbeta,', two, orphan, members, of, the, nuclear, receptor, 'superfamily,', are, activated, by, 24, '(', 'S),', 25, -, epoxycholesterol, and, 24, '(', 'S)-hydroxycholesterol', at, physiologic, concentrations])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', 'addition,', we]), verbo([have]), complemento([identified, an, 'LXR', response, element, in, the, promoter, region, of, the, rat, cholesterol, 7, 'alpha-hydroxylase', gene])]). relacion([sujeto(['Our', data]), verbo([provide]), complemento([evidence, for, a, new, hormonal, signaling, pathway, that, activates, transcription, in, response, to, oxysterols, and, suggest, that, 'LXRs', play, a, critical, role, in, the, regulation, of, cholesterol, homeostasis])]). relacion([sujeto(['We', investigated, how, cholesterol, feeding]), verbo([regulates]), complemento([cholesterol, 7, 'alpha-hydroxylase', '(', 'CYP7A1)', via, the, nuclear, receptors, farnesoid, 'X', receptor, '(', 'FXR)', and, liver, 'X', receptor, alpha, '(', 'LXRalpha)', in, 'New', 'Zealand', white, rabbits])]). relacion([sujeto(['After', 1, day, of, 2, '%', cholesterol, 'feeding,', when, the, bile, acid, pool, size, had, not, 'expanded,', mRNA, levels, of, the, 'FXR']), verbo([target]), complemento([genes, 'short-heterodimer', partner, '(', 'SHP)', and, sterol, 12, 'alpha-hydroxylase', '(', 'CYP8B)', were, 'unchanged,', indicating, that, 'FXR', activation, remained, constant])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', 'contrast,', the, mRNA, levels, of, the, 'LXRalpha']), verbo([target]), complemento([genes, 'ATP', binding, cassette, transporter, 'A1', '(', 'ABCA1)', and, cholesteryl, ester, transfer, protein, '(', 'CETP)', increased, 5, -, fold, and, 2.3, -, 'fold,', 'respectively,', associated, with, significant, increases, in, hepatic, concentrations, of, oxysterols])]). relacion([sujeto(['Activity', and, mRNA, levels, of, 'CYP7A1']), verbo([increased]), complemento([2.4, times, and, 2.2, 'times,', respectively])]). relacion([sujeto(['After', 10, days, of, cholesterol, 'feeding,', the, bile, acid, pool, size]), verbo([increased]), complemento([nearly, 2, -, fold])]). relacion([sujeto(['SHP', mRNA, levels]), verbo([increased]), complemento([4.1, -, fold, while, 'CYP8B', declined, 64, '%'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Activity', and, mRNA, of, 'CYP7A1']), verbo([decreased]), complemento([60, '%', and, 90, '%', ',', respectively])]). relacion([sujeto(['Feeding', cholesterol, for, 1, day, did, not, enlarge, the, ligand, pool, size, or, change, 'FXR', 'activation,', while, 'LXRalpha', was]), verbo([activated]), complemento([highly, secondary, to, increased, hepatic, oxysterols])]). relacion([sujeto(['After', 10, days, of, cholesterol, 'feeding,', the, bile, acid, '(', 'FXR', 'ligand)', pool, size, 'increased,', which]), verbo([activated]), complemento(['FXR', and, inhibited, 'CYP7A1', despite, continued, activation, of, 'LXRalpha'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Thus,', in, 'rabbits,', when, 'FXR', and, 'LXRalpha', are]), verbo([activated]), complemento(['simultaneously,', the, inhibitory, effect, of, 'FXR', overrides, the, stimulatory, effect, of, 'LXRalpha', to, suppress, 'CYP7A1', mRNA, expression])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', rodent, 'liver,', transcription, of, the, gene, encoding, cholesterol, 7, 'alpha-hydroxylase', '(', 'CYP7A1),', which, catalyzes, the, 'rate-limiting', step, in, the, classic, bile, acid, synthetic, 'pathway,', is]), verbo([stimulated]), complemento([by, the, liver, 'X', receptor, alpha, '(', 'LXRalpha),', a, nuclear, receptor, for, oxysterol, metabolites, of, cholesterol])]). relacion([sujeto(['This', 'feed-forward', regulatory, loop]), verbo([provides]), complemento([a, mechanism, for, the, elimination, of, excess, cholesterol, from, the, body])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', this, 'report,', we, demonstrate, that, in, primary, cultures, of, human, 'hepatocytes,', activation, of, 'LXRalpha']), verbo([has]), complemento([the, opposite, 'effect,', repressing, 'CYP7A1', expression])]). relacion([sujeto(['This', repression, is, 'mediated,', at, least, in, 'part,', through, induction, of, the, orphan]), verbo([nuclear]), complemento(['receptor,', short, heterodimer, partner, '(', 'SHP),', which, is, also, induced, by, bile, acids])]). relacion([sujeto(['We', demonstrate, that, 'SHP', is]), verbo([regulated]), complemento([directly, by, 'LXRalpha', through, a, 'DNA', response, element, that, overlaps, with, the, previously, characterized, bile, acid, response, element])]). relacion([sujeto(['Our', data]), verbo([reveal]), complemento([a, fundamental, difference, in, the, regulation, of, 'CYP7A1', in, rodent, and, human, hepatocytes, and, provide, evidence, that, different, species, employ, distinct, molecular, strategies, to, regulate, cholesterol, homeostasis])]). relacion([sujeto(['Cholesterol', 7, 'alpha-hydroxylase', '(', 'cyp7a)']), verbo([mediates]), complemento([cholesterol, elimination, in, the, liver, by, catalyzing, the, first, and, 'rate-limiting', step, in, the, conversion, of, cholesterol, into, bile, acids])]). relacion([sujeto(['Peroxisome', 'proliferator-activated', receptor, alpha, '(', 'PPARalpha;', 'NR1C1)', and, liver, 'X', receptor, alpha, '(', 'LXRalpha;', 'NR1H3)', are, two]), verbo([nuclear]), complemento([receptors, that, stimulate, the, murine, 'Cyp7a1', gene])]). relacion([sujeto(['Here', we]), verbo([report]), complemento([that, 'co-expression', of, 'PPARalpha', and, 'LXRalpha', in, hepatoma, cells, abolishes, the, stimulation, of, 'Cyp7a1', gene, promoter, in, response, to, their, respective, agonists])]). relacion([sujeto(['PPARalpha', and, 'LXRalpha', form, an, atypical, heterodimer, that]), verbo([binds]), complemento([to, two, directly, adjacent, hexameric, sequences, localized, within, overlapping, 'PPARalpha', and, 'LXRalpha', response, elements, '(', termed, 'Site', 'I),', antagonizing, the, interaction, of, 'PPARalpha:retinoid', 'X', receptor, alpha, '(', 'RXRalpha)', or, 'RXRalpha:LXRalpha', with, the, 'Cyp7a1', gene, promoter])]). relacion([sujeto(['Mutations', within, either, hexameric, sequences, that, specifically, abolished, 'LXRalpha:PPARalpha', heterodimer]), verbo([binding]), complemento([to, the, murine, 'Cyp7a1', 'Site', 'I', also, relieved, promoter, inhibition])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', 'LXRalpha:PPARalpha', heterodimer, may, be, important, in, coordinating, the, expression, of, genes, that, encode, proteins]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, metabolism, of, fats, and, cholesterol])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', liver, 'X', 'receptors,', 'LXRalpha', and, 'LXRbeta,', are, members, of, the]), verbo([nuclear]), complemento([receptor, superfamily])]). relacion([sujeto(['Originally', identified, as, 'orphans,', both, receptor, subtypes]), verbo([have]), complemento([since, been, shown, to, be, activated, by, naturally, occurring, oxysterols])]). relacion([sujeto(['LXRalpha', knockout, mice, fail, to]), verbo([regulate]), complemento([cyp7a, mRNA, levels, upon, cholesterol, 'feeding,', implicating, the, role, of, this, receptor, in, cholesterol, homeostasis])]). relacion([sujeto(['LXR', activation, also]), verbo([induces]), complemento([the, expression, of, the, lipid, pump, involved, in, cholesterol, 'efflux,', the, gene, encoding, 'ATP', binding, cassette, protein, 'A1', '(', 'ABCA1)'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Therefore,', 'LXR', is, believed, to, be, a, sensor, of, cholesterol, levels, and, a, potential, therapeutic]), verbo([target]), complemento([for, atherosclerosis])]). relacion([sujeto(['F(3)MethylAA', is, capable, not, only, of]), verbo([inducing]), complemento(['ABCA1', mRNA, 'levels,', but, also, increasing, cholesterol, efflux, from, 'THP-1', macrophages])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', rat, 'hepatocytes,', 'F(3)MethylAA']), verbo([induced]), complemento([cyp7a, 'mRNA,', confirming, conclusions, from, the, knockout, mouse, studies])]). relacion([sujeto(['Furthermore,', in, rat, in, vivo, 'studies,', 'F(3)MethylAA']), verbo([induced]), complemento([liver, cyp7a, mRNA, and, enzyme, activity])]). relacion([sujeto(['A', critical, species, difference, is, also]), verbo([reported]), complemento([in, that, neither, 'F(3)MethylAA', nor, 22, '(', 'R)-hydroxycholesterol', induced, cyp7a, in, human, primary, hepatocytes])]). relacion([sujeto(['However,', other, 'LXR']), verbo([target]), complemento(['genes,', 'ABCA1,', 'ABCG1,', and, 'SREBP1,', were, regulated])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', in, vivo, role, of, the]), verbo([nuclear]), complemento([receptor, 'SHP', in, feedback, regulation, of, bile, acid, synthesis, was, examined])]). relacion([sujeto(['Loss', of, 'SHP', in, mice]), verbo([caused]), complemento([abnormal, accumulation, and, increased, synthesis, of, bile, acids, due, to, derepression, of, 'rate-limiting', 'CYP7A1', and, 'CYP8B1', hydroxylase, enzymes, in, the, biosynthetic, pathway])]). relacion([sujeto(['Dietary', bile, acids]), verbo([induced]), complemento([liver, damage, and, restored, feedback, regulation])]). relacion([sujeto(['A', synthetic, agonist, of, the]), verbo([nuclear]), complemento([receptor, 'FXR', was, not, hepatotoxic, and, had, no, regulatory, effects])]). complemento([by, 11, '%', in, 0.1, 'RYR', group, and, by, 24, '%', in, 0.3, 'RYR', group])]). relacion([sujeto(['Western', blotting, analysis, demonstrated, that, 'RYR', had, no, effect, on, sterol, complemento([mRNA])]). relacion([sujeto(['Activation', of, 'FXR']), verbo([suppressed]), complemento(['CSAD', mRNA, expression, whereas, 'CSAD', expression, was, increased, in, 'Shp-/-', mice])]). 7, ',', 8, -, hydride, shift, or, an, alternative, closing, to, yield, the, epoxide, '(', 'Liebler,', 'D'])]). relacion([sujeto(['The']), verbo([finding]), complemento([that, 7, -, dehydrocholesterol, verbo([has]), complemento([been, reported, to, have, the, highest, catalytic, activity, of, any, mammalian, 'P450'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Analyses', of, individual, steps, of, cholesterol, 7, apparent, 'K(d)', of, 0.51, 'μM,', '(', 'ii)', a, rapid, reduction, rate, in, the, presence, of, cholesterol, '(', '∼10', 's(-1)', for, the, fast, 'phase),', '(', 'iii)', rapid, formation, of, a, ferrous, 'P450-cholesterol-O(2)', complex, '(', 29, 's(-1)),', '(', 'iv)', the, lack, of, a, 'non-competitive', kinetic, deuterium, isotope, 'effect,', '(', 'v)', the, lack, of, a, kinetic, 'burst,', phenomenon, compared, with, other, 'P450s', that]), verbo([have]), complemento([much, lower, rates, of, 'catalysis,', attributed, to, the, much, more, efficient, substrate, oxidation, steps, in, this, reaction])]). relacion([sujeto(['Over', the, past, two, 'decades,', it]), verbo([has]), complemento([become, increasingly, clear, that, the, 'intestine,', in, addition, to, the, 'liver,', plays, an, verbo([has]), complemento([great, potential, for, the, study, of, interorgan, effects])]). relacion([sujeto(['Use', of, this, microfluidic, system, will, improve, our, insight, into, interorgan, interactions, and, elucidate, as, yet, unknown, mechanisms]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, 'toxicity,', gene, regulation, and, 'drug-drug', interactions])]). relacion([sujeto(['Dansyl', chloride]), verbo([has]), complemento([been, widely, used, as, a, derivatizing, reagent, for, fluorescence, detection, and, for, facilitating, the, 'MS', detection, of, phenols, and, 'amines,', but, not, for, general, alcohols])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', dansylated, derivative, of, the, product, was, 'identified,', with, the, signal]), verbo([increased]), complemento([by, 10, '(', 3, ')', -, fold, compared, with, a, previous, method, '(', derivatization, with, succinic, anhydride, and, 'ESI', negative, ion, 'MS)'])]). relacion([sujeto(['De', novo, bile, acid, synthesis, in, the, liver, needs, to, be, tightly]), verbo([regulated]), complemento([in, order, to, maintain, optimal, bile, flow, and, prevent, cholestasis])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', the, 'liver,', fibroblast, growth, factor, 19, '(', 'FGF19)']), verbo([regulates]), complemento([bile, acid, synthesis, by, 'down-regulating', messenger, 'RNA', levels, of, cytochrome, 'P450', 7, 'A1', '(', 'CYP7A1)'])]). relacion([sujeto(['FGF19']), verbo([acts]), complemento([through, fibroblast, growth, factor, receptor, 4, '(', 'FGFR4),', and, 'beta-Klotho', has, recently, been, recognized, as, a, modulator, of, 'FGFR4', activity])]). relacion([sujeto(['However,', its, precise, mechanism, of, action]), verbo([has]), complemento([not, been, thoroughly, described])]). relacion([sujeto(['beta-Klotho']), verbo([binds]), complemento([and, directs, the, core, glycoform, of, 'FGFR4', to, the, 'proteasome,', and, it, allows, only, a, terminal, glycoform, to, reach, the, plasma, membrane])]). relacion([sujeto(['Only', the, terminal, 'FGFR4', glycoform, is]), verbo([phosphorylated]), complemento([upon, 'FGF19', treatment, of, 'HepG2', 'cells,', and, this, shows, that, only, fully, maintain, liver, 'BA', concentrations])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', mRNA, expression, of, 'Cytochrome', 'P450', 7, a1, '(', 'Cyp7a1)', was]), verbo([suppressed]), complemento([by, all, 'BA', 'feedings,', whereas, 'Cyp7b1', was, suppressed, only, by, 'CA', and, 'UDCA', feedings])]). relacion([sujeto(['Sulfation', of, 'CA', and, 'CDCA', was]), verbo([found]), complemento([at, the, 7, -, ')'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Thus,', this, strategy]), verbo([has]), complemento([been, demonstrated, to, be, useful, in, identifying, reactions, in, tissue, extracts, with, orphan, human, 'P450s'])]). 'LCG'])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', 'HCG,', 'C/C-204', homozygotes]), verbo([have]), complemento([the, highest, and, 'A/A', homozygotes, the, lowest, levels, of, 'LDL-cholesterol', '(', 4.21, +, /, -, 0.68, 'mmol/l', vers])]). relacion([sujeto(['Its', impact, is]), verbo([expressed]), complemento([only, on, high, cholesterol, background])]). relacion([sujeto([131, males, for, whom, dietary, composition, markedly, changed, and, total, cholesterol]), verbo([decreased]), complemento(['(', from, 6.21, +, /, -, 1.31, 'mmol/L', in, 1988, -, 5.43, +, /, -, 1.06, 'mmol/L', in, 1996, ')', over, an, 8, yr, 'follow-up', study])]). relacion([sujeto(['Enzymatic', activity]), verbo([mediated]), complemento([by, 'CYP7A1', increased, 'several-fold', between, infancy, and, adolescence])]). of, 27, -, hydroxycholesterol, and, 'dehydroepiandrosterone,', substrates, typical, for, 'CYP7B1,']), verbo([increased]), complemento([about, 5, -, fold, between, infancy, and, adolescence, whereas, cholesterol, synthesis, was, 'up-regulated', by, 'PM', 'exposure,', probably, as, a, compensatory, mechanism, for, excessive, lipid, droplet, accumulation, and, reduced, plasma, cholesterol, verbo([reveal]), complemento([coordinate, regulation, of, 'C7AH', expression, and, 'HDL', 'levels,', and, they, indicate, that, the, genetic, factors, controlling, 'HDL', levels, are, more, complex, 'alpha-hydroxylase', and, sterol, 27, -, hydroxylase, by, bile, acids, results, in, suppression, of, bile, acid, synthesis, in, cultured, rat, hepatocytes, '[', 'Twisk,', 'J'])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', the, current, 'study,', we]), verbo([have]), complemento([assessed, the, effects, of, a, large, group, of, different, bile, 'acids,', both, naturally, occurring, and, 'synthetic,', on, these, two, key, 'enzymes,', to, elucidate, structural, features, which, render, bile, acids, potent, as, regulators, of, bile, acid, synthesis])]). relacion([sujeto(['Assessment', of, the, effects, of, 27, different, bile, 'acids,', varying, in, the, 'number,', position, and, orientation, '(', 'alpha/beta)', of, hydroxyl, groups, on, the, steroid, nucleus, of, the, 'molecule,', on, cholesterol, 7, 'alpha-hydroxylase', mRNA, showed, only, a, moderate, correlation, with, the, hydrophobicity, index, of, the, bile, acid]), verbo([involved]), complemento(['(', r, =, 0.61, ;, 'P', &, 'lt;', 0.0001, ')'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Analysis', of, the, 'three-dimensional', structure, of, a, number, of, these, bile, acids]), verbo([suggests]), complemento([that, hydroxyl, groups, situated, in, close, proximity, to, each, other, within, the, 'molecule,', creating, a, hydrophilic, 'environment,', as, in, the, case, of, 'cholate,', may, be, a, prerequisite, for, a, strong, inhibitory, potency])]). relacion([sujeto(['Deviation', from, this, situation]), verbo([leads]), complemento([to, a, markedly, lesser, effect, on, suppression, of, cholesterol, 7, 'alpha-hydroxylase', and, sterol, 27, -, hydroxylase])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', mechanisms, responsible, for, differing, sensitivity, to, dietary, cholesterol, were, examined, by, comparing, the, 'rat,', which, is, cholesterol, or, one, of, its, metabolites, across, the, 'blood-brain', barrier, and, may, more, closely, mirror, sterol, turnover, in, pools, such, as, glial, cell, membranes, and, myelin])]). the]), verbo([cause]), complemento([of, progressive, familial, intrahepatic, cholestasis, type, 2])]). relacion([sujeto(['However,']), verbo([target]), complemento([inactivation, of, spgp, gene, in, complemento([to, low, yields, and, large, cellular, heterogeneity])]). relacion([sujeto(['We']), verbo([report]), complemento([here, a, robust, and, highly, efficient, process, for, the, generation, relacion([sujeto(['This', is, much, larger, than, the, '"', law, of, large, 'numbers"', scaling, '⟨(δN)2⟩=K⟨N⟩']), verbo([found]), complemento([in, most, equilibrium, and, nonequilibrium, systems])]). relacion([sujeto(['"', 'Microcanonical', ensemble, numerical, simulations, of, 'finite-size', systems]), verbo([reveal]), complemento([that, magnetization, sets, in, and, induces, a, 'liquid-gas', into, the, coexistence, region, show, that, the, order, parameter]), verbo([associated]), complemento([with, the, 'liquid-vapor', phase, separation, follows, an, algebraic, law, with, an, unusual, complemento([that, the, 'A', block, could, '"', 'unfold"', sequentially, like, unknitting, a, 'sweater,', driven, by, the, surrounding, 'ABPs', when, the, propelling, strength, on, them, is, beyond, a, certain, value])]). relacion([sujeto(['This', threshold, value]), verbo([decreases]), complemento([and, then, levels, off, as, the, length, of, the, 'B', block, increases])]). 'factors,', prognostic, scoring, systems]), verbo([have]), complemento([been, developed, for, 'MDS', to, aid, clinical, and, therapeutic, decisions, following, diagnosis])]). relacion([sujeto(['Erythropoiesis-']), verbo([stimulating]), complemento([agents, '(', 'ESAs)', have, been, used, for, many, years, to, treat, anemia, in, patients, with, 'lower-risk', 'MDS', without, of, controls])]). relacion([sujeto(['Addition', of, cholesterol, '(', 200, 'microM),', but, not, mevalonolactone, '(', 2, 'mM),', to, 'squalestatin-treated', cells]), verbo([decreased]), complemento(['HMG-CoA', reductase, specific, activity, to, 19, '%', of, control])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', initial, biosynthetic, conversions, of, cholesterol, to, the, bile, acids]), verbo([involve]), complemento([sequential, 7, 'alpha-hydroxylation', '(', catalyzed, by, cholesterol, 7, 'alpha-hydroxylase)', followed, by, 'C-3', oxidation, and, concomitant, double, bond, migration, '(', to, a, delta, 4, -, 'configuration,', catalyzed, by, 3, 'beta-delta', 5, -, 'C27-steroid', 'oxidoreductase)', to, provide, 7, 'alpha-hydroxycholest-4-en-3-one'])]). relacion([sujeto(['A', 'straightforward,', and, 'economical,', preparation, '(', on, a, 0.1, g, 'scale)', of, this, pivotal, biosynthetic, intermediate]), verbo([has]), complemento([been, devised])]). relacion([sujeto(['Reduction', of, 3, 'beta-(benzoyloxy)-cholest-5-en-7-one', with, 'LiB(sec-butyl)3H']), verbo([provided]), complemento([a, 4, :, 1, 'mixture,', 'respectively,', of, the, 7, 'alpha-', and, 7, 'beta-hydroxy', 'diastereomers,', which, were, separated, chromatographically])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', reaction, might]), verbo([modulate]), complemento([biological, functions, of, 27, -, 'hydroxycholesterol,', such, as, its, suppressive, effect, on, the, activity, of, 3, -, 'hydroxy-3-methylglutaryl-coenzyme', 'A', 'reductase,', and, supports, the, possibility, of, bile, acid, formation, in, the, brain])]). relacion([sujeto(['Hepatic', cholesterol, 7, 'alpha-hydroxylase', is, a, 'rate-limiting', enzyme, for, bile, acid, 'synthesis,', and, we]), verbo([have]), complemento([previously, shown, that, the, serum, 7, 'alpha-hydroxycholesterol', level, reflects, the, enzyme, activity, in, patients, with, an, intact, liver])]). relacion([sujeto(['Cholesterol', 7, 'alpha-hydroxylase', activity, was]), verbo([decreased]), complemento([on, days, 1, and, 2, '(', from, 28.3, +, /, -, 3.7, to, 8.5, +, /, -, 2.8, and, 13.3, +, /, -, 3.6, 'pmol/min/mg', 'protein,', 'respectively),', returned, to, the, preoperative, level, on, day, 3, '(', 24.7, +, /, -, 2.6, 'pmol/min/mg', 'protein)', and, further, elevated, thereafter, '(', 71.4, +, /, -, 10.9, on, day, 7, and, 51.3, +, /, -, 6.6, 'pmol/min/mg', protein, on, day, 14, ')'])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', 'conclusion,', hepatic, cholesterol, 7, 'alpha-hydroxylase', activity, is]), verbo([suppressed]), complemento([by, hepatectomy, and, then, activated, as, the, liver, regenerates])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', contrast, to, cholesterol, 7, 'alpha-hydroxylase,', which, is]), verbo([found]), complemento([in, the, 'liver,', sterol, 27, -, hydroxylase, is, a, widely, distributed, mitochondrial, enzyme, with, high, activity, in, vascular, endothelial, cells])]). relacion([sujeto(['Although', both, pathways]), verbo([lead]), complemento([to, the, production, of, chenodeoxycholic, and, cholic, 'acids,', the, key, 'step,', 7, 'alpha-hydroxylation,', is, governed, by, two, different, 'beta-cholestan-26-oic', acid, was, secreted])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', specific, activity, of, bile, salts]), verbo([synthesized]), complemento([from, '[', 3, 'H]mevalonate', was, about, 20, '(', 'OH)cholesterol']), verbo([inhibited]), complemento([the, rate, of, bile, salt, synthesis, compared, with, control, 'values,', possibly, by, depleting, the, intracellular, free, cholesterol, to, 20, +, /, -, 7, 'ng/ml', '(', 'P', greater, than, 0.05, ')'])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', activity, of, the, cholesterol, 7, 'alpha-hydroxylase', in, liver, biopsies, taken, during, operation, was]), verbo([found]), complemento([to, be, 38, +, /, -, 5, 'pmol/min', per, mg, of, protein, in, the, group, of, patients, treated, with, cholestyramine, and, 1.3, +, /, -, 0.5, 'pmol/min', per, mg, provide, a, source, of, cholesterol])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', addition, of, mevalonic, acid]), verbo([increased]), complemento([the, secretion, of, bile, acids, by, the, 'cells,', and, this, was, 35])]). relacion([sujeto(['Sterol', carrier, protein2, '(', 'SCP2)', is, known, to]), verbo([stimulate]), complemento([utilization, of, cholesterol, in, enzymic, reactions, in, which, cholesterol, is, the, substrate])]). relacion([sujeto(['Substantial', recent, experimental, evidence, indicates, that, 'SCP2:']), verbo([activates]), complemento([enzymic, conversion, of, intermediates, between, microsomes, '(', microsomal, 'fractions),', utilizing, either, endogenous, membrane, 'cholesterol,', cholesterol, supplied, exogenously, in, serum, or, in, the, form, of, 'cholesterol/phospholipid', 'alpha-hydroxycholesterol,', which, was, restored, to, control, levels, on, addition, of, purified, 'SCP2'])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', results, of, this, study]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, a, major, block, in, the, bile, acid, synthesis, pathway, in, cirrhosis, is, at, the, level, of, 7, 'alpha-hydroxylation', of, cholesterol, '(', impairment, of, 7, 'alpha-hydroxylase)', and, /, or, in, the, feedback, triggering, mechanism, regulating, bile, acid, synthesis])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', data, also]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, the, 26, -, hydroxylation, pathway, in, normal, subjects, and, patients, with, cirrhosis, is, a, minor, contributor, to, synthesis, of, the, primary, bile, acids])]). relacion([sujeto(['This', procedure, measures, the, mass, of, 7, 'alpha-hydroxycholesterol', formed, and, does, not]), verbo([require]), complemento([addition, of, labeled, cholesterol, to, monitor, the, 'reaction,', since, endogenous, microsomal, cholesterol, serves, as, substrate, for, the, enzyme, cholesterol, 7, 'alpha-hydroxylase'])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', method]), verbo([requires]), complemento([only, the, extraction, of, lipids, from, microsomal, incubations, and, injection, of, a, small, fraction, of, this, extract, into, the, apparatus])]). relacion([sujeto(['Microsomes', from, normal, rat, livers, incubated, for, different, periods, were]), verbo([found]), complemento([to, yield, increased, 7, 'alpha-hydroxycholesterol', with, time])]). relacion([sujeto(['These', results, demonstrate, the, existence, of, two, pools, of, cholesterol, confined, to, membranes, from, the, endoplasmic, 'reticulum,', one]), verbo([acting]), complemento([as, substrate, for, cholesterol, 7, 'alpha-hydroxylase', and, the, other, acting, as, substrate, for, 'acyl-CoA-cholesterol', acyltransferase])]). relacion([sujeto(['This', resulted, in, an]), verbo([increased]), complemento([cholesterol, 7, 'alpha-hydroxylase', activity, in, liver, microsomes, as, compared, to, controls, and, was, accompanied, by, increased, levels, of, cholesterol, 7, 'alpha-hydroxylase', mRNA, and, microsomal, cholesterol, 7, 'alpha-hydroxylase', protein])]). relacion([sujeto(['Addition', of, 7, -, oxocholesterol, to, liver, microsomes, from, normal, rats, in, amounts, corresponding, to, those, present, in, microsomes, from, 7, -, 'oxocholesterol-treated', rats]), verbo([inhibited]), complemento([the, cholesterol, 7, 'alpha-hydroxylase', activity, by, about, 75, '%'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Cholesterol']), verbo([induced]), complemento([a, 'type-I', binding, spectrum, when, added, to, a, purified, 'bacterial-expressed', cholesterol, 7, 'alpha-hydroxylase', '(', 'P-450c7', delta, 2, -, 24, ')'])]). relacion([sujeto([7, -, 'Oxocholesterol', competitively]), verbo([inhibited]), complemento([the, cholesterol, binding, 'spectrum,', while, 7, 'beta-hydroxycholesterol', did, not, interfere, with, binding, of, cholesterol, to, the, enzyme])]). relacion([sujeto(['It', is, concluded, that, treatment, with, the, competitive, inhibitor, 7, -, oxocholesterol]), verbo([leads]), complemento([to, a, reduced, bile, acid, biosynthesis, 'and,', as, a, consequence, of, reduced, bile, acid, 'inhibition,', a, compensatory, increase, in, cholesterol, 7, 'alpha-hydroxylase', synthesis])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', latter, compound, was]), verbo([found]), complemento([in, high, concentrations, in, liver, microsomes, from, rats, treated, with, 7, -, oxocholesterol])]). relacion([sujeto(['We']), verbo([have]), complemento([developed, a, high, performance, liquid, chromatography, '(', 'HPLC)', assay, for, this, 'enzyme,', using, either, endogenous, or, exogenous, cholesterol, as, substrate, and, cholesterol, competitive, inhibitor, of, the, enzyme])]). relacion([sujeto(['Although', cholesterol, and, cholestanol, had, minimal, effects, on, the, rate, of, 7, 'alpha-hydroxylation', of, 27, -, 'hydroxycholesterol,', addition, of, an, approximately, equimolar, amount, of, 27, -, hydroxycholestanol]), verbo([inhibited]), complemento([the, rate, of, formation, by, 65, '%'])]). selectively, inactivates, 7, 'alpha-hydroxylation', of, 27, -, hydroxycholesterol])]). relacion([sujeto(['We', examined, the, hypothesis, that, 7, 'alpha-hydroxylase', may, indirectly]), verbo([induce]), complemento([the, expression, of, the, 'LDL', receptor, by, 'metabolizing,', i])]). relacion([sujeto(['Non-hepatic', 'Chinese', hamster, ovary, 'cells,', transfected, with, a, complemento([content, of, cholesterol, ester])]). relacion([sujeto(['Both', cell, types, displayed, an, almost, complete, repression, of, the, 'LDL', receptor, by, the, oxysterol, 25, -, 'hydroxycholesterol,']), verbo([suggesting]), complemento([that, transcriptional, control, of, the, 'LDL', receptor, gene, remained, intact, in, the, transfected, cells])]). 'microM)', of, both, enzyme, 'activities,', while, 5, 'beta-cholestan-3alpha-ol', '(', 'epicoprostanol,', 2, 'microM)', and, cyclosporin, 'A', '(', 20, 'microM)']), verbo([inhibited]), complemento(['S27OHase,', but, not, 'CH7alphaOHase'])]). relacion([sujeto(['These', data]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, a, hydroxyl, group, at, the, 7, alpha, position, is, not, required, to, production])]). relacion([sujeto(['Among', oxidized, lipids, and, chemically, modified, 'LDL,', 7, -, ketocholesterol]), verbo([enhanced]), complemento(['IL-8', production])]). recessively, inherited, '"', 'pure"', hereditary, spastic, paresis, '(', 'SPG5)']), verbo([have]), complemento([mutations, in, the, gene, coding, for, the, oxysterol, 7, alpha, hydroxylase, '(', complemento([enzyme, activity])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', accordance, with, 'this,', we, demonstrate, here, that, four, patients, with, the, 'SPG5', disease]), verbo([have]), complemento([6, -, to, 9, -, fold, increased, plasma, levels, of, 27, -, hydroxycholesterol])]). relacion([sujeto(['A', much, higher, 'increase,', 30, -, to, 50, -, 'fold,', was]), verbo([found]), complemento([in, of, bile, acids, in, serum, was, 'normal,']), verbo([suggesting]), complemento([a, normal, bile, acid, synthesis])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', findings, are, discussed, in, relation, to, two, mouse, and, the, cyp7b1, knockout, mouse])]). relacion([sujeto(['If', the, accumulation, of, 27, -, hydroxycholesterol, is, an, important, pathogenetic, 'factor,', a, reduction, of, its, levels, may, reduce, or]), verbo([prevent]), complemento([the, neurological, symptoms])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', conversion, of, cholesterol, into, bile, acids, occurs, via, a, long, cascade, of, enzymatically]), verbo([regulated]), complemento([oxidative, processes])]). relacion([sujeto(['Our', aim, was, to, examine, if, an, 'up-regulation', of, hepatic, cholesterol, 7, 'alpha-hydroxylase', '(', 'CYP7A1)', in, humans, by, 'cholestyramine,', a, bile, 'acid-binding', 'resin,']), verbo([has]), complemento([an, effect, on, the, degradation, of, 'brain-specific', 24, 'S-hydroxycholesterol'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Total', and, 'LDL-cholesterol']), verbo([decreased]), complemento([on, the, average, by, 9.3, '%', '(', p, =, 0.002, ')', and, 19.8, '%', '(', p, =, 0.001, ')', after, 2, weeks, of, 'treatment,', respectively])]). relacion([sujeto(['Absolute', serum, concentrations, of, 7, 'alpha-hydroxycholesterol,', a, marker, for, bile, acid, 'production,']), verbo([increase]), complemento([in, the, 'CYP7A1', catalyzed, 7, 'alpha-hydroxylation', of, cholesterol, and, an, 'up-regulation', of, endogenous, cholesterol, 'synthesis,', as, proven, indirectly, by, an, increase, in, serum, lathosterol, levels])]). relacion([sujeto([7, -, 'Ketocholesterol', '(', 7, 'kCh)', is, a, major, oxysterol]), verbo([found]), complemento([associated, with, vascular, diseases])]). relacion([sujeto([7, kCh]), verbo([caused]), complemento([loss, of, cell, viability, in, a, 'dose-dependent', manner])]). relacion([sujeto(['Caspases-8,', -, 12, ',', and, -, 3, /, 7, but, not, 'caspase-9', were]), verbo([activated]), complemento([by, 7, kCh, treatment])]). relacion([sujeto(['However,', 'pre-treatment', with, 'z-ATAD-fmk,', a, 'caspase-12', 'inhibitor,', followed, by, 7, kCh, exposure]), verbo([lead]), complemento([to, significantly, increased, 'caspase-8', activity])]). relacion([sujeto(['This']), verbo([suggests]), complemento([that, 'caspase-8', and, 'caspase-12', pathways, have, unique, inhibition, patterns, and, that, 'caspase-12', is, likely, not, upstream, and, feeding, into, 'caspase-8', but, the, pathways, may, function, in, parallel, to, each, other])]). relacion([sujeto(['Caspase-3/7', activation, was]), verbo([inhibited]), complemento([partially, by, low, density, lipoprotein, '(', 'LDL),', high, density, lipoprotein, '(', 'HDL),', 'z-VAD-fmk', '(', 'pan-caspase', 'inhibitor),', and, low, doses, '(', 0.01, and, 0.001, 'microM)', of, the, cholesterol, lowering, 'drug,', simvastatin])]). relacion([sujeto(['However,', only, 'LDL', partially, protected, against, 7, 'kCh-induced']), verbo([loss]), complemento([of, cell, viability, suggesting, that, 'caspase-independent', pathways, also, contributed, to, the, cell, loss, and, that, protection, from, oxysterol, damage, may, require, inhibition, of, multiple, pathways])]). relacion([sujeto(['Moreover,', our, data]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, oxysterols, such, as, 7, kCh, can, damage, 'HMVECs', cells, in, part, via, 'caspase-dependent', apoptosis, and, may, play, a, role, in, vascular, and, retinal, diseases])]). relacion([sujeto(['To', determine, whether, caspase, or, cathepsin, pathways, are]), verbo([activated]), complemento([in, human, retinal, pigment, epithelial, cells, '(', 'ARPE-19)', after, exposure, to, 7, -, ketocholesterol, '(', 7, 'kCh)'])]). relacion([sujeto(['At', 24, 'hours,', 7, 'kCh-treated', cultures, had]), verbo([increased]), complemento(['caspase-8', '(', 'P', &, 'lt;', 0.001, ')', and, 'caspase-3', '(', 'P', &, 'lt;', 0.001, ')', activities, compared, with, 'vehicle-treated', cultures])]). relacion([sujeto(['Caspase-9', was, not]), verbo([activated]), complemento([by, 7, kCh, treatment, '(', 'P', &, 'gt;', 0.05, ')'])]). relacion([sujeto(['ARPE-19', cells, did, not]), verbo([express]), complemento(['RNA', for, cathepsins, 'B,', 'D,', or, 'L/V2', under, any, conditions])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', cathepsin, pathways, are, not]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, 7, 'kCh-induced', cell, death])]). relacion([sujeto(['These', data, demonstrate, that, 7, kCh]), verbo([causes]), complemento([a, loss, of, cell, viability, through, 'caspase-dependent', apoptosis, and, can, act, as, an, oxidative, stressor, leading, to, retinal, pigment, epithelial, cell, atrophy])]). relacion([sujeto(['Elucidating', the, specific, apoptotic, pathways]), verbo([involved]), complemento([may, have, therapeutic, potential, for, 'AMD', and, other, retinal, diseases])]). relacion([sujeto(['This', study]), verbo([reports]), complemento([the, discovery, of, a, novel, sulfonated, oxysterol, found, at, high, levels, in, the, mitochondria, and, nuclei, of, primary, rat, hepatocytes, after, overexpression, of, the, gene, encoding, steroidogenic, acute, regulatory, protein, '(', 'StarD1)'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Forty-eight', hours, after, infection, of, primary, rat, hepatocytes, with, recombinant, adenovirus, encoding, 'StarD1,', rates, of, bile, acid, synthesis]), verbo([increased]), complemento([by, 4, -, fold])]). relacion([sujeto(['Concurrently,', '[', '(', 14, ')', 'C]cholesterol', metabolites, '(', 'oxysterols)', were]), verbo([increased]), complemento([dramatically, in, both, the, mitochondria, and, nuclei, of, 'StarD1-overexpressing', 'cells,', but, not, in, culture, medium])]). relacion([sujeto(['Determination', of, plasma, 24, 'S-hydroxycholesterol,', which, is, produced, almost, exclusively, in, the, brain, and, is]), verbo([released]), complemento([only, in, small, amounts, into, circulation, under, physiological, 'conditions,', might, be, a, marker, to, monitor, 'non-invasively', the, time, course, and, the, extent, of, the, disintegration, of, the, 'blood-brain', barrier, after, cerebral, ischemia])]). relacion([sujeto(['Furthermore,', comparison, of, patients, with, extended, or, small, lesions, did, not]), verbo([reveal]), complemento([any, differences, in, the, concentrations, of, oxysterols])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', present, results, indicate, that, sterol, response, element]), verbo([binding]), complemento([protein, '(', 'SREBP),', a, family, of, 'oxysterol-responsive', transcription, factors, that, stimulates, cholesterol, 'synthesis,', may, be, an, important, regulator, of, 'CYP7B1'])]). relacion([sujeto(['SREBP']), verbo([suppressed]), complemento([a, human, 'CYP7B1', luciferase, reporter, gene, in, several, cell, 'lines,', most, markedly, in, rat, hepatoma, 'McA-RH7777', cells])]). relacion([sujeto(['An', activator, 'Sp1'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Data', indicated, that, 'SREBP', does, not]), verbo([bind]), complemento([this, sequence, but, affects, the, gene, 'indirectly,', probably, via, interaction, with, 'Sp1'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Our', findings, indicate, that, 'CYP7B1', transcription, is, controlled, by, 'SREBP', and]), verbo([reveal]), complemento([a, link, between, 'oxysterol-sensitive', regulators, and, oxysterol, metabolism])]). relacion([sujeto(['We', propose, that, 'CYP7B1', is, important, for]), verbo([regulating]), complemento([cellular, sterol, content, and, protects, against, 'oxysterol-mediated', toxicity])]). relacion([sujeto(['By', 34, 'wk,', 'CYP7A1', activity, had]), verbo([increased]), complemento([nearly, 10, -, fold, in, both, infant, diet, 'groups,', and, the, sevenfold, difference, in, 'CYP7A1', between, previously, 'breast-', and, 'formula-fed', animals, persisted])]). relacion([sujeto(['There', were, no, differences, in, 'CYP7B1', activities, between, infant, diet, groups, at, either, 14, or, 34, wk, of, age, although, the, activity]), verbo([increased]), complemento([in, both, groups, by, about, 50, '%', from, 14, to, 34, wk])]). relacion([sujeto(['CYP27A1', activity, also]), verbo([increased]), complemento([between, 14, and, 34, wk, of, 'age,', 'and,', compared, with, 'CYP7A1,', relatively, small, differences, in, 'CYP27A1', activity, due, to, infant, diet, were, observed, at, each, age])]). relacion([sujeto(['We', had, previously]), verbo([reported]), complemento([that, after, 'weaning,', the, total, bile, acid, they, may]), verbo([lead]), complemento([to, excessive, accumulation, in, vessel, 'walls,', a, condition, predisposing, to, the, development, of, atherosclerotic, lesions])]). relacion([sujeto(['Nuclear', receptors, are, among, the, most, important, transcription, factors]), verbo([regulating]), complemento([genes, involved, in, different, steps, of, reverse, cholesterol, 'factor-4alpha)', in, different, steps, of, reverse, cholesterol, transport])]). relacion([sujeto(['LXR', controls, the, transcription, of, crucial, genes, in, cholesterol, efflux, from, macrophages, complemento([the, activity, of, 'LXR', by, antagonizing, the, effect, of, activators, of, this, 'receptor,', thus, contributing, to, cholesterol, accumulation, in, macrophages])]). disease])]). relacion([sujeto(['Bile', acids, are, biologically, active, molecules, that]), verbo([promote]), complemento([absorption, of, dietary, lipids, in, the, intestine, and, stimulate, biliary, excretion, of, cholesterol])]). relacion([sujeto(['Bile', acids, and, 'oxysterols,', formed, from, 'cholesterol,']), verbo([act]), complemento([as, ligands, to, nuclear, receptors, regulating, the, a, 12, 'alpha-hydroxyl', group, performed, by, 'CYP8B1'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Oxysterols', are, precursors, to, bile, 'acids,']), verbo([participate]), complemento([in, cholesterol, transport, and, are, known, to, affect, the, expression, of, several, genes, in, cholesterol, homeostasis])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', 'enzymes,']), verbo([nuclear]), complemento([receptors, and, transcription, factors, involved, in, bile, acid, biosynthesis, are, potential, pharmaceutical, targets, for, the, development, of, new, drugs, to, control, hypercholesterolemia, and, to, prevent, atherosclerosis, and, other, diseases, related, to, disturbed, cholesterol, homeostasis])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', toxicity, of, uranium]), verbo([has]), complemento([been, demonstrated, in, different, 'organs,', including, the, 'kidneys,', 'skeleton,', central, nervous, 'system,', and, liver])]). relacion([sujeto(['However,', few, works]), verbo([have]), complemento([investigated, the, biological, effects, verbo([found]), complemento([similar, profiles, between, 'HFD', and, 'ob/ob', mice])]). relacion([sujeto(['Addition', of, cholesterol, 25, -, hydroperoxide, to, the, enzymes, 'CYP27A1', and, 'β-HSD1-deficient', mice])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', impact, of, 11, 'β-HSD1-deficiency', on, 'BA', homeostasis, seems, to, be, 'GR-independent', because, intrahepatic, corticosterone, and, 'GR']), complemento([receptor, 'FTF', as, a, central, regulator, of, lipid, metabolism])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', postmenopausal, breast, 'cancers,', the]), verbo([increase]), complemento([in, aromatase, 'LRH-1/NR5A2', is, one, of, the, critical, downstream, transcriptional, mediators, of, this, effect])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', aim, of, the, current, study, was, to, determine, whether, 'LRH-1', could]), verbo([bind]), complemento([directly, to, 'PII', and, whether, the, suppression, of, 'LRH-1', expression, could, inhibit, aromatase, expression, in, human, adipose, stromal, fibroblasts])]). relacion([sujeto(['To', assess, the, impact, of, 'LRH-1', knockdown, on, 'FSK/PMA']), verbo([mediated]), complemento(['PII', 'expression,', cells, were, transfected, with, shRNA, targeted, against, 'LRH-1', '(', 'shLRH-1)', and, treated, with, forskolin, and, 'PMA'])]). relacion([sujeto(['A']), verbo([decrease]), complemento([in, 'LRH-1,', 'PII', and, total, aromatase, mRNA, transcripts, was, observed, in, 'shLRH-1', transfected, cells, compared, to, controls, under, basal, and, treatment, conditions])]). relacion([sujeto(['Glucocorticoids', '(', 'GC)']), verbo([have]), complemento([important, 'anti-inflammatory', and, 'pro-apoptotic', activities])]). relacion([sujeto(['Initially', thought, to, be, exclusively, produced, by, the, adrenal, 'glands,', there, is, now]), verbo([increasing]), complemento([evidence, for, 'extra-adrenal', sources, of, 'GCs'])]). relacion([sujeto(['We']), verbo([have]), complemento([previously, shown, that, the, intestinal, epithelium, produces, immunoregulatory, 'GCs', and, that, intestinal, steroidogenesis, is, regulated, by, the, nuclear, receptor, liver, receptor, 'homolog-1', '(', 'LRH-1)'])]). relacion([sujeto(['As', 'LRH-1']), verbo([has]), complemento([been, implicated, in, the, development, of, colon, 'cancer,', we, here, investigated, whether, 'LRH-1', regulates, 'GC', synthesis, in, colorectal, tumors, and, whether, 'tumor-produced', 'GCs', suppress, 'T-cell', activation])]). relacion([sujeto(['Colorectal', cancer, cell, lines, and, primary, tumors, were]), verbo([found]), complemento([to, express,
