'processes,', indicating, an, important, role, of, 'LRH-1', in, colorectal, tumor, 'GC', synthesis])]). relacion([sujeto(['This', study, describes, for, the, first, time, cortisol, synthesis, in, a, 'non-endocrine', tumor, in, 'humans,', and]), verbo([suggests]), complemento([that, the, synthesis, of, bioactive, 'GCs', in, colon, cancer, cells, may, account, as, a, novel, mechanism, of, tumor, immune, escape])]). relacion([sujeto(['Liver', receptor, 'homolog-1', '(', 'NR5A2)', is, a]), verbo([nuclear]), complemento([receptor, originally, identified, in, the, liver, and, mostly, known, for, its, regulatory, role, in, cholesterol, and, bile, acid, homeostasis])]). relacion([sujeto(['More', 'recently,', liver, receptor, 'homolog-1']), verbo([has]), complemento([emerged, as, a, key, regulator, of, intestinal, 'function,', coordinating, unanticipated, 'actions,', such, as, cell, renewal, and, local, immune, function, with, important, implications, to, common, intestinal, 'diseases,', including, colorectal, cancer, and, inflammatory, bowel, disease])]). relacion([sujeto(['Unlike', most, of, the, other]), verbo([nuclear]), complemento(['receptors,', liver, receptor, 'homolog-1', acts, as, a, constitutively, active, transcription, factor, to, drive, the, transcription, of, its, target, genes])]). relacion([sujeto(['Liver', receptor, 'homolog-1', activity, however, is, to, a, major, extent]), verbo([regulated]), complemento([by, different, corepressors, and, posttranslational, 'modifications,', which, may, account, for, its, 'tissue-specific', functions])]). relacion([sujeto(['This', review, will]), verbo([provide]), complemento([an, update, on, the, molecular, aspects, of, liver, receptor, 'homolog-1', action, and, focus, on, some, emerging, aspects, of, its, function, in, normal, and, diseased, gut])]). relacion([sujeto(['This', article, is, part, of, a, 'Special', 'Issue', 'entitled:', 'Translating']), verbo([nuclear]), complemento([receptors, from, health, to, disease])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', orphan]), verbo([nuclear]), complemento([receptor, liver, receptor, 'homologue-1', '(', 'LRH-1)', has, roles, in, the, 'development,', cholesterol, and, bile, acid, 'homeostasis,', and, steroidogenesis])]). relacion([sujeto(['It', also]), verbo([enhances]), complemento([proliferation, and, cell, cycle, progression, of, cancer, cells])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', breast, 'cancer,', 'LRH-1', expression, is]), verbo([associated]), complemento([with, invasive, breast, 'cancer;', positively, correlates, with, 'ERα', status, and, aromatase, 'activity;', and, promotes, 'oestrogen-dependent', cell, proliferation])]). relacion([sujeto(['By', silencing, or, 'over-expressing', 'LRH-1', in, 'ER-positive', 'MCF-7', and, 'ER-negative', 'MDA-MB-231', breast, cancer, 'cells,', we]), verbo([have]), complemento([demonstrated, that, 'LRH-1', promotes, motility, and, cell, invasiveness])]). relacion([sujeto(['Remodelling', of, the, actin, cytoskeleton, and, 'E-cadherin', cleavage, was, observed, with, 'LRH-1', 'over-expression,', contributing, to]), verbo([increased]), complemento([migratory, and, invasive, properties])]). relacion([sujeto(['These', 'post-translational', modifications, in, 'E-cadherin', may, be]), verbo([associated]), complemento([with, 'LRH-1-dependent', changes, to, matrix, metalloproteinase, 9, expression])]). relacion([sujeto(['These', findings]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([a, new, role, of, 'LRH-1', in, promoting, migration, and, invasion, in, breast, 'cancer,', independent, of, oestrogen, sensitivity])]). relacion([sujeto(['Therefore,', 'LRH-1', may, represent, a, new]), verbo([target]), complemento([for, breast, cancer, therapeutics])]). relacion([sujeto(['Estrogen', complemento([estrogen, 'biosynthesis,', thereby, preventing, 'ER', activation])]). relacion([sujeto(['With', the, aim, of, identifying, new, molecular]), verbo([targets]), complemento([for, breast, subfamily])]). relacion([sujeto(['Here,', we, present, the, 2.2, 'A', resolution, crystal, structure, of, the, 'hLRH-1', 'DBD', in, complex, with, duplex, 'DNA,', and, elucidate, the, 'sequence-specific', 'DNA', contacts, essential, for, the, ability, of, 'LRH-1', to]), verbo([bind]), complemento([to, 'DNA', as, a, monomer])]). relacion([sujeto(['Mutations', expected, to, disrupt, relacion([sujeto(['Moreover,', we]), verbo([find]), complemento([that, altering, the, 'Ftz-F1', helix, positioning, eliminates, the, enhancement, of, 'LRH-1-mediated', transcription, by, the, expression, of, genes, involved, in, granulosa, cell, differentiation])]). relacion([sujeto(['Dax1', '(', 'Nr0b1)', is, an, atypical, orphan]), verbo([nuclear]), complemento([receptor, that, has, verbo([maintains]), complemento([pluripotency])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', steroidogenic, 'cells,', 'Dax1', protein]), verbo([interacts]), complemento([with, the, 'NR5A', nuclear, receptor, complemento([receptor, liver, 'X', receptor, '(', 'LXR)', exerts, transcriptional, control, over, lipid, metabolism, and, inflammatory, response, in, cells, of, the, myeloid, 'lineage,', suggesting, who, have, previously, not, had, access, to, adequate, care])]). relacion([sujeto(['Recent', investigations]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, inflammation, constitutes, a, biological, manner, by, a, developing, or, reproducing, multicellular, organism])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', ability, to]), verbo([respond]), complemento([to, hormones, is, determined, by, the, competence, of, a, cell, or, a, tissue])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', 'betaFtz-F1', orphan]), verbo([nuclear]), complemento([receptor, acts, as, a, competence, factor, for, the, steroid, hormone, 20, -, hydroxyecdysone, '(', '20E)', in, 'Drosophila', melanogaster, metamorphosis, and, mosquito, reproduction])]). relacion([sujeto(['We']), verbo([report]), complemento([that, the, 'protein-protein', interaction, between, 'betaFtz-F1', and, a, 'p160/SRC', coactivator, of, the, ecdysone, 'receptor,', 'FISC,', is, crucial, for, the, 'stage-specific', expression, of, the, '20E', effector, genes, during, mosquito, reproduction])]). relacion([sujeto(['This', interaction, dramatically]), verbo([increases]), complemento([recruitment, of, 'FISC', to, the, functional, ecdysone, receptor, in, a, '20E-dependent', manner])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', presence, of, 'betaFtz-F1', facilitates, loading, of, 'FISC', and, the, ecdysone, receptor, on, the]), verbo([target]), complemento(['promoters,', leading, to, enhanced, local, histone, 'H4', acetylation, and, robust, activation, of, the, target, genes])]). relacion([sujeto(['Thus,', our, results]), verbo([reveal]), complemento([the, molecular, basis, of, competence, for, the, 'stage-specific', '20E', response])]). relacion([sujeto(['Hox', genes, encode, 'DNA']), verbo([binding]), complemento([transcription, factors, that, regulate, the, body, plans, of, metazoans, by, regulating, the, expression, of, downstream, target, '\'', realizator, 'genes\'', that, direct, morphogenesis, and, growth])]). relacion([sujeto(['Although', some, 'Hox']), verbo([target]), complemento([genes, have, been, 'identified,', the, code, used, by, 'Hox', proteins, to, select, regulatory, targets, remains, elusive])]). relacion([sujeto(['This', failure, is, 'due,', in, 'part,', to, the, overlapping, and, promiscuous, 'DNA']), verbo([binding]), complemento([potential, of, different, 'Hox', proteins])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', identification, of, 'Hox', protein, plus, its, cofactor])]). relacion([sujeto(['Here', we]), verbo([have]), complemento([made, use, of, the, fact, that, the, 'DNA', binding, specificity, of, the, 'Drosophila', 'Hox', targets])]). relacion([sujeto(['At', least, two, of, the, first, 30, potential]), verbo([target]), complemento(['genes--apontic', '(', 'apt)', and, sulfated, '(', 'Sulf1)--appear', to, be, bona, fide, targets, of, 'Ftz', and, 'Ftz-F1'])]). relacion([sujeto([apt, is]), verbo([expressed]), complemento([in, stripes, within, the, 'Ftz', 'domain,', but, posterior, to, engrailed, '(', 'en)', 'stripes,', suggesting, a, parasegmental, 'border-independent', function, of, ftz])]). relacion([sujeto(['Ftz/Ftz-F1']), verbo([activate]), complemento(['Sulf1', expression, in, blastoderm, embryos, via, composite, binding, sites])]). relacion([sujeto(['Sulf1', encodes, a, sulfatase, thought, to, be]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, wingless, '(', 'Wg)', signaling])]). relacion([sujeto(['Thus,', was]), verbo([associated]), complemento([with, phosphorylation, of, extracellular, 'signal-regulated', kinase, '(', 'ERK)', and, a, slight, increase, in, the, expression, of, liver, 'X', receptor, alpha, '(', 'LXRα)'])]). relacion([sujeto(['We']), verbo([found]), complemento([that, 'LXRα', inhibition, 'induced,', while, 'LXRα', activation, 'impeded,', macrophage, 'self-renewal'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Overall,', we, show, that, 'BPA']), verbo([increases]), complemento([macrophage, 'self-renewal', and, that, this, 'effect,', at, least, in, 'part,', can, be, inhibited, by, complemento([for, restoring, bile, and, sterol, transport, to, treat, 'PNAC'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Activation', of, liver, 'X', receptors, '(', 'LXRs)', with, synthetic, agonists]), we, explore, the, potential, of]), verbo([increasing]), complemento([endogenous, desmosterol, production, or, mimicking, its, activity, as, a, means, of, inducing, 'LXR', activity, while, 'LXR', function, in, macrophages, in, vitro, and, in, vivo])]). relacion([sujeto(['These', studies, thereby]), verbo([reveal]), complemento(['cell-specific', discrimination, of, endogenous, and, hypertriglyceridemia])]). relacion([sujeto(['Crocin', '(', 'CRO),', chlorogenic, acid, '(', 'CGA),', geniposide, '(', 'GEN),', and, quercetin, '(', 'QUE)', are, all, natural, compounds, with, in, lipid, deposition, in, comparison, to, individual, 'treatments,', in, both, triglyceride, and, total, cholesterol, '(', 'CRO,', 5.74, -, and, 1.49, -, 'folds;', 'CGA,', 3.38, -, and, 1.12, -, expression, than, the, individual, treatments])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', 'CCGQ', combination]), verbo([has]), complemento(['potential,', both, as, a, complementary, therapy, for, 'hyperlipemia,', and, in, preventing, further, 'obesity-related', complications])]). relacion([sujeto(['Several', studies]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([a, link, between, synucleinopathies, and, the, cholesterol, metabolite, 27, -, hydroxycholesterol, '(', 27, -, 'OHC)'])]). relacion([sujeto([27, -, 'OHC', is, the, major, cholesterol, metabolite, in, the, blood, that, crosses, the, blood, brain, 'barrier,', and, its, levels, can]), verbo([increase]), complemento([following, 'hypercholesterolemia,', 'aging,', and, oxidative, 'stress,', which, are, all, factors, for, increased, synucleinopathy, risk])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', this, 'study,', we, determined, the, extent, to, which, 27, -, 'OHC']), verbo([regulates]), complemento(['α-syn', levels, in, human, dopaminergic, 'neurons,', the, cell, type, in, which, 'α-syn', accumulates, in, 'PD,', a, major, synucleinopathy, disorder])]). relacion([sujeto(['Our', results, show, that, 27, -, 'OHC', significantly]), verbo([increases]), complemento([the, protein, 'levels,', not, the, mRNA, expression, of, 'α-syn'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Furthermore,', our, data, strongly]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, the, 27, -, 'OHC-induced', increase, in, 'α-syn', protein, levels, emanates, from, inhibition, of, the, proteasomal, degradation, of, this, protein, and, a, decrease, in, the, heat, shock, protein, 70, '(', 'HSP70)'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Identifying', 27, -, 'OHC', as, a, factor, that, can]), verbo([increase]), complemento(['α-syn', levels, and, the, inhibition, of, the, proteasomal, function, and, reduction, in, 'HSP70', levels, as, potential, cellular, mechanisms, involved, in, regulation, of, 'α-syn'])]). relacion([sujeto(['This', may, help, in]), verbo([targeting]), complemento([the, correct, degradation, of, 'α-syn', as, a, potential, avenue, to, preclude, 'α-syn', accumulation])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', signal, transducer, and, activator, of, transcription, 6, '(', 'STAT6)', transcription, factor]), verbo([activates]), complemento([peroxisome, 'proliferator-activated', receptor, gamma, '(', 'PPAR-γ)-regulated', gene, expression, in, immune, cells])]). relacion([sujeto(['We', investigated, proximal, membrane, signaling, that, was, initiated, in, macrophages, after, exposure, to, apoptotic, cells, that]), verbo([led]), complemento([to, enhanced, 'PPAR-γ', expression, and, 'activity,', using, specific, siRNAs, for, 'ABCA1,', 'STAT6,', and, 'PPAR-γ,', or, their, antagonists])]). relacion([sujeto(['PPAR-γ-specific', siRNAs, or, the, 'PPAR-γ', antagonist, 'GW9662']), verbo([inhibited]), complemento([apoptotic, 'cell-induced', increases, in, 'LXR-α', and, 'ABCA1', mRNA, and, protein, levels])]). relacion([sujeto(['Thus,', these, results, indicate, that, apoptotic, cells]), verbo([trigger]), complemento([the, 'ABCA1/STAT6', 'pathway,', leading, to, the, activation, of, the, 'PPAR-γ/LXR-α/ABCA1', pathway, in, macrophages])]). relacion([sujeto(['Results:', 'EGCG', administration, markedly, attenuated, atherosclerotic, plaque, formation, in, 'HFD-fed', 'ApoE-/-', 'mice,', which, were, accompanied, by]), verbo([increased]), complemento([plasma, 'interleukin-10', complemento(['high-fat-induced', 'dyslipidemia,', evidencing, by, decreased, total, cholesterol, '(', 'TC)', and, 'low-density', lipoprotein, levels, and, increased, 'high-density', lipoprotein, the]), verbo([nuclear]), complemento([receptor, 'family,', that, play, fundamental, roles, in, cholesterol, 'transport,', lipid, metabolism, and, modulation, of, inflammatory, responses])]). relacion([sujeto(['This', compound, was, able, to, dissociate, certain, beneficial, 'LXRs', effects, from, those, undesirable, ones]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, triglyceride, metabolism])]). fundamental, challenges, in, obesity, research, is, to, identify, subjects, prone, to, weight]), verbo([gain]), complemento([so, that, obesity, and, its, comorbidities, can, be, promptly, prevented, or, treated])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', principles, of, thermodynamics, as, applied, to, human, body, energetics, demonstrate, that, susceptibility, to, weight]), verbo([gain]), complemento([varies, among, individuals, as, a, result, of, interindividual, differences, in, energy, expenditure, and, energy, 'intake,', two, factors, that, counterbalance, one, another, and, determine, daily, energy, balance, 'and,', 'ultimately,', body, weight, change])]). relacion([sujeto(['Conflicting', results]), verbo([have]), complemento([been, reported, about, the, role, of, interindividual, differences, in, energy, metabolism, during, energy, balance, in, relation, to, future, weight, change])]). relacion([sujeto(['However,', recent, studies]), verbo([have]), complemento([shown, that, metabolic, responses, to, 'acute,', 'short-term', dietary, interventions, that, create, energy, 'imbalance,', such, as, 'low-protein', overfeeding, or, fasting, for, 24, '\240\hours,', may, reveal, the, underlying, metabolic, phenotype, that, determines, the, degree, of, resistance, to, 'diet-induced', weight, loss, or, the, propensity, to, spontaneous, weight, gain, over, time])]). relacion([sujeto(['Metabolically', '"', 'thrifty"', 'individuals,', characterized, by, a, predilection, for, saving, energy, in, settings, of, undernutrition, and, dietary, protein, 'restriction,', display, a, minimal]), verbo([increase]), complemento([in, plasma, fibroblast, growth, factor, 21, concentrations, in, response, to, a, 'low-protein', overfeeding, diet, and, tend, to, gain, more, weight, over, time, compared, with, metabolically, '"', 'spendthrift"', individuals])]). relacion([sujeto(['Thus,', an]), verbo([increased]), complemento([understanding, and, the, clinical, characterization, of, phenotypic, differences, in, energy, metabolism, among, individuals, '(', metabolic, 'profile)', may, lead, to, new, strategies, to, prevent, weight, gain, or, improve, 'weight-loss', interventions, by, targeted, therapies, on, the, basis, of, metabolic, phenotype, and, susceptibility, to, obesity, in, individual, persons])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', 'Western', diet]), verbo([increased]), complemento([caloric, intake, for, the, first, 6, '\240\months', and, body, 'fat,', 'activity,', energy, 'expenditure,', insulin, 'resistance,', and, hepatosteatosis, after, 2.5, '\240\years,', whereas, the, 'Mediterranean', diet, reduced, triglyceride, levels])]). relacion([sujeto(['This', is, the, first]), verbo([report]), complemento([of, differential, caloric, intake, and, obesity, with, 'long-term', consumption, of, a, 'Western', versus, 'Mediterranean', diet, under, controlled, experimental, conditions, and, the, first, experimental, evidence, that, a,
